property.name: Text
property.value: Gehenna. Requires at least 1 other Gehenna event in play. Do not replace until a Methuselah is ousted. If the ally is burned, it is removed from the game. If a Methuselah is ousted, burn this card. After this card leaves play, remove all such allies from the game.

property.value: The Red Star shines brightly -- more so, I am told, to those with the gift of superior sight, but it is obvious even to me. Can you truly not see that Gehenna is upon us? Prince Giangaleazzo, Lasombra antitribu

property.value: As Thetmes closed the gap between the two Kindred, he withdrew from under his cloak a pair of tiger's claws.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose a ready younger vampire. Successful referendum means the chosen vampire is moved to the uncontrolled region (breaking any temporary control effects); any cards and counters on the chosen vampire stay with them but are out of play as long as the chosen vampire remains uncontrolled.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: DS:U2, FN:PS, CE:PTo/PV, KMW:PAn2, LoB:PG, SP:PoS2

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an Independent or Anarch vampire. Only usable if a Camarilla or Sabbat vampire is bleeding you. Reduce the bleed amount by 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your approval means nothing to us. Your high-handed "recognition of sovereignty" and other quasi-political jingoism won't work in this room. Isabel Giovanni

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique melee weapon. Strike: strength+2 damage. Damage inflicted on a Kiasyd by this weapon is aggravated. The bearer gets -1 stealth. If the bearer blocks, the acting minion burns 1 blood or life before combat (if any).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For punishment, the Bean-Sidhe was artbound to the blade itself, and it has howled in its twice-damned existence ever since. Michah Naught, Seelie sluagh grump

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Barbaro can put 1 taint counter on any minion as a +1 stealth (D) action. If a minion has 2 taint counters, burn them and the minion becomes infernal. He can change his clan to Tremere antitribu as +1 stealth action. Infernal.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Prince of Brussels: During your minion phase, Dieudonne can burn 1 blood to unlock after performing a successful action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent. 2 votes (titled): If The Baron is ready during your unlock phase, you can look at the hand of each Methuselah who controls a ready Giovanni. +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Baroque can enter combat with a younger vampire who is not Giovanni or Nosferatu as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [mal] (D) Unlock this vampire and put this card on any vampire. The attached vampire is sterile and gets -2 capacity (to a minimum of 1). [mal] is not a Discipline. [MAL] (D) Burn a vampire with capacity 1. [Burn Option]

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock to discard a card (draw afterward).

property.value: Jyhad:C, VTES:C, Sabbat:C, SW:PB/PL, CE:PV, LoB:PA/PI, HttB:PGar

property.name: Artist
property.value: Heather Hudson; Dave Seeley; Ron Spencer

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Barry gets +1 strength in combat with an ally or a younger vampire. Chicago circle. Sterile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: While Barth is ready and unlocked, vampires with capacity 3 or less controlled by your prey or predator get -1 stealth .

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: If Bartholomew is unlocked at the beginning of your turn, you gain 1 pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Hunting ground. During your unlock phase, a ready vampire you control can gain 1 blood. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground each turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Melee weapon. Do not replace until after this action. Strike: strength+1 damage. If the action to equip with the Baseball Bat is successful, unlock the acting minion at the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Older vampires get +1 strength in combat with Basil.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla primogen: Damage from Basilia's hand strikes is aggravated.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined in combat with an ally or younger vampire. [pot] This vampire gets +1 strength this combat. [myt] If any damage is successfully inflicted from this vampire's hand strikes this round, send the opposing vampire to torpor or burn the opposing ally. [MYT] As [myt] above, and the opposing vampire burns 1 blood if any damage is successfully inflicted that way.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Each time you use a master phase action to put a master discipline card on Basir, he gains 1 blood. He cannot block or play reaction cards. Blood cursed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock during the polling step of a political action to get +1 vote for each ready Daughter of Cacophony you control. If you control no ready Daughters of Cacophony, you can lock and burn this location during the polling step of a political action to get +1 vote.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's good to keep the sirens distracted working on their art. It limits their influence in the city. Or at least it used to, before every kindred and his sire started frequenting the shows. Francois Villon, Toreador

property.name: Text
property.value: Laibon: Batsheva gets +1 strength in combat with a Tzimisce.

property.name: Text
property.value: Laibon: Batsheva gets +1 strength in combat with a Malkavian. [MERGED] +1 strength (in addition to her bonus against Malkavian and Tzimisce).

property.name: Text
property.value: Out-of-turn. Frenzy. Choose an Osebo in combat. The chosen Osebo gets 1 additional strike each round this combat that does not count against the limit. During the press step each round this combat, the chosen Osebo burns 1 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [vic] Put this card on this vampire, search your library for a non-unique non-location equipment card, and put it on another minion you control, ignoring requirements and cost (shuffle afterward). This vampire cannot take actions, block or cast votes or ballots. You can burn this card and the chosen equipment during your unlock phase or after the minion with the chosen equipment leaves the controlled region. [VIC] As above, but you can burn this card and the chosen equipment at any time.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move 1 blood from each ready Gangrel antitribu you control to a Gangrel antitribu in your uncontrolled region.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I bay and howl, one wild howl; like a wolf with a knife. Ralph Turturro, "Streams"

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a ready anarch. Only usable if an older non-Anarch vampire blocks, before combat (if any). Compare the costs of the top cards of your crypt and the blocking vampire's crypt and shuffle both. If yours is younger, this anarch takes 1 unpreventable environmental damage (and combat occurs as normal). Otherwise, cancel the combat and put this card on the acting anarch. This anarch gets +2 bleed against the blocking vampire's controller.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. A vampire can play only one Bear's Skin each combat. [ani][pro] This round, this vampire gets +1 strength and can prevent 1 damage. [ANI][PRO] This combat, this vampire gets +1 strength and can prevent 1 damage each round.

property.name: Text
property.value: [ani][pro] +1 stealth. Whenever this vampire is blocked, they can prevent 1 damage in the resulting combat. [ANI][PRO] Only usable as a non-bleed action is announced. Vampires cannot block this action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Beast cannot play action cards. He cannot have or use equipment or retainers. He can enter combat with a minion as a (D) action. +1 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: Imbued: During your unlock phase, another ready imbued you control takes 1 unpreventable damage. +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Beckett can draw 3 cards as a +1 stealth action (discard down afterward).

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: While Beckett is ready, you get +1 hand size for each Gehenna event in play. If he leaves the ready region, discard your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gehenna. Requires at least 2 other Gehenna events controlled by other Methuselahs. Do not replace until your next discard phase. During each Methuselah's unlock phase, that Methuselah chooses a ready vampire they control; the chosen vampire takes 1 unpreventable environmental damage. Earth Meld cards cost 2 additional blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a non-sterile vampire. Put this card in play; it becomes a 0-capacity non-unique vampire of the same clan as the acting vampire and cannot act this turn; put up to 3 master discipline cards from your hand to this vampire; move up to 1 blood from the acting vampire to this new vampire. Burn this vampire if they have no capacity-increasing discipline cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during the first round of combat. [obf] Maneuver. [OBF] Strike: dodge.

property.value: Jyhad:R2, VTES:R, CE:U/PN, BH:PN2, KMW:PG2, Third:PM, KoT:U

property.name: Text

property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a magaji. Unlock another ready Laibon or add 2 blood to a younger Laibon in your uncontrolled region.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The termites do not bite termites; the black ants do not bite black ants. Cesewayo, Osebo magaji

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: During your unlock phase, any Giovanni older than the oldest ready Giovanni you control can burn 1 blood to steal Benedict. He cannot block undirected actions.

property.name: Text
property.value: Successful referendum means you gain 1 pool for each ready Daughter of Cacophony you control, and each non-Daughter of Cacophony vampire who cast votes or ballots in favor gains 1 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Prince of Washington, D.C.: Benjamin can call a referendum to give you +1 hand size until the end of the game as a +1 stealth political action.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Bernard can call a blood hunt on a vampire with capacity 4 or less as a +1 stealth political action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Laibon. Only usable before range is determined. A vampire can play only one Bestial Vengeance each combat. [ani] Choose a retainer on this Laibon; this combat, frenzy cards cannot be played on this Laibon and the opposing minion takes 1R environmental damage each round during normal strike resolution if the chosen retainer is ready. [ANI] As above, but for 2R damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card on any Gangrel antitribu. This vampire gets -1 stealth.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ...and finally doth bring To a perfect beast that first deformed thing. Du Bartas, "Divine Weekes and Workes"

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [for] Unlock this vampire, and put this card on a vampire you control. This minion can play combat cards requiring basic Fortitude [for] as a vampire. Burn this card during the discard phase of your next turn. [FOR] As above, but put this card on an ally you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Toreador and Toreador antitribu get +1 bleed against you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose a Methuselah who controls a vampire who is also in your uncontrolled region, and put this card in play. The vampire's controller burns 1 pool during their unlock phase. They can burn 1 additional pool to attempt to guess the name of the vampire. If the guess is correct, this card is burned.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during the polling step of a political action. [pre] This vampire gets +2 votes. [PRE] This vampire gets +4 votes.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ...things have changed. I won't concur and won't betray my sorrow save I'll always dress in black and rave. Christine de Pisan, "Untitled"

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: If Bez leaves the ready region, discard 2 cards at random from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do not replace until after this action. (D) Enter combat with a minion. If that minion is Red List, this minion gets 1 optional maneuver or press during that combat, and after resolution, if this minion is still ready, this minion unlocks.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ghoul with 2 life. 2 strength, 1 bleed. After this Bima enters play, put a master discipline card from your hand on it or burn this Bima. Bima can play cards requiring the basic level of that Discipline as a vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a minion with a Kerrie. Only usable if a vampire without Auspex [aus] is taking a (D) action against this minion or a card on this minion. Usable by a locked minion. A minion can play only one Bind the Night-Walker each turn. The action fails.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gumha's medicine is powerful. Not even the witches can harm him. Gumha's followers

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Bindusara can search your library for an Arcane Library, Elder Library, or Fragment of the Book of Nod and put that card in play as an action (pay cost as normal; shuffle afterward). +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [tha] Employ an animal retainer from your hand ignoring requirements (pay cost as normal). [THA] Put this card on a minion you control. The attached minion gets 1 optional maneuver each combat and +1 strength.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [SoC] [tha] As [tha] above, but employ any retainer from your hand or library.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Methuselah gets +2 hand size for each victory point he or she has.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Keep a little and let a little come back to me.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Black Annis can enter combat with a minion controlled by your predator or prey as a (D) action. Other non-hunt actions cost her 1 additional blood. +1 stealth. +1 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined in combat with a Camarilla vampire. Put this card on this vampire. In combat with a Camarilla vampire, this vampire gets +1 strength and can burn this card to get 1 press, only usable to continue combat. A vampire can have only one Black Beast. [Burn Option]

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Equipment costs Black Cat 1 fewer pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Requires a ready Sabbat vampire. Once each turn, a Sabbat vampire can call a referendum to have his or her controller gain 2 pool as a +1 stealth political action. Any Changeling can burn this card as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique melee weapon. Strike: strength+1 aggravated damage. If this weapon is used, it inflicts 1 damage to the bearer during its strike resolution, but only once each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We know more about war than we know about peace, more about killing than we know about living. Gen. Omar Bradley, 1948 speech

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a Seraph. Unique. Put this card on a ready Black Hand vampire. The attached Black Hand vampire gets +1 vote for each ready Black Hand vampires you control. Any Seraph can move this card to a ready Black Hand vampire as a +1 stealth (D) action against the controller of this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a Black Hand vampire. Unlock a younger Black Hand vampire or (D) burn a Gehenna event. Any "Do not replace until" directive on that card is ended (and the controller replaces it, if it had not been replaced yet).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Dragon rises. You must stop it. Cyscek, Tzimisce

property.name: Text
property.value: [obt] Put this card on this vampire. This vampire gets 1 optional additional strike each round. A vampire can have only one Black Metamorphosis. [OBT] As above, and this vampire gets 1 optional press each combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Werewolf with 3 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed. Damage from this ally's hand strikes is aggravated. This ally gets 1 additional strike each combat. If this ally has 2 or fewer life during your unlock phase, it gains 1 life.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [Third] Requires a Sabbat vampire. As above, but Black Spiral Buddy burns 2 life when he moves to the ready region.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable by a locked vampire. [qui] Only usable during a (D) action against you (or a card you control). This vampire unlocks and attempts to block. [QUI] As above, but usable during any action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock during the polling step of any referendum to get +2 votes. Lock after a minion with a contract leaves the ready region (only usable if an Assamite you control had been chosen for that contract) to gain 1 pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Once each turn, after you draw a card from your library, you can move that card to the bottom of your library and draw a new card. Black Hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: [obf] (D) Lock a ready vampire. [OBF] (D) Put this card on a ready vampire. The attached vampire cannot block this acting vampire. During the attached vampire's unlock phase, he or she can burn 2 blood to burn this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an anarch. Only usable after this anarch diablerizes a vampire with capacity 7 or more. Put this card in play with 3 clot counters. After an anarch you control successfully inflicts hand or melee weapon damage, you can move 1 clot counter from this card to the opposing minion. A minion with any clot counters goes to torpor or is burned during his or her unlock phase. If an older vampire rescues the vampire, burn the clot counter.

property.name: Text
property.value: Melee weapon. Strike: strength +1 damage, with 1 optional maneuver each combat, only usable to maneuver to close range.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique melee weapon. Only usable by a vampire with capacity 6 or more. Strike: strength+1 damage. Damage inflicted by this weapon on a Brujah or Brujah antitribu is aggravated. Frenzy cards cannot be played on this vampire with capacity 6 or more.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Once each turn, Blanche unlocks after successfully hunting. Scarce.

property.name: Text
property.value: [obt] +1 stealth. [OBT] Only usable by a ready vampire other than the acting minion if a minion attempts to block. Lock this modifying vampire to have that attempt fail; that blocking minion cannot attempt to block this action again.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. Lock to cancel a non-out-of-turn master card played by another Methuselah as that card is played, and its cost is not paid, and that Methuselah gets 1 master phase action. During your unlock phase, lock this card or burn 1 pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: [aus] (D) Lock X-1 allies or younger vampires controlled by your predator or prey. [mel] As [aus] above, at +1 stealth. [MEL] As [mel] above, and this vampire can increase his or her capacity for purposes of choosing the targets of this effect. This action costs 1 additional blood for each point of capacity gained (chosen as the action is announced).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Such sweet compulsion doth in music lie. John Milton

property.name: Text
property.value: [val][REFLEX] Cancel a grapple card played by the opposing minion as it is played. [val] Strike: use a melee weapon strike at +2 damage. [VAL] Strike: use a melee weapon strike at +3 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move a vampire in your ash heap with superior Fortitude [FOR] and superior Necromancy [NEC] who was burned from play to your ready region.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [HttB] Move a vampire from torpor to the ready region. That vampire gains 1 blood from the blood bank.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [dem] Put this card on this vampire. In combat, opposing vampires cannot play cards requiring Dementation [dem], Chimerstry [chi], Dominate [dom] or Presence [pre]. If this vampire attempts to block, the acting vampire cannot play action modifiers requiring those Disciplines until the end of the action. [DEM] As above, and minions cannot take actions requiring those Disciplines against this vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: [chi] Strike: steal equipment. [CHI] As above, with first strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: And blessedness goes where the wind goes... Yeats, "The Blessed"

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card on an Ahrimane you control with any cards requiring Spiritus [spi] from your hand (before replacing), face down (you can look at the cards at any time). This Ahrimane can play these cards as if from your hand. Burn this card if it has no cards on it. A vampire can have only one Blessing of the Beast. [Burn Option]

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Usable by a locked Salubri antitribu. Choose this acting vampire and up to two other minions you control, put this card in play, and unlock the chosen minions. The chosen minions get +1 intercept and inflict +1 damage with melee weapons. During your unlock phase, burn this card and lock the chosen minions. A Methuselah can have only one Blessing of the Name.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. Samedi you control with capacity 4 or more get +1 bleed against your prey for each vampire in torpor they control. [Burn Option]

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. A vampire can play only one Blight each combat. [nec] The opposing minion gets -1 strength this combat. [NEC] As above, and this combat, the opposing minion cannot use additional strikes or presses to continue combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose a vampire you control and an ally or younger vampire controlled by your prey. While the first chosen vampire is acting this turn, the other chosen minion cannot block or play reaction cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: [dom][pre] [COMBAT][REACTION] Cancel a frenzy card as it is played. Usable by a vampire not involved in the current combat, if any. [DOM][PRE] [COMBAT] Strike: combat ends.

property.name: Text
property.value: [ani] Strike: hand strike at +1 damage. [val] Only usable at close range before strikes are chosen. The opposing minion takes 1 environmental unpreventable damage each round this combat during normal strike resolution at close range. A vampire can play only one Blissful Agony at [val] each combat. [VAL] Strike: combat ends. Choose a minion controlled by a Methuselah other than the opposing vampire's controller. The opposing vampire and the chosen minion enter combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: [obf] Put this card on this vampire. This vampire gets +1 stealth. Burn this card if this vampire enters combat. A vampire can have only one Blithe Acceptance. [OBF] As above, but this vampire can burn 1 blood after he enters combat instead of burning this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Not usable during the first round of combat. [qui] Damage from this vampire's next hand or melee weapon strike is aggravated. [QUI] Damage from this vampire's hand and melee weapon strikes is aggravated this combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Resign your body to fate and put up with pain, Because what the Pen has written for you it will not unwrite. The Rubaiyat of Omar Khayyam

property.name: Text
property.value: [qui] [REACTION] +1 intercept. [QUI] [ACTION MODIFIER] Only usable if a younger vampire attempts to block this vampire. That attempt fails and that vampire cannot attempt to block this action again.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. (D) Put this card on any vampire. The attached vampire cannot block this acting vampire.

Cancel combat and put this card in play; it becomes an ally with 3 life and 2 strength who can strike: 2R damage; this ally and the blocking minion enter combat. Blood Brother Ambush can play cards requiring basic Potence [pot] as a vampire with capacity 3. Burn this card at the end of combat or if the combat is canceled.

property.name: Text
property.value: Trifle. Put this card on a ready Blood Brother you control. This Blood Brother gets +1 level of Sanguinus [san].

property.name: Text

The attached minion cannot gain blood or life (any blood or life this minion would gain goes to the blood bank instead). Any minion can burn this card as an action. [QUI] As above, and burning this card also burns 1 blood or life from the attached minion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I was sick -- sick unto death with that long agony; Edgar Allen Poe, "The Pit and the Pendulum"

property.name: Text
property.value: Inquisition. Requires a ready imbued in play. While there are any ready imbued in play, any action to put a vampire or ghoul in play or to add counters to an uncontrolled vampire gets -1 stealth and costs 1 additional blood or life.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card on a vampire you control. During their master phase, this vampire's controller can move 1 blood from this vampire to their pool or from their pool to this vampire.

property.value: Only usable at close range. [tha] Strike: hand strike at +1 damage. This damage cannot be prevented by cards requiring Fortitude [for]. The opposing vampire's strikes with weapons inflict no damage on this vampire this round. [THA] As above, but at +2 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a prince or justicar. (D) Put this card on a vampire who is not a prince, a justicar or an Inner Circle member. Any vampire can enter combat with the attached vampire as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the eldest among thee shall call the blood hunt.

property.value: Only usable at close range before strikes are chosen. A vampire can play only one Blood of Acid each round. [vic] During each strike resolution this round, the opposing minion takes environmental damage equal to the amount of damage he or she successfully inflicts on this vampire. [VIC] As above, but the damage is aggravated.

property.name: Text
property.value: [tha] +1 stealth action. (D) Burn an ally. [THA] +6 stealth action. (D) Put this card on a ready locked younger vampire. Reaction cards the attached vampire plays while locked are canceled as they are played (their cost must be paid still). Burn this card if the attached vampire is in torpor.

property.name: Text
property.value: [qui] Strike: 1R damage. [QUI] Ranged strike: play a non-ranged strike requiring Quietus [qui] from your hand and use that strike as if it were ranged (if the chosen strike is a hand strike, the hand strike's damage is not ranged and this strike is not a hand strike).

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires an archbishop, priscus, cardinal or regent. Put this card on another Sabbat vampire. The attached vampire gains 1 blood after performing a successful (D) action. A vampire can have only one Blood of the Sabbat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play with 3 blood. During your unlock phase, you can add 1 blood to this card, move 1 blood from this card to your pool, or burn this card to move all its blood to your pool. Any minion can burn this card (and all the blood on it) as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable at close range. [tha] Strike: hand strike. This damage cannot be prevented by cards requiring Fortitude [for]. The opposing vampire's strikes with weapons inflict no damage on this vampire this round. [THA] As above, and this hand strike is at +1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. The bearer can prevent 1 damage from an opposing minion's strike each round of combat. If used to prevent damage from a hand strike made by a vampire with capacity 6 or less, that vampire burns 2 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Title. Requires an archbishop, priscus, cardinal or regent. No action modifiers can be played during or after this referendum. Choose a ready Sabbat vampire and a ready prince. Successful referendum means the chosen prince loses his or her title and this card is put on the chosen Sabbat vampire to represent the unique Sabbat title of Archbishop of that city. Any ready vampire can burn blood during the polling step of this referendum to get +1 vote for each blood burned.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We will sack the city, smashing every last shard of resistance in an all-out offensive. Francisco Domingo de Polonia, Lasombra

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable at long range. [qui] Strike: 2R unpreventable damage. [QUI] Strike: 3R unpreventable damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It seems to me as if my blood Flowed like a rhythmic fountain's sobbing flood. I hear it run with a long murmuring sound, But vainly do I try to find the wound. Baudelaire, "The Fountain of Blood"

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. This vampire can burn this card to prevent 2 damage in combat or to gain 2 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [for][qui] Put this card on an equipment. This melee weapon inflicts +1 damage each strike. If this equipment prevents damage in combat, it can prevent 1 additional point. An equipment can have only one Blood Tempering. [FOR][QUI] As above, and unlock this vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable at close range, before strike resolution. Not usable during the first round of combat. [tha] If the opposing minion is an ally, he or she is burned. Otherwise, the opposing vampire burns 3 blood. [THA] The opposing vampire burns 5 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gehenna. Burn all boons. No more boons can be put in play. During each Methuselah's unlock phase, that Methuselah can move 1 blood from a vampire he or she controls to a vampire controlled by another Methuselah.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Yes, well, we all get angry or scared or hungry sometimes. That can make us forget our promises. Stuart Eberhardt, Caitiff

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Requires a ready anarch. Put this card on any minion. After this minion enters combat, he or she moves this card and 1 blood (or life) to the opposing minion. If the opposing minion is an anarch, that anarch can move this card to any minion instead (but it must move).

property.name: Text
property.value: Gehenna. Do not replace until a vampire commits diablerie. Cards minions play in an action requiring any Disciplines are not replaced until the end of the current action or until any Methuselah's hand is empty (whichever comes first). Any vampire who commits diablerie is immune to this effect until a Gehenna event is played.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Regain the power that is yours! Feel the blood flow through you, as it should! Karen Suadela, Brujah prince

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires an archbishop, priscus, cardinal or regent. Put this card on a ready Sabbat vampire with capacity 5 or more and add 2 blood to him or her. The attached vampire gets +1 vote while he or she has no title. A vampire can have only one Bloodbath.

property.name: Text
property.value: [vic] Only usable in combat with an ally. Strike: combat ends. [VIC] Only usable before range is determined. This round, this vampire is immune to non-aggravated damage, cannot strike and gets 1 optional press, usable only to end combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a Sabbat vampire. Put this card on this vampire and add 1 blood to him or her. This Sabbat vampire is Black Hand. A vampire can have only one Blooding.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He who has died need not fear death; for him it is the arms of his Father welcoming him home. The Admonitions

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card on a Salubri antitribu you control. This Salubri antitribu gets +1 level of Valeren [val], +1 strength and +1 capacity. A vampire can have only one Blooding by the Code.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Frenzy. [pre] Choose X minions, and put this card in play. Each chosen minion gets 1 optional press each combat and can enter combat with a minion as a (D) action. Burn this card at the end of the turn. [PRE] As above, but choose X+1 minions.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this equipment on any minion (this is a +1 stealth (D) action if that minion is controlled by another Methuselah). This acting vampire gets +2 intercept against the bearer.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable if this Baali blocks an ally or a younger vampire, before block resolution. Lock this Baali. This Baali inflicts 1 unpreventable damage on the acting minion and each retainers on the acting minion. The action ends. [Burn Option]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Let us call on the storm, let us call on the fire, let us call on the Earthshaker.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Black Hand vampire. (D) Bleed with +1 bleed. If more than 2 pool is bled with this action, ignore the excess. If the target Methuselah controls a ready Sabbat vampire, this action is at +1 stealth.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His shrieks were confined to the repetition of a single, mad word of all too obvious source. H.P. Lovecraft, "At the Mountains of Madness"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Doused with fluid Blow torch flaming It's time to die Roasted alive Death... burning flesh Corpse... ashes left Mortician, "Charred Corpses"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In skating over thin ice, our safety is in our speed. Ralph Waldo Emerson, "Prudence"

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable as the opposing minion plays a card requiring a Discipline. A minion can play only one Botched Move each combat. The opposing minion's controller reveals the top 2 cards of his or her library (before replacing this card). If another copy of the same combat card is revealed, the played card is canceled (cost is still paid), the opposing minion takes 1 environmental unpreventable damage, and all revealed copies are burned.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card with X+1 counters on it on a ready vampire. If this vampire is sent to torpor in combat, the opposing minion's controller moves up to 2 counters from this card to his or her pool. If this vampire is burned in combat or by diablerie, the controller of the opposing minion or diablerist takes all of the counters from this card. Burn this card if it has no counters.

If any Methuselah successfully withdraws, you are ousted.

Put this card on that vampire; you still control this card. Any Sabbat vampire can enter combat with the attached vampire as a (D) action. Any Sabbat vampire can burn this card as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an archbishop, priscus, cardinal or regent. Only usable after a combat involving this vampire and a non-titled Sabbat vampire. Only usable if the opposing vampire is ready. Usable by a locked vampire. The opposing vampire goes to torpor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a ready anarch. Unique location. Hunting ground. During your unlock phase, a ready anarch you control can gain 1 blood, and, if you control a ready baron, another ready anarch you control can gain 1 blood as well. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground each turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Prince of Prague: Once results of a referendum are tallied, Carlak gains 1 blood for each Methuselah casting no votes in favor and 1 or more votes against the referendum. He gets 1 optional press each combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. After a vampire with capacity 3 or less goes to torpor, put 1 hostage counter on him. Hostages cannot be moved to the ready region or be diablerized. Lock during your master phase to add 1 blood to a ready vampire you control for each hostage in torpor. During any unlock phase, any ready vampire can burn 2 blood to burn any vampire's hostage counters. After this card leaves play, burn all hostage counters.

property.value: Ammo. Only usable before resolution of a gun's strike. Once each round of combat after the bearer strikes with this gun, the bearer gets 1 optional additional strike, only usable to strike with this gun. No more than one ammo card can be used on a gun each combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: (D) Give this card to another Methuselah and move an action card from that Methuselah's ash heap to this card. The chosen action costs the vampires controlled by that Methuselah 1 additional blood. Any vampire can move up to 4 blood from himself or herself to this card as a +1 stealth action. Burn this card if it has 4 or more blood. A Methuselah can have only one Cold Amber's Hold.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. [nec] Set the range for this round to long. [NEC] As above, with 1 optional press, only usable to end combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable by a vampire who has blocked a (D) action. Only usable in the resulting combat at long range. [tha] Strike: 2R damage, with 1 optional press. [vis] Strike: 4R damage. This strike cannot be dodged. [VIS] As [vis] above, with fast strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: [dem] Strike: send the opposing vampire to torpor. [DEM] As above, and that vampire does not unlock as normal during his or her next unlock phase.

property.name: Flavor
Draft
property.value: [Third] [obf]: Strike: opposing younger vampire goes into torpor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Weapon: gun. Strike: 3R damage, only usable once each round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable if an ally attempts to block. [dom] That attempt fails, that ally is locked and cannot attempt to block this action again. [DOM] As above, and put this card on the ally. The attached ally does not unlock as normal. Burn this card during his or her unlock phase.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [Third] Only useable when the action is announced. Allies cannot block this action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during a bleed action. [dom] +1 bleed (limited). [DOM] +1 bleed that does not count against the limit.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Camarilla vampire. Choose a ready prince. Successful referendum means the chosen prince loses his or her title.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. Lock during your minion phase to unlock a ready Daughter of Cacophony. Any titled vampire can call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action. [Burn Option]

property.name: Draft
property.value: [HttB] As above, and you may lock this card during a referendum to gain 2 votes.

property.name: Text
property.value: [dom] Lock X-1 allies or younger vampires. [DOM] As above, but one of the minions can be the same age or older.

property.name: Text
property.value: Location. Lock during your master phase to move equipment and/or blood between any two ready Sabbat vampires you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Location. Each Sabbat vampire you control gets +1 intercept during (D) actions against Sabbat vampires you control. A Methuselah can have only one Communal Haven: Temple.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No sooner is a temple built to God, but the Devil builds a chapel hard by. George Herbert

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires an Independent or Anarch vampire. (D) Burn a vampire who has diablerized a vampire of the same clan as this acting vampire since your last turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We're killed, so we kill in return. Endless repetition. Kazuaki Kiriya, "Casshern"

property.name: Draft
property.value: [LotN] Inflict 1 unpreventable damage on a vampire who had bleed you since your last turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [nec] Move an ally or retainer that has been burned from play since your last turn from your ash heap to your hand. [NEC] As above, but move it to your ready region (ignore requirements and cost) with life equal to their starting life. If it is a retainer, move it to the acting minion.

property.name: Text
property.value: [pot] Strike: hand strike at +2 damage. [thn] Strike: 2 aggravated damage. [THN] Strike: 3 aggravated damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He was screaming, and his face just shrunk in until it was nothing more than a skull mask. Max Lowell, Gangrel antitribu

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Look, d00d, those "D3mons33d 3lit3" hackers aren't kewl. They just can't spell... Synner-G, City Gangrel antitribu hacker

property.value: Brian Snoddy; Roger Raupp; Gary Chatterton; Roger Raupp

property.name: Text

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Imagination is the one weapon in the war against reality. Jules de Gaultier

property.name: Draft
property.value: [LotN] [chi] (D) Burn an equipment or a location

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. Equip with a non-unique weapon card from your hand (requirements and cost apply as normal). The weapon cannot cost 3 or more pool or inflict with a regular strike aggravated damage or 4 or more damage.

property.value: Jyhad:C, CE:C/PB/PTo, BH:PTo4, KMW:PAl3, LotN:PG2, KoT:C/PT2

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Put this card on this Daughter of Cacophony. During your unlock phase, burn this card to fill this vampire to full capacity with blood from the blood bank. [Burn Option]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We scored backstage passes and all that. I don't remember much after the show, but look! She signed my T-shirt! Seth Brewer, kine fan

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. This vampire can burn this card when he or she announces an action to make this action unblockable by vampires; if he or she does so, this vampire cannot play cards requiring Disciplines until that action is ended.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [ser] (D) Bleed. If more than 1 pool is bled with this action, ignore the excess. [dai] Requires an infernal vampire. Put this card on this vampire. This vampire treats aggravated damage as normal damage and gets +1 strength and -1 stealth. [DAI] As [dai] above, and this vampire gets flight [FLIGHT]. During your influence phase, this vampire can burn 1 blood to unlock.

card.name: Condemn the Sins of the Father

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [qui] (D) Choose a clan, and lock all younger vampires of the chosen clan. [QUI] As above, and each of those vampires burns 1 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Condemnation. [ser] (D) Lock a younger vampire. [dai] Requires an infernal vampire. (D) Put this card on a ready minion. Bleed actions cost the attached minion 1 additional blood. Burn all other Condemnations on this minion. [DAI] As [dai] above, and the attached minion's controller burns the top card of their library during their unlock phase.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: But the Brujah are not as disciplined. Betrayal swiftly shifts their focus. Sargon, Baali

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Condemnation. [obf] (D) Lock a younger vampire. [dai] Requires an infernal vampire. (D) Put this card on a ready minion. The attached minion gets -1 stealth. Burn all other Condemnations on this minion. [DAI] As [dai] above, and the attached minion's controller burns 1 pool each time the attached minion is blocked.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Condemnation. [pre] (D) Lock a younger vampire. [dai] Requires an infernal vampire. (D) Put this card on a ready minion. The attached minion gets -1 strength. Burn all other Condemnations on this minion. [DAI] As [dai] above, and the attached minion cannot press in combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The devil's strength is the weakness of humanity. And you Camarilla embrace that weakness. Giotto Verducci, Baali

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Condemnation. [chi] (D) Lock a younger vampire. [dai] Requires an infernal vampire. (D) Put this card on a ready vampire. The attached vampire gets -3 votes. Burn all other Condemnations on this minion. [DAI] As [dai] above, and the attached vampire burns 1 blood each time a referendum passes.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A thought unspoken is no less a thought. Parmenides, Assamite

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during a bleed action. [dom] +2 bleed (limited). [DOM] +3 bleed (limited).

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card on any Daughter of Cacophony. While this Daughter of Cacophony is unlocked or acting, each unlocked or acting Daughter of Cacophony gets +1 vote.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To and fro he hurried, clapped his hands, ran from one rope to the other, spurring on his six singers with mouth and hands, like the conductor of an orchestra urging highly trained musicians. Victor Hugo, "The Hunchback of Notre Dame"

property.name: Text
property.value: [pot] Strike: 2R damage. [dai] Strike: 1R aggravated damage. [DAI] Strike: 2R aggravated damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is our inexorable might -- the fist that lashes forth to breach the barriers between profane and celestial, and rises again and again to smite all unbelievers. High Priest Angra Mainyu, Baali

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during the polling step of a political action. Cancel the votes and ballots of a vampire of to the same clan as this minion.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during a bleed action. [dem] +1 bleed (limited). [DEM] +1 stealth and +1 bleed (limited).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Confusion is a word we have invented to explain an order which is not understood. Henry Miller

property.name: Text
property.value: [obf] Reduce a younger vampire's or an ally's bleed against you by 1. [OBF] Only usable during the polling step of a political action before votes and ballots are cast. The acting vampire cannot cast any votes or ballots in this referendum. If the referendum requires a titled vampire, the referendum fails.

property.name: Text
property.value: Archetype. Put this card on a vampire you control. After your prey loses pool when it is neither your turn nor your prey's turn, you can lock this card to add 1 blood to this vampire. A vampire can have only one archetype.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's all about being charming. We do a little lobbying, you know. It's in our mutual interest, a win-win situation, this sort of crap. Rake, Brujah

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined during the first round of combat. [ani] This vampire cannot use equipment this combat. During the press step of each round this combat, if any Methuselah has played a card earlier in the current round or during the 2 previous rounds, this vampire gets 1 press, only usable to continue combat. [ANI] As above, but the presses are optional.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gehenna. Requires at least 2 other Gehenna events in play. Do not replace until your next discard phase. During each Methuselah's unlock phase, that Methuselah can choose a location controlled by their prey. The chosen location is burned unless its controller burns 2 pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: More bombs? More fire? More accidents? What of the Masquerade? Federico di Padua, Nosferatu archon

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: While Conrad is acting, reaction cards cost younger vampires 1 additional blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Boon. Choose a clan. Successful referendum means each Methuselah gains 1 pool for each vampire of the chosen clan they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you deal with your brother, be pleasant, but get a witness. Hesiod, "Works and Days"

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:C, VTES:C, Sabbat:C, SW:PL/PV3, FN:PG/PS, CE:PTo3/PV2, BH:PTo4, LoB:PG2, Third:C/PB, SP:LB7

property.name: Draft
property.value: [Third] As above, but choose two clans.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose a clan. Successful referendum means all vampires of the chosen clan are locked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are those not of our blood who would seek to harm us. Such cretins must be punished! Helena Casimir, Ventrue

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable if this vampire is blocked, before combat (if any). [vis] The opposing minion takes 1 environmental damage during normal strike resolution each round at close range in the resulting combat. [VIS] Cancel the resulting combat and put this card in play; it becomes an ally with 2 life and 2 strength. This ally and the blocking minion enter combat. This ally gets 1 optional press during the combat. Burn this card after combat or if the combat is canceled.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires an archbishop, priscus, cardinal or regent. Put this card on a location you control. You can burn this card to have an action against the attached location fail.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A night of memories and of sighs I consecrate to thee. Walter Savage Landor, "Rose Aylmer"

property.name: Text
property.value: Allocate X points among two or more Methuselahs, where X is the number of Methuselahs in the game. Successful referendum means each Methuselah burns 1 pool for each point allocated.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:C, VTES:C, SW:C/PV4, FN:PG/PS, CE:PTo4/PV4, Anarchs:PAB2, LoB:PG5, Third:C

property.name: Text
property.value: [ser] (D) Steal 1 blood or life (becoming blood) from a ready minion. [SER] (D) Put this card on a ready minion. During the attached minion's unlock phase, he or she burns 1 blood or life. If he or she cannot, he or she goes to torpor. Burn this card if this acting minion is in combat or is about to leave the ready region. A minion can have only one Consignment to Duat.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires an anarch. Unique. Put this card in play with 1 counter. During your unlock phase, add 1 counter on this card. During each other Methuselah's unlock phase, he or she burns 1 pool or discards 1 card at random for each counter on this card (discard all cards before replacing). Any vampire can burn this card as a (D) action that costs 1 pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Prince of Rome: Constanza gets +2 bleed against a Methuselah who controls a ready Ventrue.

property.name: Text
property.value: [ACTION] +1 stealth action. (D) Enter combat with a wraith ally or burn a wraith retainer. [REACTION] Only usable when a minion or retainer would be burned by any means except diablerie. Usable during combat. Usable by a locked Nagaraja. Remove that minion or retainer from the game instead. This Nagaraja gains 1 blood if the minion was a vampire or gains X+1 blood, where X is the blood or pool cost of that ally or retainer. [Burn Option]

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires an infernal vampire. Unique. [dai] Put this card on this vampire. During each other Methuselah's unlock phase, he or she burns 1 pool if this vampire is ready. [DAI] As [dai] above, and once each combat, this vampire can strike: put 1 corruption counter on the opposing minion. If the number of your corruption counters on the minion equals or exceeds his or her capacity or cost, you can burn them to steal him or her after strike resolution (ending combat).

property.name: Text
property.value: Out-of-turn. Only usable if a minion you control is bleeding. Usable during your turn. Cancel a minion card that would change the target of the bleed as it is played, and its cost is not paid. If more than 1 pool is bled in this action, ignore the excess.

property.name: Text
property.value: Contract. Choose an Assamite, and put this card on a ready minion. The chosen Assamite can enter combat with that minion as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move 1 blood from each ready Pander you control to a Pander in your uncontrolled region.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: i'm sifting through the ashes of what i have become Nine Inch Nails, "Now I'm Nothing"

property.name: Text
property.value: Put 4 blood on this card. If this vampire is ready during your unlock phase, you can move 1 blood from this card to this vampire. Burn this card if it has no blood.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Get yourself a cooler, lay yourself low Coincidental murder, with nothing to show Aerosmith, "Same Old Song and Dance"

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable by an unlocked Blood Brother of the same circle as another Blood Brother you control involved in the current combat if the minion opposing the Blood Brother you control is still ready and when combat is about to end. [san] After this round, lock this Blood Brother. This Blood Brother and the opposing minion enter combat. The first round of combat, the opposing minion cannot play any strike cards. [SAN] As [san] above, and this Blood Brother gets 1 optional maneuver during the first round of combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Cornelius gets an additional +1 bleed against a Methuselah who controls a ready non-Camarilla vampire. +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Search your crypt for any Samedi, reveal them, and move them to your uncontrolled region with 1 blood (shuffle afterward).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Joseph Eldred -- died of a self-inflicted wound in his neck. Weapon not found. Seneca County, NY, Coroner's Inquest

property.name: Text
property.value: Trifle. Put this card on a Black Hand vampire. This vampire can lock this card to prevent 1 damage in combat or to gain 1 blood. This card does not unlock as normal. This vampire can burn 1 blood to unlock this card during his or her unlock phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Hunting ground. During your unlock phase, a ready vampire you control can gain 1 blood. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A room full of suits slaughtered by a pack of bloodsucking thieves? Sounds like poetic justice to me. Mitchell, The Headhunter, Pander

property.name: Text
property.value: Ghoul with 1 life. [vic] Whenever the employer blocks a (D) action, they get 1 optional maneuver during the first round of the resulting combat. [VIC] As above, and the employer gets +1 intercept against (D) actions.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ghoul with 1 life. This vampire can burn X blood to get +X intercept.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You who all things spurn And wound, when death shall come, Even the wolves will scorn Your cadaver, starved and numb. Paul Verlaine, "Grotesques"

property.name: Text
property.value: Ghoul with 1 life. 0 strength, 0 bleed. [vic] As this ally enters play, you can remove from the game any number of ally, retainer or vampire cards from your ash heap or hand. This ally gains 1 life for each card removed in that way. This ally gets +1 strength for each life it has. During your unlock phase, This ally burns 1 life. [VIC] As above, and the Construction has 1 additional life.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. (D) Put 1 corruption counter on a minion controlled by your prey. If the number of your corruption counters on the minion equals or exceeds his or her capacity or cost, you can burn them to steal him or her.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a prince, justicar, or Inner Circle member. Successful referendum means each Follower of Set burns 2 blood. Each Follower of Set with 0 blood then goes to torpor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose another ready unlocked vampire you control of the same sect as this vampire. These two vampires attempt to block, using the sum of their intercept to see if the block succeeds. If successful, both lock and then you choose one to be the blocking vampire (and the other ceases to be blocking).

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Seraph. Only usable if a minion attempts to block. If a Sabbat vampire is attempting to block, that attempt fails and that vampire cannot attempt to block this action again. Otherwise, the blocking minion gets -1 intercept. [Burn Option]

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Minions opposing Germaine in combat cannot use weapons. He can enter combat with a Toreador as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Germaine gets +2 bleed against a Methuselah who controls a titled non-Independent, non-Anarch vampire. Red List. [MERGED] Anarch: Germaine gets 1 optional press each combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: If Jocalo is ready after your predator or prey uses a discard phase action, you can look at that Methuselah's hand (after replacement, if any). +1 bleed. +1 hand size.

property.name: Discipline
property.value: dom pot pro ANI AUS VIC

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: After you replace a combat card Vladimir played, you can draw 1 additional card (discard down afterward). He gets +1 strength in combat with a werewolf. Flight [FLIGHT].

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: You can burn 1 pool to cancel a blood hunt called on Zaroff and move him to the uncontrolled region.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mortal with 1 life. 0 strength, 1 bleed. Courier gets -1 intercept against vampires. After a minion you control successfully bleeds, you can look at the top card of the library of the target Methuselah, and you can lock the Courier to burn that card.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [Third] As above, but the Courier has 0 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Trifle. Put this card in play. Lock to add 2 blood to a ready vampire you control. During your discard phase, your predator takes control of The Coven.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a non-Camarilla vampire with capacity 8 or more. Put this card in play. Any non-Camarilla vampire can enter combat with a Camarilla vampire as a (D) action. Any vampire can burn this card as a (D) action; Camarilla vampires get -1 stealth on that action.

property.name: Text
property.value: [REACTION] Reduce a bleed against you by 1. [REACTION] Only usable during the polling step of a political action. This Kiasyd gets +4 votes.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We are false and evanescent, and aware of our deceit, From the straw that is our vitals to the clay that is our feet. Edwin Arlington Robinson, "The False Gods"

property.name: Text
property.value: Do not replace until your discard phase. Play Rock-Paper-Scissors with another Methuselah. If you tie, you each discard 1 card at random. Otherwise, the loser discards his or her hand and draws a new hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Who cares what games we choose? Little to win, but nothing to lose. The Strawberry Alarm Clock, "Incense and Peppermints"

property.name: Text
property.value: [tha] Maneuver, only usable to go to long range. [vis] Maneuver or press. [VIS] Only usable before range is determined. The opposing minion takes 1R environmental damage each round this combat during the press step. A vampire can play only one Crawling Chamber at superior each combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a non-sterile vampire. Put this card in play. It becomes a 2-capacity slave Gargoyle of the same sect enslaved to the acting vampire's clan with basic Visceratika [vis] and flight [FLIGHT], and cannot act this turn. You can search your library (shuffle afterward), hand, and/or ash heap for a master discipline card and put it on this Gargoyle. Move up to 3 blood from the acting vampire to this Gargoyle.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a non-sterile archbishop, priscus, cardinal or regent. Put this card in play. It becomes a 1-capacity non-unique vampire of the same clan as the acting vampire, and cannot act this turn. You can search your library (shuffle afterward), hand, and/or ash heap for a master discipline card and put it on this new vampire. Move up to 1 blood from the acting vampire to this new vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Archetype. Trifle. Put this card on a Sabbat vampire you control. Once each turn, after a minion opposing this vampire in combat strikes: dodge, or strikes: combat ends, this vampire gains 1 blood. A vampire can have only one archetype.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beware Of entrance to a quarrel; but being in, Bear't that the opposed may beware of thee. William Shakespeare, "Hamlet", act I, scene 3

property.name: Text
property.value: [thn] Strike: hand strike, and put this card on the opposing minion; you still control this card. As this striking vampire announces an action, you can burn this card to prevent the attached minion from blocking. A minion can have only one Creeping Infection. [THN] As [thn] above, and this striking vampire gets +1 bleed against the attached minion's controller.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock as a vampire you control announces an undirected action to give that vampire +1 stealth, even if stealth is not yet needed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock during your unlock phase to burn a vampire in torpor with no blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an anarch. Only usable after resolution of a successful action requiring an anarch or making this vampire Anarch. [pro] Unlock this anarch. [qui] Unlock another ready anarch. [tha] Put this card in play. During your minion phase, you can burn 1 pool to unlock a ready anarch you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable when this vampire is about to diablerized. Usable by a locked vampire. Usable by a vampire in torpor. [ani] The diablerie is canceled and the diablerist burns 1 blood. [ANI] Burn both the diablerist and this vampire. (The diablerie is still considered successful.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: O dearly bought revenge, yet glorious! Milton, "Samson Agonistes"

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique melee weapon. Strike: strength+X+1 damage, where X is the number of soul counters on this card. After this weapon successfully inflicts damage on an opposing minion in combat, add 1 soul counter to it at the end of that round. Burn all soul counters from this card if another minion takes control of it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Cristos can search your library for an equipment card, reveal it, and move it to your hand as a +1 stealth action (shuffle and discard down afterward).

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock after resolution of a successful (D) action against you to inflict 1 environmental damage on the acting minion.

property.name: Flavor

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable if an ally or a younger vampire attempts to block. [aus] That attempt fails and the blocking minion's controller cannot attempt to block this action again. The blocking minion can burn 1 blood or life to cancel this card as it is played. [AUS] As above, but canceling this card requires 1 additional blood or life.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique melee weapon. Only usable by a minion with True Faith or an imbued. Strike: strength+1 aggravated damage. Vampires opposing the bearer with True Faith or this imbued cannot maneuver to close range.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla primogen: Once each combat, Crusher can burn 1 blood to strike: dodge. +1 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique werewolf with 3 life. 2 strength, 0 bleed. Requires an anarch. If the action to recruit this ally is blocked, the acting anarch goes to torpor. Cry Wolf gets 1 optional press each combat. He must enter combat with a minion as a (D) action. He does not unlock as normal. If he is locked during your unlock phase, burn him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique mortal with 3 life. Requires an anarch. If this anarch is blocked, he or she can burn 1 life from Crypt's Sons to cancel combat and continue the action as if unblocked. Crypt's Sons inflict 1R damage on the opposing minion each round of combat during normal strike resolution.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [tha] (D) Burn 1 blood (or life) from any vampire, ally or retainer. [THA] As above, and gain 1 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable after resolution of a political action whose referendum passed. The next referendum a vampire you control calls this turn passes automatically (skip the polling step).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I am Your slave, and You will reward me, for I shall be faithful. Bram Stoker, "Dracula"

property.name: Draft
property.value: [Third] The next referendum a vampire you control calls before the end of your next turn passes automatically.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. (D) Look at another Methuselah's hand, discard all ally or retainer cards from it, and gain 1 blood for each card discarded this way.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card in play. Each Ventrue must burn 1 blood during his or her unlock phase or become locked. Any vampire can burn this card as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Text
Text
property.value: Archetype. Trifle. Put this card on a vampire you control. During your prey's unlock phase, you can choose a minion controlled by your prey. If the chosen minion is blocked this turn, you can lock this card to add 1 blood to this vampire. A vampire can have only one archetype.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play under the control of any Methuselah. The controller of this card burns 1 pool during his or her unlock phase. After a new Methuselah gets the Edge, the controller of this card gives control of it to any Methuselah.

property.name: Discipline
property.value: ANI DAI OBF PRE SER THA

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: If Cybele is unlocked at the start of your master phase, you get +1 master phase action. She can bleed with +2 bleed as (D) action that costs 1 blood. Infernal.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Cynthia gets +1 strength in combat with a Camarilla vampire. Sterile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: While Cyscek is ready, you get the Edge after any Methuselah plays a Gehenna event, and that Methuselah burns 1 pool. +1 stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ghoul with 2 life. This Baali gets +1 bleed. [Burn Option]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ghouls are used as both researchers and subjects. They are also essential for certain rites that require something other than blood but cannot be left to the uninitiated. Azaneal, Baali

property.name: Text
property.value: Archetype. Trifle. Put this card on a vampire you control. Once each turn, this vampire can gain 1 blood or burn 1 blood to unlock after performing an action (successful or not) during which they used 3 or more Disciplines to play cards. A vampire can have only one archetype.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable if a minion controlled by another Methuselah has been burned since your last turn. [nec] Move that minion from his owner's ash heap to your ready region with 1 blood or life, and lock them. [NEC] As above, but do not lock the minion.

property.name: Text
property.value: Melee weapon. You can put a second Dagger from your hand or ash heap on this minion after they equip this Dagger from your hand. Damage inflicted on a Kiasyd by this weapon is aggravated. Strike: strength+1 damage. Alternatively, ranged strike: strength damage and, after strike resolution, put this weapon out of play until the end of the action. Burn this weapon if any damage from it is prevented.

property.name: Text
property.value: A vampire can play only one Dagon's Call each combat. [qui] Strike: hand strike, and the opposing minion takes 1 unpreventable environmental damage during the press step each round this combat (only effective if this strike was made at close range). [QUI] As above, and this hand strike is at +1 damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Power is not revealed by striking hard or striking often, but by striking true. Honore de Balzac

property.name: Text
property.value: Anarch: After Daliah enters combat, she gains 1 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Frenzy. Only usable before range is determined. A vampire can play only one Dam the Heart's River each combat. [qui] This combat, each strike or damaging effect made against the opposing minion inflicts +1 damage. [QUI] As above, and this combat, strikes cost the opposing minion 1 additional blood or life, and the opposing minion can choose not to strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: If Damaskenos becomes the Prince of Cairo, each ready Follower of Set burns 1 blood. If he becomes the Malkavian Justicar, each ready Follower of Set burns 2 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card on a vampire with capacity 4 or less. This vampire burns 1 blood after bleeding successfully.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Beast I am lest the Beast I become!

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Dan can search your library for a Giant's Blood, reveal it, and move it to your hand as an action (shuffle and discard down afterward).

property.name: Text
property.value: Anarch. [MERGED] While Dancin' Dana is in combat, you get +1 hand size.

property.value: Independent. 1 vote (titled): If Danielle is ready and has no blood during your unlock phase, she gains 2 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose a ready Sabbat vampire you control. Once this turn, the chosen Sabbat vampire can burn 1 blood to unlock after performing a successful action.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like everyone, your fate is inescapable. The wise man looks to meet his fate head-on. Chi, Ghoul

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Danylo can search your library for a location, reveal it, and move it to your hand as an action that costs 1 pool (shuffle and discard down afterward). Kiev circle. Sterile.

property.name: Text
property.value: [for] Vampires cannot block this action. This vampire takes 2 unpreventable environmental aggravated damage after action resolution. [FOR] As above, but this vampire takes 1 unpreventable environmental aggravated damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Darius can look at 1 random card from another Methuselah's hand as a (D) action; if it is an equipment or retainer card, put it on Darius (ignore requirements and cost).

property.name: Text
property.value: Out-of-turn. Cancel a minion card as it is played, its cost is not paid, and put this card in play. That card cannot be played again this turn. The next card played that would cancel another Methuselah's minion card as it is played is canceled, its cost is not paid, and this card is burned instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a vampire with capacity 8 or more. Gain 2 pool.

property.value: Sabbat cardinal: Selina gets +1 stealth on political actions.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. A minion can play only one Dark Steel each combat. [obt][pot] The opposing minion takes 1 environmental damage each round of combat during normal strike resolution at close range. This vampire gets an optional maneuver this round, only usable to go to close range. [OBT][POT] As above, but for 2 environmental damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: [obt] Press, only usable to end combat. [myt] Maneuver or press. [MYT] Only usable if the opposing minion attempts to strike with a weapon that inflicts ranged damage. That weapon inflicts no damage. The opposing minion takes 1R environmental damage during normal strike resolution.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. A minion can play only one Darkness Within each combat. [obt] Put this card in play. Move 1 blood or life from the opposing minion to this card even at long range each round this combat during normal strike resolution. After combat ends, move half the blood rounded up on this card to this vampire and burn this card. [OBT] As above, with 1 optional maneuver.

property.name: Text
property.value: [obt] +1 intercept. [OBT] As above, and if this vampire blocks, put this card on the acting minion. The attached minion gets -1 stealth on bleed actions against this reacting vampire's controller. Any minion can burn this card as a +1 stealth action.

property.value: [nec] Strike: hand strike at +1 damage. [NEC] As above, and the damage from this strike cannot be prevented by cards requiring Fortitude [for].

property.value: Requires a vampire with capacity 6 or more. Only usable before strikes are chosen. Do not replace until after combat. [pot] Discard up to four cards. This vampire gets +1 strength this combat for each card discarded this way. Do not replace these cards until after combat. [POT] As above, but this vampire gets +2 strength this combat for each card discarded this way.

property.value: Independent: Dedefra gets +1 strength in combat with a Camarilla vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I'll pick up your hand and slowly blow your little mind When you've made your mind up forever to be mine. Donovan, "Sunshine Superman"

property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a Seraph. Unique. (D) Put this card on a ready younger vampire; you still control this card. During your unlock phase, you can look at the attached vampire's controller's hand. He or she can burn this card as a (D) action. [Burn Option]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Treason doth never prosper: what's the reason? Why, if it prosper, none dare call it treason.

property.value: [ani] (D) Bleed with +1 bleed. [ANI] Frenzy. (D) Enter combat with and lock a vampire. That vampire is considered the acting minion in that combat.

property.value: +1 stealth action. Put this card on a slave Gargoyle with capacity 5 or more. The attached Gargoyle gets +2 intercept against (D) actions. A Gargoyle can have only one Defender of the Haven.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This is my master's house, and she does not receive visitors unannounced. You do not look like you have business here, so best be on your way. Pugfar, slave Gargoyle

property.name: Text

During your master phase, you can reveal a non-location equipment card from your hand and put it face down on the Delivery Truck if it does not already have one (you can look at the card at any time). Any minion you control can equip that card (face up) as a +1 stealth action (requirements and cost apply as normal). A minion can have only one vehicle.

property.name: Text

property.value: Camarilla Ventrue Justicar: While Democritus is ready, any Methuselah contesting a card with you burns 1 additional pool to avoid yielding that card. +1 bleed.

property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. Lock during the polling step of a political action to cancel the votes and ballots of any vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: [dom][for] Cancel an action card requiring Presence [pre] as it is played by a younger vampire, and its cost is not paid. (Do not lock the acting vampire). That vampire cannot take the same action again this turn. [DOM][FOR] Cancel an action modifier or combat card requiring Presence [pre] as it is played by a younger vampire, and its cost is not paid.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What we believe is, in the end, of little consequence. The only consequence is what we do. John Ruskin

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an archbishop, cardinal or regent. Choose one or more Methuselahs who has no target counter. Successful referendum means each chosen Methuselah gets 1 target counter. During their unlock phase, a Methuselah with a target counter chooses a ready minion they control, who takes 2 unpreventable environmental damage. A Methuselah can burn the Edge to burn his or her target counter.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card on a ready vampire you control. This vampire gets +1 strength and +1 stealth on diablerie actions. He or she cannot recruit allies or employ retainers.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. (D) Put this card on a younger vampire. The attached vampire is considered the same clan as this acting vampire. The attached vampire does not unlock as normal. During his or her unlock phase, he or she can burn 1 blood to unlock. The attached vampire can move this card to another vampire as a (D) action. This card cannot be put on a Malkavian or Malkavian antitribu.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: While DeSalle is acting, a Sabbat vampire can burn 1 blood to get +1 intercept once that action. +1 stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [obt] Put this vampire and any cards and counters on them out of play (breaking any temporary control effects) and put this card in play. During your influence phase, this vampire can gain 2 blood, and you can choose to burn this card to return the vampire to play (in the same region as they were before), locked. [OBT] As above, but the vampire is unlocked when he or she returns to play.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mike raised a pistol that, from Beckett's angle, appeared to be roughly the size of a howitzer.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Put this card with 1 counter on it on this Ishtarri. This Ishtarri gets +X bleed, where X is the number of counters on this card. This Ishtarri can add 1 counter to this card as a +1 stealth action that costs X blood.

property.value: [EK] Put this card on this Laibon and unlock him or her. This card counts as an Aye and Orun, even when not in play.

property.value: +1 stealth action. (D) Choose any minion. The chosen minion cannot block Nosferatu this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dull and malevolent, And odious, they seem, With shades of twilight blended, Part of an evil dream... D.H. Lawrence, "Elysium"
