property.value: Put this card on any Lasombra. This vampire cannot cast votes or ballots and does not unlock as normal. During his or her unlock phase, this vampire can burn 1 blood to unlock. This vampire can burn this card as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable if either a monster controlled by your predator is bleeding you and there are 3 or more Methuselahs left in the game, after blocks are declined, or if a monster plays an action card. Lock this imbued. Either change the target of the bleed to your predator's predator (that Methuselah can attempt to block), or cancel that action card as it is played, its cost is not paid, and the monster does not lock and cannot play the same action card again this turn.

property.value: When you are an anvil, be patient; when a hammer, strike. Deviki Prasanta, Assamite ghoul

property.value: Only one Dia de los Muertos can be played in a game. The first referendum a Sabbat vampire you control calls on this turn passes automatically (skip the polling step).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We play very dangerous games with life and no one knows our rules. Parke Goodwin

property.value: [aus] Reduce a bleed against you by 1. [dai] Requires an infernal vampire. Only usable if this vampire blocks. Put 4 pact counters on the acting minion. If the number of pact counters equals or exceeds his or her capacity or cost, burn them to make him or her infernal. [DAI] As [dai] above, and the acting minion's controller burns 1 pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Out-of-turn. Only usable when control of a vampire you control would change or when a vampire you control is about to enter combat. Control of that vampire does not change, and that vampire gains 1 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Diego can burn a location as a (D) action that costs 2 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during an undirected action as the action is announced. Equipment and conviction cards cannot grant intercept this action (any intercept they grant is lost). Reaction cards and effects (such as powers) granting intercept for this action cost 1 additional blood or life.

property.name: Text
property.value: Out-of-turn. Cancel a minion card as it is played, and its cost is not paid. (If it was an action card, the acting minion does not lock. If it was a strike card, the minion chooses another strike.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Titled vampires get +1 intercept against Dirk.

property.name: Text
property.value: Contract. Choose any Samedi, and put this card on any minion. The chosen Samedi can enter combat with this minion as a +1 stealth (D) action. This card cannot be put on a Nosferatu or a Giovanni. [Burn Option]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When it comes time for business, however, Samedi are more than happy to get their hands dirty.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable after a successful bleed. For each pool this Nosferatu antitribu bleeds from the target Methuselah, burn 1 card from the top of that Methuselah's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's something addictive about a secret. J. Edgar Hoover

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. Once each action, when a Giovanni you control is about to bleed your prey successfully, you can remove seven cards in your ash heap from the game to give that action +1 bleed.

property.name: Text

property.value: Not usable during the first round of combat. [tha] Strike: 2R damage, and this vampire can burn X blood to inflict X additional ranged damage this strike. [THA] As above, but for 4R + X ranged damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: [for] [COMBAT] Prevent 1 non-aggravated damage. [for][obf] [COMBAT] This vampire treats all aggravated damage as normal damage this combat. [FOR][obf] [ACTION] +1 stealth action. Put this card on this vampire. In combat, this vampire treats aggravated damage as normal damage. Burn this card if this vampire is in torpor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Animal with 3 life. Requires a Laibon. Elephant Guardian inflicts 2 damage on the opposing minion each round of combat with an acting minion during normal strike resolution at close range. A minion can have only one Elephant Guardian.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The one who follows an elephant will have no problems. Ghana proverb

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Elihu inflicts +2 damage with melee weapons. His strikes with melee weapons cannot be dodged. Infernal.

property.name: Discipline
property.value: pro AUS DEM DOM FOR OBF

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Elimelech strikes with fast strike. Black Hand. Seraph. +1 bleed. +1 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla primogen: Elisabetta gets +1 bleed against a Methuselah who controls a ready Follower of Set.

property.name: Text
property.value: Weapon. Requires an anarch. Ranged strike: burn 1 blood from the opposing vampire and he or she gets -1 capacity (to a minimum of 1) until that vampire's controller uses a master phase action to lock that vampire. Burn this weapon after use.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Hesha Ruhadze cannot block Elizabeth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat bishop: Ellen can enter combat with a locked minion controlled by your predator or prey as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla primogen: Princes cannot block Ellison. During the polling step of any referendum, he can burn 1 blood to force a ready prince to cast votes and ballots as you wish. This can change the prince's votes and ballots.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable by a locked vampire. This vampire unlocks and attempts to block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tis now the very witching time of night, When churchyards yawn and hell itself breathes out Contagion to this world: now could I drink hot blood, And do such bitter business as the day Would quake to look on. William Shakespeare, "Hamlet", act III, scene 2

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock to give a Lasombra you control +1 stealth.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: And oh, if there be an Elysium on Earth, It is this, it is this! Thomas Moore, "The Light of the Harem"

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. If a vampire you control blocks a Camarilla vampire, you can lock this card instead of locking the blocking vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Don't invite people you don't want to attend.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock before range is determined to end combat involving a Camarilla vampire you control and another Camarilla vampire. Any Camarilla vampire can call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Go to Elysium to rinse yourself of the filth of war. There, none shall lay the hand of violence upon you lest they wish to know the wrath of the prince. Sebastian Marley, Nosferatu

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock during the polling step of a political action to give each ready titled Camarilla vampire you control +1 vote.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dave Roach; Pete Burges; Avery Butterworth

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a non-sterile vampire. Put this card in play. It becomes a 1-capacity non-unique vampire of the same clan and sect as the acting vampire, and must hunt this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Wraith with 2 life. 2 strength, 1 bleed. During your unlock phase, you can remove 7 cards in your ash heap from the game to move an Emerald Legionnaire from your ash heap to the ready region with 2 life.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a Seraph. Unique. Put this card on this Seraph. During political actions, this Seraph gets +1 vote for each Gehenna event in play. If there are no Gehenna events in play, burn this card. [Burn Option]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is said that the Black Hand had to remove several Sabbat elders for the good of the sect. Fatima al-Faqadi, Assamite

property.name: Text
property.value: Out-of-turn. Burn 1 pool to cancel a Gehenna event card as it is played. Alternatively, if there are at least 2 Gehenna events in play, you can play this card during your minion phase to unlock a vampire with capacity 8 or more.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The duty of the living is to live. Nothing more, even for those of us whose lives are somewhat unnatural. I cannot speak to the duties of the dead. Eugenio Estevez, Tremere

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Remove a mortal (ally or retainer) in any Methuselah's ash heap from the game to put this card on this Nagaraja. During your unlock phase, you can burn this card to fill this ready Nagaraja to full capacity with blood from the blood bank. A vampire can have only one Emergency Rations.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla primogen: During your discard phase, Emily can burn the Edge to unlock.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Baron. Only usable during the polling step of a political action before votes and ballots are cast. Lock a ready anarch you control to give them +3 votes. Any Camarilla vampire older than that anarch can lock to cancel that anarch's votes and ballots.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: But we can think new thoughts, dream of new forms of rule. It is time to turn the tables, to teach the old to be young again. Salvador Garcia, Brujah anarch

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during a bleed action by a ready unlocked vampire other than the acting minion. [dom] The acting minion gets +1 bleed (limited). [DOM] As above, but usable by a ready locked vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Prince of Cordoba: Blood cursed.

property.name: Text
property.value: [pre] (D) Bleed with +1 bleed. [PRE] +1 stealth action. Add 2 blood to a younger vampire in your uncontrolled region.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I saw pale kings, and princes too, Pale warriors, death-pale were they all; They cried, "La belle dame sans merci Thee hath in thrall!" John Keats, "La Belle Dame Sans Merci"

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:C, VTES:C, SW:PB3, FN:PS3, CE:C/PB5/PTo2, Anarchs:PAB3, KMW:PAn3, LoB:PI5, Third:C, SP:LB6

property.name: Draft
property.value: [Third] Do not replace until the end of this action. (D) Bleed at +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. This Malkavian antitribu gets +1 bleed and +1 stealth when bleeding.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You left behind a broken doll. Clifford Harris, "A Broken Doll"

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Put this card on this Osebo. This Osebo gets +1 strength. A minion can have only one Enforcer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fire can soften iron. Nkundo-Mongo proverb

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [for] Gain 2 blood. [spi] As [for] above, and unlock this vampire at the end of the turn. [SPI] This vampire gains 2 blood and unlocks.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Perhaps to our senses things offer only their rejections. Perfume is what the flowers throw away. Paul Valery

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:C, VTES:C, Sabbat:C, SW:PT2/PV3, CE:C/PM/PTo/PTr3, Anarchs:PAG, BH:PM4/PTr4, KMW:PAl3, Third:C/PTr3/PTz5, HttB:PSal3, SP:DoF4/PwN2

property.name: Artist
property.value: Amy Weber; Phillip Tan; Bob Stevlic

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: If Edith Blount is in your ready region, she can burn 1 blood to give Enid +1 stealth.

property.name: Discipline
property.value: for ANI CEL OBF POT PRO

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Enkidu can enter combat with a minion as a (D) action. After he successfully performs an action to employ a retainer, unlock him during the discard phase. He cannot have or use equipment. Red List. +2 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Requires a vampire with capacity 10 or more. Only usable after resolution of a successful bleed against your prey. Put this card on this vampire. This vampire gets +1 bleed. During any Methuselah's minion phase, this vampire can lock this card to take an action.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Marian Churchland; Gines Quinonero; Marian Churchland

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock to get +1 hand size this turn. Lock during your influence phase to get +1 transfer.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Frenzy. [pre] Put this card on a vampire you control. The attached vampire gets +1 strength and can enter combat with a minion as a (D) action. Burn this card at the end of this turn. [PRE] (D) Put this card on any vampire. The attached vampire must burn 2 blood to take any action except hunts and actions to enter combat. Burn this card after resolution of the attached vampire's action.

property.name: Text
property.value: [vis] [ACTION] +1 stealth action. Put this card on a location and unlock this vampire. While this vampire is ready, their controller can burn this card during a (D) action against the attached location to have the action fail, and the acting minion and this vampire enter combat. [VIS] [REACTION] Only usable during a (D) action against any location. This vampire unlocks, the action fails, and the acting minion and this vampire enter combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during a bleed action. +X bleed (limited), where X is the number of ready unlocked Daughters of Cacophony you control. Lock all ready Daughters of Cacophony you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires the Edge. [ser] (D) Burn the Edge to have your prey burn 2 pool. Your minions cannot bleed until the end of the turn. [SER] As above, but your prey burns 3 pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: [obt] Strike: burn the opposing ally. [OBT] Strike: send the opposing vampire to torpor.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The womb shall forget him; the worm shall feed sweetly on him; he shall be no more remembered. Job 24:20 (KJV)

property.name: Text
property.value: [pre] (D) Bleed with +1 bleed. [PRE] (D) +1 stealth action. Steal an ally controlled by another Methuselah.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your perfume disconcerts me And in your opalescence I see the full heavens of yore As through an open door. Raoul Ponchon, "L'Absinthe"

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:R, VTES:R, CE:R, LoB:PI, KoT:PT, SP:LB3

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. If this vampire has 4 or more blood, he or she gains 4 blood.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rather than a time of peace it was truly a time of preparation; it was peaceful only because the sword had grown dull and the lance was broken. Once reforged it would begin again. Anonymous Malkavian, Das Buch von der Grabkrieg

card.name: Enzo Giovanni, Pentex Board of Directors

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Enzo can attempt to block any political action attempted by any Methuselah. He gets +1 intercept against political actions not attempted by a prince, justicar, or Inner Circle member.

card.name: Enzo Giovanni, Pentex Board of Directors (ADV)

property.name: Discipline
property.value: ani pre tha DOM NEC POT

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: During the polling step of any political action, Enzo can burn 1 blood to get +4 votes against the referendum. [MERGED] If a referendum fails, your prey burns 1 pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card on a Ventrue with capacity 8 or more. This Ventrue gets +1 intercept and +1 vote. This Ventrue can force any vampire to yield a contested title as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Prince of New York: You can move an action card Epikasta played from your ash heap to your library after resolution (shuffle afterward).

property.name: Text
property.value: +2 stealth action. Requires an unmerged base vampire. Unlock this vampire, search your crypt (shuffle afterward), uncontrolled region, and/or ash heap for their advanced version, and merge them with it.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [SoC] Gain 2 pool. Usable by any vampire (base, advanced or merged)

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. Lock this card to move a library card from your prey's ash heap to this card, face down (you can look at the card at any time). You can play the card from the Fragments as if from your hand. When that card would be burned, remove it from the game instead. Only 1 card can be on this card at a time. Any vampire with capacity 5 or more can steal the Fragments (and any card on it) as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Wraiths (allies and retainers) cost Erebus 1 fewer blood or pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. This Harbinger of Skulls gets +1 stealth. [Burn Option]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where wilt thou find a cavern dark enough To mask thy monstrous visage? William Shakespeare, "Julius Caesar", act II, scene 1

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat bishop: If Eric is in torpor during another Methuselah's discard phase, he can burn the Edge to move to your ready region.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Mages (allies and retainers) cost Erichtho 1 fewer blood or pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Imbued: After Erick successfully performs an action to enter combat with a monster, he can gain one conviction from your hand or ash heap before combat (if any).

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Erinyi gets -1 strength in combat with a Gangrel antitribu. Flight [FLIGHT].

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: As Erlik enters play, you can distribute up to 5 blood from him to any of your uncontrolled Harbingers of Skulls. +1 bleed. +1 hand size.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [qui] (D) Put this card on a minion controlled by another Methuselah. The attached minion gets a strength of 0 and cannot use melee weapons. He or she can burn this card as a +1 stealth action. [QUI] As above, but the action to burn this card does not get +1 stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable at long range. Not usable the first round of combat. [qui] Strike: 2R aggravated damage. [QUI] As above, and this vampire can burn X blood and randomly discard X cards to inflict X additional non-aggravated damage this strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: As Esau announces a bleed action, he can burn 1 blood to flip a coin; if it is heads, he gets an additional +1 bleed for that action. +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a Sabbat vampire. Add 2 blood to an unlocked Sabbat vampire, or add 1 blood to each of two unlocked Sabbat vampires.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mortal with 1 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed. This ally can strike: hand strike at +1 damage, aggravated; burn him at the end of combat if this strike has resolved. This ally can enter combat with a minion as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Trifle. Put this card in play. Lock during the polling step of a political action to give a vampire with capacity 7 or more +3 votes. During your discard phase, your predator takes control of Esgrima.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Regular social interaction also serves a more fundamental function: survival. Whether a Kindred likes it or not, he is eventually drawn into the games of more experienced Kindred, and rarely is that a good thing. Nicholas Cardiff, ghoul

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Unique. [pot][pre] Put this card in play and unlock this vampire. Minions you control get +1 strength. Burn this card during your unlock phase. [POT][PRE] As above, and you can burn this card to cancel an action card requiring Dementation [dem], Dominate [dom] or Presence [pre] that would target you (or a card you control) as it is played.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable after resolution of a successful (D) action against the Methuselah with the Edge. You gain the Edge.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: MacEllen's work tonight had been brutal if uninspired. It wouldn't win him much recognition from those higher up, but on the other hand it was damn difficult to argue with success. Talley, The Hound, Lasombra

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [ser] (D) Bleed with +1 bleed. [SER] Put this card on this vampire and move a unique vampire from any ash heap to your ready region with any amount of blood from this acting vampire. This minion cannot act, block, play reaction cards or cast votes or ballots. You can burn this card and the chosen vampire during any unlock phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires an archbishop, priscus, cardinal or regent. Put this card on this vampire. During an action, this Sabbat vampire can burn 1 blood to unlock and attempt to block. Burn this card if this vampire is in torpor.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I look forward to observing. You must forgive me, however, if I abandon this seat of honor and instead take up my duties. Talley, The Hound, Lasombra

property.name: Text
property.value: Gain 5 pool if you have a ready Follower of Set, or add 5 blood to a Follower of Set with capacity 9 or more in your uncontrolled region.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [LotN] Move 5 blood to any vampire in your uncontrolled region.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat Archbishop of Toronto: Ethan can steal a master discipline card from another vampire if he does not already possess the superior level of that Discipline as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Other Methuselahs' actions against Etienne cost 1 additional blood. Damage from Etienne's hand strikes is aggravated in combat with a Baali or Follower of Set.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Tremere Inner Circle: Etrius can steal up to 3 blood from any Tremere as a +1 stealth (D) action. +2 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla primogen: Once each combat, Eugene can strike: dodge.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Eurayle can unlock any minion as an action. If you control the minion, this is a +2 stealth action. Scarce.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do not replace until your unlock phase. [mal] [COMBAT] Cancel a strike card played by the opposing minion as it is played, and its cost is not paid. The opposing minion cannot choose another strike and gets no strike instead. [mal] is not a Discipline. [MAL] [REACTION] Cancel an action card as it is played and lock the acting minion. [Burn Option]

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Evil Jensen can search your crypt for any vampire and move them to your uncontrolled region as a +1 stealth action that costs 2 pool (shuffle afterward). She must burn 1 blood to attempt to block older vampires.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [nec] Put this card on this vampire. This vampire gets +1 stealth. He or she inflicts no damage in combat, and he or she is immune to non-aggravated damage. This vampire cannot gain blood (any blood he or she would gain goes to the blood bank instead). During your master phase, this vampire burns 1 blood or is burned. You can burn this card during your unlock phase. [NEC] As above, but you can burn this card during any Methuselah's unlock phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Laibon with no blood. Only usable when this vampire is about to hunt successfully. This Laibon gets +2 hunt.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I simply can't feed solely on animals. I need human contact. Honorine Ateba, Ishtarri

property.name: Text
property.value: Successful referendum means each Methuselah gains 1 pool for each ready Independent or Anarch vampire he or she controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We are becoming perfect in our desperation, our hostility, our instinct to survive. We are the cockroaches of vampire society, scurrying in the shadows of our hunters and feeding in their ruin. Kemintiri, Follower of Set

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Sabbat vampire. Choose a ready archbishop. Successful referendum means the chosen archbishop loses his or her title.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [pre] (D) Unlock this vampire and lock an ally or younger vampire. [PRE] (D) Lock X Orun on this vampire to send a vampire or imbued with capacity or cost 2X or less to his or her owner's uncontrolled region.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an imbued with five conviction [5 CONVICTION]. Only usable before range is determined during the first round of combat. If 2 consecutive rounds of combat occur at close range and this imbued remains ready, this imbued burns five conviction [5 CONVICTION] during the press step of that second round to burn himself or herself and the opposing monster. Otherwise, this imbued burns one conviction [1 CONVICTION] after combat ends.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable if this vampire blocks, after combat (if any). Usable by a locked vampire. [ser] Put this card on the acting minion. The attached minion burns 1 additional blood to unlock during his or her unlock phase. A Methuselah can burn the Edge to burn all Extortion cards he or she has. [SER] Put this card in play under the control of the acting minion's controller. The controller of this card burns 1 pool during his or her unlock phase. He or she can burn the Edge to burn all Extortion cards he or she has.

property.name: Text
property.value: Out-of-turn. Boon. Only usable if you are about to be ousted. Other Methuselahs can bid pool to keep you in the game. If one does, put this card in play. The high bidder can use a master phase action to steal up to 2 pool from you. During your master phase, you can give that Methuselah 6 pool to burn this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable at long range. [qui] Strike: 1R unpreventable damage. [QUI] Strike: 2R unpreventable damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the name of the Eldest, I reclaim that which is rightfully his. Ur-Shulgi

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. The bearer gets +1 bleed and +1 strength. The bearer can enter combat with a minion as a (D) action. This vampire gets superior Potence [POT] and superior Chimerstry [CHI], and combat cards cost this vampire 1 fewer blood. While the bearer is ready, this equipment cannot be moved or stolen. If this equipment is burned, it inflicts 5 unpreventable environmental damage on the bearer. During your unlock phase, burn 1 pool or burn this equipment.

property.name: Text
property.value: [aus][val] Strike: 2R aggravated damage on all vampires, demons (allies and retainers) in combat. If this striking vampire is burned during the resolution of this strike, you gain 2 pool. [AUS][VAL] As above, but the damage inflicted on this striking vampire is normal, not aggravated.

property.name: Text
property.value: [aus] Only usable during a (D) action against you (or a card you control). +2 intercept. [AUS] Only usable by a locked vampire. This vampire wakes (they ignore the requirement to be unlocked for playing reaction cards and attempting to block until the end of the action).

property.name: Text
property.value: Do not replace until your unlock phase. [aus][cel] Strike: dodge, and this vampire can prevent 1 damage from a retainer. [AUS][CEL] Only usable before range is determined. This round, this vampire cannot strike, and strikes and damage from retainers have no effect on this vampire and any non-retainers on him or her.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during a bleed action. [dem] +1 bleed (limited). [DEM] +2 bleed (limited).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We live in a rainbow of chaos. Paul Cezanne

property.value: Sabbat:C, SW:C, CE:C/PM4, BH:PM4, Third:PM5, KoT:C/PM6

property.value: [pro] +1 intercept, and put this card on this vampire. This vampire gets -1 stealth. Burn this card during your discard phase. [PRO] As above, with 1 optional maneuver during the first round of the resulting combat whenever this vampire blocks.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during a diablerie action against a vampire you control. [nec] +1 intercept. [NEC] +2 intercept.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Above all else I loved her eyes, More clear than stars of any skies, Those eyes maliciously wise. D.H. Lawrence, "Elysium"

property.name: Text
property.value: [obt] +1 intercept. [OBT] As above, with 1 optional maneuver or press in the resulting combat whenever this vampire blocks.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Night hath a thousand eyes. John Lyly, "The Maydes of Metamorphosis", act III, scene I

property.value: Independent. 2 votes (titled): If Ezmerelda is ready during your unlock phase, you can remove her from the game to gain 11 pool. +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat Archbishop of Miami: While your prey controls no ready Camarilla vampires, Fabrizia gets -2 votes.

property.name: Text
property.value: [obf] +1 stealth. [OBF] As above, and any minion who attempts to block this action and fails becomes locked before action resolution.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You are eternity's hostage, a captive of time. Boris Pasternak, "Night"

property.value: Jyhad:C, VTES:C, CE:C/PM4, BH:PM4/PN4, KMW:PB3, Third:C

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fade far away, dissolve, and quite forget What thou amongst the leaves hast never known... John Keats, "Ode to a Nightingale"

property.value: [myt] [REFLEX] Cancel a grapple card played on this vampire as it is played, and its cost is not paid. [obt] [COMBAT] Maneuver. [myt] [COMBAT] Maneuver. [MYT] [ACTION MODIFIER] +1 stealth.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For in the word death There is nothing to grasp; nothing to catch or claim. Philip Larkin, "And the wave sings because it is moving."

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable if an ally or younger vampire is taking a (D) action against you. [aus] +2 intercept. [myt] The action fails. Lock this reacting vampire. [MYT] As [myt] above, and the acting minion does not unlock as normal during their next unlock phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Trifle. Put this card in play. If you have 2 or fewer pool, you can use a master phase action to burn this card and gain 4 pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He who has not first laid his foundations may be able with great ability to lay them afterwards, but they will be laid with trouble to the architect and danger to the building. Niccolo Machiavelli, "The Prince"

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Fairuza can burn 1 blood or life from a minion controlled by your prey as a (D) action. She gets -1 bleed against a Methuselah who controls a ready minion.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mortal with 1 life. If this vampire is in torpor, he or she gains 1 blood at the start of his or her minion phase.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like a child to her mother I have flown to you. Sappho

property.value: Independent: Fakir can burn 3 blood during the polling step of a political action before votes and ballots are cast to have the referendum fail. He gets 1 optional press each combat. +1 bleed. +1 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: [ani] Burn 1 blood to get +1 intercept. [spi] +1 intercept. [SPI] This vampire attempts to block the current action, ignoring the normal prey, predator or target restrictions for blocking actions.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not even clouds or rain can hide him. And certainly not night. I'll bat him down within the hour. Howler, Ahrimane

property.value: Laibon magaji: Any Laibon can lock Falhu and have him not unlock as normal during his next unlock phase as a (D) action that costs 1 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gehenna. Requires at least 3 other Gehenna events in play. Do not replace as long as this card is in play. There is no Camarilla. Any Camarilla vampire is considered Independent instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gehenna. Requires at least 3 other Gehenna events in play. Not usable if any ready vampire is Black Hand. Do not replace as long as this card is in play. There is no Sabbat. Any Sabbat vampire is considered Independent instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: [chi] Cancel a reaction card requiring Auspex [aus] or Dementation [dem] as it is played, and its cost is not paid. [CHI] +1 stealth, and once this action, this vampire can burn 1 blood to use the [chi] effect above.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card on a ready vampire. The controller of this vampire burns 3 pool after this vampire goes to torpor. During each Methuselah's unlock phase, if this vampire is in torpor, that Methuselah burns 1 pool.

property.value: Requires a Laibon. Only usable during an action against another Laibon you control or during a bleed against you. +1 intercept. property.name: Text
property.value: [mel] Choose up to five older vampires. Successful referendum means each chosen vampire gains 1 blood. [MEL] As above, and successful referendum means this card is put in in play. Unique. You can burn this card before range is determined to end any combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: [chi] (D) Put this card on a ready minion and lock that minion. The attached minion cannot play cards or cast votes or ballots, and does not unlock as normal. During his or her unlock phase, he or she can burn 1 life or 1 blood to burn this card. Burn this card if he or she enters combat. [CHI] As above, and this is a +1 stealth action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable at long range. [chi] Strike: 2R damage. [CHI] As above, and prevent all damage from opposing minion's strikes this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: [chi] [COMBAT] Strike: put this card on the opposing vampire; this cannot be dodged. The attached vampire cannot play cards requiring any superior Disciplines. He or she can burn this card during his or her unlock phase instead of unlocking as normal. [CHI] [REACTION] As above, but put on the acting vampire after resolution of a successful (D) action against you.

property.value: [chi] +1 stealth. [CHI] Only usable during a bleed action. +1 bleed (limited), or +1 stealth and +1 bleed (limited).

property.value: Independent: Once each combat, before range is determined, Fatima can equip with a weapon from your hand (requirements and cost apply as normal). Blood cursed.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [chi] Put this card on this vampire. During your unlock phase, add 1 counter to this card. property.name: Text
property.value: Government. After an ally is burned in combat with an acting vampire, add 1 counter on this card and that acting vampire takes 2 unpreventable environmental damage (after combat ends). Burn this card if it has 4 counters.

property.value: Put this card on a ready justicar or Inner Circle member and lock him or her. During this vampire's unlock phase, this vampire burns 5 blood. If he or she cannot burn the blood, he or she is burned; otherwise, the vampire's controller moves this card to another justicar or Inner Circle member (or burns this card if there are no others).

property.name: Text
property.value: A vampire can play only one Fear of the Void Below each combat. [obf] Maneuver. [dai] Only usable before range is determined. This combat, each round defaults to long range, and this vampire gets 1 optional press each round, only usable to end combat. [DAI] As [dai] above, and the opposing minion's controller discards 1 card at random each round during the initial normal strike resolution.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Federico gets 1 optional maneuver during the first round of combat.

Any vampire can call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action; in that referendum, each non-Anarch titled vampire gets -1 vote.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once Tom Whiskers there brings us the draft of the second quarter sales report, we'll know exactly what it'll take to leverage the old man out. Cicatriz, Nosferatu antitribu

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique melee weapon. Strike: strength+1 aggravated damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It was with this bone that we destroyed one of the founders of the Tremere, so I suggest that you treat it with a little more respect. Meshenka, Tzimisce

property.value: Sabbat: During your unlock phase, any older Sabbat vampire controlled by another Methuselah can burn 1 blood to lock Feo.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Taxis or hikers, I'll stalk them without even thinking. I'm miles out of my way before I even realize it. Muricia, Ahrimane

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. Once each turn, you can burn 1 pool to get +3 votes during the polling step of any referendum.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only one Festivo dello Estinto can be played in a game. Put this card in play. Each Sabbat vampire gets -1 stealth when hunting. Any Sabbat vampire who successfully hunts gains enough blood from the blood bank to reach full capacity. Burn this card during your unlock phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Hunting ground. During your unlock phase, a ready vampire you control can gain 1 blood. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Our torments may also in length of time Become our elements. John Milton, "Paradise Lost"

property.value: Camarilla: Fidus gets +1 stealth on undirected actions. Flight [FLIGHT]. Tremere slave. -1 strength.

property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a prince or justicar. Add 4 blood to another vampire.

property.value: When thou comest to a foreign city, thou shalt present thyself to the one who ruleth there.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires an anarch. (D) Choose a ready minion, and put this card on this anarch. If this anarch is blocked, this card is burned, and the blocking minion and the chosen minion instead of this anarch enter combat, or the action ends with no combat if that combat cannot occur.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Francis gets +1 strength in combat with a Toreador or Toreador antitribu.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat Archbishop of New York: Once each turn, Francisco can burn 1 blood to get +1 bleed (for the current action).

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Franciscus is burned (without going to torpor) if he takes 4 or more damage during a single combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Imbued: Other Methuselahs' actions against Francois cost 1 additional blood or life.

property.value: chi obf pot AUS CEL PRE

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Prince of Paris: Francois can steal up to 2 blood from a younger vampire as a +1 stealth (D) action. +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable after action resolution. [for] Only usable if the action was successful. Unlock this vampire. [FOR] Only usable if the action was blocked. Unlock this vampire.

property.value: Jyhad:R2, VTES:R, CE:U/PV2, Anarchs:PG, LoB:PA2, Third:U, LotN:PR, KoT:PV3, HttB:PSam2

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Titled vampires get +1 bleed against you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. [san] Lock this Blood Brother and any number of ready unlocked members you control of this circle. This combat, once each round before range is determined, or whenever your combatant leaves the ready region, you can choose one of these ready Blood Brothers to become the combatant instead (and combat continues). [SAN] As above, and each of these Blood Brothers gets 1 optional press this combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an Independent or Anarch vampire. Allocate X points among one or more ready vampires, where X is half this acting vampire's capacity rounded up. No more than 3 points can be allocated to each vampire. Successful referendum means each vampire burns 1 blood for each point allocated. In this referendum, each priscus gets -1 ballot, each non-priscus titled vampire gets -1 vote, and burning the Edge is worth 1 additional vote.

property.name: Text
property.value: Out-of-turn. Frenzy. Only usable during combat before range is determined. Choose a vampire in combat. This round, the chosen vampire cannot use equipment or press to end combat. This round gets 1 press, only usable to continue combat.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:C, VTES:C, CE:C, Anarchs:PG, LoB:PO, Third:C

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an anarch. [for] Reduce a bleed against you by 2. [nec] +1 intercept. [obt] Only usable after a vampire successfully bleeds you. The acting vampire burns 2 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only one From a Sinking Ship can be played in a game. Steal an ally or a vampire with capacity 6 or less controlled by a Methuselah with 3 or fewer pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This is not what I signed up for. Theo Bell, Brujah archon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat bishop: Rescuing a vampire from torpor costs Frondator 1 fewer blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card in play. Each ready minion you control can enter combat with a minion controlled by your prey as a (D) action. You gain 1 pool after a ready minion controlled by your prey is burned or sent to torpor. During your influence phase, burn this card and burn 1 pool for each ready minion controlled by your prey.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. A Methuselah can have only one Frozen Object. [ser] (D) Look at any Methuselah's hand, and discard all equipment cards from it. [tem] Put this card on this vampire. If this vampire blocks a (D) action, you can burn this card to inflict 2 unpreventable environmental damage on the acting minion before combat. [TEM] Put this card in play. You can burn this card after resolution of a successful bleed against you to inflict 2 unpreventable environmental damage on the acting minion.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gehenna. Do not replace until a vampire commits diablerie. This card comes in play with 10 counters. Remove 1 counter each time another Gehenna event is played. A blood hunt cannot be called on a vampire with capacity greater than the number of counters on this card if he or she diablerizes a younger vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I'm starting to hear whispers of warehouses and old office buildings converted to internment centers -- and buffets. Okulos, Nosferatu

property.name: Text
property.value: Usable by a locked vampire. [nec] Unlock a mummy, wraith, or zombie ally you control. [NEC] Unlock up to two mummy, wraith, or zombie allies you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: You can lock Fustuk to unlock a Tremere antitribu. Flight [FLIGHT]. Tremere antitribu slave.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: A minion opposing Gabi cannot strike: dodge during the first round of combat. Budapest circle. Sterile.

property.name: Discipline
property.value: obf pot ANI AUS DOM THA

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Tremere Justicar: Gabrielle can steal 2 blood (or life) from a ready minion as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Cards requiring Chimerstry [chi] cost Gabrin 1 fewer blood. He can lock an ally or a younger vampire as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Gael can never have more than 1 intercept. Any additional intercept she gains is lost.

property.name: Text
property.value: Trifle. Put this card on a ready non-titled, non-Anarch vampire you control. This vampire is considered Anarch. If this vampire changes sects, burn this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The neonate childe escaped. So intent on Galaric were the Ventrue that they ignored the childe until he was long gone from their grasp. Salvador Garcia, Brujah anarch

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable if you have at least 1 victory point. Lose 1 victory point and put this card in play. During your unlock phase, move 1 pool from your prey's pool to your pool. If you are ousted, your predator gains 1 additional victory point. At the end of the game, if you have not been ousted, you gain 1 additional victory point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each other Methuselah secretly chooses a number between 1 and 5 inclusive; you choose a number between 1 and 6 inclusive. Each Methuselah holds a hand out with the chosen number of counters in it. Reveal the choices simultaneously. Each Methuselah gains the amount of pool he or she chose unless another Methuselah chose exactly 1 less than he or she did, in which case, he or she burns that amount of pool instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Sabbat vampire. (D) Enter combat with an older vampire. At the end of that combat, if only one combatant is ready, that ready vampire gains blood equal to the opposing vampire's capacity.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Is this why you arranged for us to be alone together? So you could try to 'talk sense' into me? Or were you just feeling suicidal? Tara, Brujah Prince of San Diego

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Ganesh gets +1 bleed against a Methuselah who controls a ready Giovanni.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable as the action is announced. Whenever the action is blocked, set the range for each round of the resulting combat to close.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He who is skilled in the attack flashes forth from the topmost heights of heaven, making it impossible for the enemy to guard against him. Sun Tzu, "The Art of War"

During the initial normal strike resolution each round of combat, the Ghoul Retainer inflicts 1 damage on the opposing minion at close range or can use a weapon not used by employer (or another retainer) that round (either before or after). This is not a strike, although it does count as "using" the weapon.

The attached ally is considered a ghoul and not a mortal. Once each combat, he or she can play a strike card requiring basic Potence [pot] as a vampire.

They can burn 1 blood from a ready vampire and put 1 container counter on themselves as a +1 stealth (D) action. Any ready Assamite can burn X container counters from them to gain X blood as a +1 stealth action.

Equip this vampire with the weapon instead of placing it in your ash heap (pay cost as normal). During the first round of that combat, that weapon cannot be used.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Delightful eyes, you burn with mystic rays Like candles in broad day; red suns may blaze, But cannot quench their still, fantastic light. Charles Baudelaire, "The Living Torch"

property.value: Camarilla: While Hiram is ready, actions to burn a location you control cost 1 additional blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [san] Unlock this Blood Brother and another ready Blood Brother of the same circle. Only one Hive Mind can be played at [san] each turn. [SAN] Add 3 blood to a Blood Brother of the same circle in your uncontrolled region.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [HttB] [san](D) Bleed and without restriction of [san] above

property.name: Text
property.value: Retainer with 1 life. [pro] During any Methuselah's unlock phase, this vampire can burn 1 blood to unlock. [PRO] As above, but Homunculus has 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A pile of bones in a skin bag, a deflated balloon; a hideous bundle. R. Chetwynd-Hayes, "Looking For Something To Suck"

property.name: Text
property.value: Successful referendum means each ready vampire with capacity 8 or more gains 1 blood, and each vampire with capacity 8 or more in any uncontrolled region gains 1 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: If Horatio does not have a title, he can call a referendum to become the Prince of Chicago as a +1 stealth political action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: The Horde can lock to give another infernal minion +1 bleed. Infernal. Non-unique.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. [vic] This vampire gets +1 strength this combat. [VIC] As above, and this vampire can prevent 1 damage each round.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whence and what art thou, execrable shape? John Milton, "Paradise Lost"

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. [chi] Equip with the first weapon you find in your library (working down from the top; shuffle afterward; if the requirements are not met, it is burned). This weapon does not contest any card in play. Do not pay the cost for this weapon. At the end of this combat, burn the weapon if it is still in play. [CHI] As above, but shuffle the equipment in your library at the end of combat if it is still in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable if this vampire is blocked, before combat (if any). [pro] Unlock the blocking minion. This action is not blocked, and it is now unblockable.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Protean [pro] cards cost Horrock 1 fewer blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: [pot] (D) Inflict 1 unpreventable damage on a ready minion. [POT] (D) Inflict 2 unpreventable damage on a ready minion.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Requires a ready anarch. Lock as an anarch announces a hunting action to have the anarch gain 1 additional blood (from the same source) if the action is successful.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's easy work. Just eyeball the donor's chart before snacking so you don't get a sour one. Sandra White, Caitiff anarch

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose a vampire with capacity 6 or less. Each Methuselah can bid pool for control of that vampire. The highest bid goes to the vampire's controller; that bidder then steals the vampire. If the controller wins, half the winning bid rounded up goes to the blood bank.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card on a ready Samedi you control. During your unlock phase, this Samedi gains 1 blood, and he or she can lock to gain 1 additional blood. Any other Samedi can move this card to himself or herself as a +1 stealth action.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [pot] Draw 3 cards. Discard afterward. [tem] Draw 4 cards then put four cards from your hand on top of your library in any order and unlock this vampire. [TEM] Put this card on this vampire. During your unlock phase, this vampire can burn 2 blood to add 1 counter to this card. While this vampire is ready, you get +1 hand size for each counter on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock to unlock any card you control that is not a minion. If you do so, neither that card nor this location unlock as normal during your next unlock phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Howler gets 1 optional maneuver each combat. She cannot use weapons. Sterile. +1 strength.

property.name: Discipline
property.value: dom pot pro CEL FOR PRE

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Hrothulf can burn the Edge to enter combat with a minion as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Any Gangrel antitribu can enter combat with Huang as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Hugo gets -1 intercept against Lasombra and Tzimisce.

property.name: Discipline
property.value: AUS DAI DOM OBF POT PRE

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: If Huitzilopochtli during your master phase, you can burn 1 pool to get +1 master phase action. Infernal. +1 bleed.

property.name: Discipline
property.value: abo cel ANI OBF PRO VIC

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: During your unlock phase, you can move one card from your hand to Hukros face down (you can look at the card at any time). He can play that card as if from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card on a ready vampire you control. This vampire gets +1 stealth when rescuing a vampire from torpor. Rescuing a vampire from torpor cost this vampire 1 fewer blood. This vampire cannot commit diablerie.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: If Humo is ready and you also control Greensleeves, Humo can burn 1 blood to give Greensleeves +1 stealth once each action.

property.name: Text
property.value: If a vampire successfully hunts, move 1 blood from that vampire to this card after resolution. Burn this card if it has 5 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Sabbat vampires you control get +1 hunt.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card on a ready vampire. This vampire gets +1 stealth on diablerie actions. This vampire cannot cast votes or ballots in a referendum to call a blood hunt on this vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: If Husamettin burns a vampire with a contract on them, you can search your library for a master discipline card and put it on him (shuffle afterward). Blood cursed.

property.name: Text
property.value: [dai] +1 stealth. [dai][obf] Cancel a reaction card requiring Auspex [aus] as it is played (cost must be paid). [DAI][OBF] As [dai][obf] above, and/or gain 1 pool after action resolution if this action is successful.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Ian can play cards requiring a Discipline as if he has the basic level of that Discipline. Each master discipline card placed on him gives him the superior level of that Discipline.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: During your discard phase, Ibn Khaldun can burn 1 blood to unlock. He cannot use cards requiring Celerity [cel]. Scarce.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: After Icarus successfully bleeds, you can look at the target Methuselah's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: If Idalia performs a successful equip action, unlock her at the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Ignazio can enter combat with a vampire with capacity 6 or less controlled by your predator or prey as a (D) action. +1 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: [chi] The acting minion gets -1 stealth until the end of the turn. [CHI] Reduce a bleed against any Methuselah by 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Because there is safety in derision, I talked about an apparition... William Butler Yeats, "The Apparitions"

property.name: Text
property.value: [ser] Only usable if the opposing minion inflicts aggravated damage on this vampire. This vampire treats all aggravated damage from the opposing minion's strike as normal damage. [dai] Prevent all aggravated damage from the opposing minion's strike. [DAI] Burn 1 blood to be immune to aggravated damage this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Igo does not get the usual +1 stealth when hunting.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during the polling step of a political action before votes and ballots are cast. Starting with your prey and going clockwise, each Methuselah with any ready titled vampires can elect to cast all of his or her vampires' votes and ballots in favor for 1 pool. Each time a Methuselah declines, this Ishtarri burns 1 blood to add 1 pool to that amount. Continue until a Methuselah accepts or this Ishtarri fails to burn blood. Once results are tallied, each vampire casting votes or ballots against this referendum burns 2 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Contracts cannot be placed on Iliana.

property.name: Text
property.value: Burn a weapon that costs 3 or more pool or inflicts with a regular strike aggravated damage or 4 or more damage. The bearer of the weapon takes 1 unpreventable environmental damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an anarch. More than one discipline can be used to play this card. (D) Bleed. [cel] Unlock this anarch if the bleed is successful. [chi] This action is at +1 stealth. [pre] The bleed is at +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: All imbued get +1 intercept against monsters, not cumulative with any other Illuminate in play, nor with The Unmasking. Any monster can enter combat with this imbued as a (D) action. Burn this card during your unlock phase or if this imbued is not ready.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. [chi] Combat ends. Move the bottom card from your crypt to your ready region. He or she does not contest any other minions or titles in play. The vampire gains blood equal to half of his or her capacity rounded down. The vampire and the opposing minion enter combat. Remove the crypt card from the game at the end of combat (if it is still in play). [CHI] As above, but the vampire gains blood equal to his or her capacity.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Unique. [chi] Put this card in play with 1 counter. During your unlock phase, a ready vampire with Chimerstry [chi] you control can move 1 blood to this card. You can burn X counters from this card to reduce a bleed against you by X. [CHI] As above, but this card is put in play with 2 counters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Animal with 1 life. Requires a Laibon. Put Ilomba on any minion (this is a +1 stealth (D) action if that minion is controlled by another Methuselah). If Ilomba would burn 1 life (or would otherwise be burned), the employer burns 1 blood or life instead. If he or she cannot, he or she is burned. A minion can have only one Ilomba.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: You get +2 votes in referendums to call blood hunts on Ilyana. Once each action, she can burn 1 blood to get +1 intercept.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent. 1 vote (titled): Imanna gets +1 vote in referendums she calls. Blood cursed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable when a vampire is about to successfully hunt. [qui] Put this card on that vampire. The attached vampire cannot block this reacting vampire. Burn this card if the attached vampire is in torpor. [QUI] As above, and the acting vampire does not gain blood from the hunt.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. A vampire can play only one Immense Size each combat. [vic] The opposing minion cannot play grapple cards (such as Immortal Grapple and Mighty Grapple) this combat. [VIC] As above, with 1 optional press.

property.name: Text
property.value: Grapple. Only usable at close range before strikes are chosen. A vampire can play only one Immortal Grapple each round. [pot] Strikes that are not hand strikes cannot be used this round (by either combatant). [POT] As above, with 1 optional press. If another round of combat occurs, that round is at close range (skip the determine range step for that round).

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:R2, VTES:R, Sabbat:U, SW:U/PB, FN:PG, CE:U/PB2, Third:U, LotN:PG2, KoT:U/PB3, HttB:PGar3

property.name: Artist
property.value: L. A. Williams; Clint Langley; Avery Butterworth

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat Archbishop of Miami: Imogen can exchange one random card from the hand of your prey or predator for one library card from that Methuselah's ash heap as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Title. Choose a Camarilla vampire with capacity 8 or more. Successful referendum means this card is put on the chosen vampire to represent the unique Camarilla title of Imperator (worth 3 votes). This vampire can play cards named Blood Hunt from your hand or ash heap as a prince. This vampire gets +3 votes in blood hunt referendums.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a justicar or Inner Circle member. Put this card in play. Any Camarilla vampire can enter combat with a non-Camarilla vampire as a (D) action. Any vampire can burn this card as a (D) action; non-Camarilla vampires get -1 stealth on that action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. A vampire can play only one Imposing Phantasm each combat. [chi] This vampire gets +1 strength this combat. After combat ends, if the opposing minion is ready, the opposing minion gains blood or life equal to the amount he or she lost to damage this combat. [CHI] As above, with 1 additional strike this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. This combat, the opposing monster cannot maneuver or press to continue combat, and strikes other than strikes to end combat cost the opposing monster 1 additional blood or life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Wherever a man is against his will, that to him is a prison. Epictetus

property.name: Text
property.value: Weapon. Strike: 2R aggravated damage, only usable once each combat. If the opposing minion inflicts any damage (even if it is prevented) on the bearer at long range, this weapon is burned and inflicts 2 aggravated damage on the bearer.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He just exploded. Never seen anything like it without a Tremere around. Roger MacEllen, Lasombra Ductus

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an anarch. Only usable before range is determined during the first round of combat. A minion can play only one Improvised Tactics each combat. [aus] During the press step each round, draw 1 card (discard down afterward). [pot] This minion can strike: 2R damage, only usable at long range, each strike this combat. [pro] Once each round, this vampire can burn 1 blood to get 1 maneuver.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique demon with 1 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed. Flight [FLIGHT]. Impundulu can strike: 1R damage. He gets 1 optional maneuver each combat. He can steal 1 blood (becoming life) or life from any minion as a +1 stealth (D) action.

card.name: In Memory of the Two Lands

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play with 1 counter for each Follower of Set and mummy you control. Once each action, you can burn 1 counter from this card to give a mummy you control +1 bleed or +1 strength. Burn this card if it has no counters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock to give a vampire who successfully hunts 1 additional blood from the blood bank.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Come to me now, you delicate Graces... Sappho

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card on a vampire with capacity 1, and put three library cards from your hand, ash heap or library on this card, face up but out of play. This vampire can play other copies of these cards as if he or she had the Discipline required (if any) at superior.

property.name: Text
property.value: Inconnu. A Methuselah can use 4 transfers and remove a vampire in their uncontrolled region from the game to search for any card in their library and move it to their hand (shuffling and discarding down afterward).

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. [pot] All damaging strikes requiring Potence [pot] made by this vampire inflict +1 damage this combat. [POT] As above, but those strikes inflict +2 damage.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: AH:C2, FN:PG2, CE:C/PN3, BH:PN2, LoB:PO2, Third:PB2

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose a minion your prey controls. The chosen minion cannot block the bearer.

property.name: Text
property.value: [for] Prevent 1 damage. [FOR] Press, or prevent 1 damage with 1 optional press.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:C, VTES:C, CE:C/PV2, LotN:PR4, KoT:C, HttB:PSal5

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during a bleed action. [aus][nec] +1 bleed (limited). [AUS][NEC] +1 bleed for every 10 cards in the ash heap of the target Methuselah (limited).

property.name: Text
property.value: Imbued: As Inez enters play, you can search your library (shuffle afterward) and/or hand for a power requiring innocence and put it on her.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card on a Red List Anarch vampire. This vampire is infernal, Bahari, and gets +2 votes. During this vampire's minion phase, his or her controller can unlock a ready anarch he or she controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card on a titled Tremere antitribu. This vampire cannot cast votes or ballots.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I owe allegiance to the race of those Who from the dark aspire to clarity. Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

property.name: Text
property.value: [for] Prevent all damage from the opposing minion's strikes this round. [thn] Prevent all damage to a ghoul (ally or retainer) in combat. Usable by a vampire not involved in the current combat. [THN] Only usable at the end of a round in which this vampire successfully inflicted damage on the opposing vampire. Put this card on the opposing vampire. The attached vampire cannot block the vampire playing this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Demon with 2 life. [tha] This vampire can play put 1 investment counter on the Infernal Familiar to play a card requiring a Discipline he or she does not have as if he or she had the basic level of that Discipline. If the number of investment counters on the Familiar is greater than this vampire's capacity, burn this vampire.

property.name: Artist
property.value: L. A. Williams; Chett Masterz; Mike Chaney

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Choose any Discipline, and put this card on a Tremere antitribu you control. This vampire can play cards requiring the chosen Discipline as if he or she has the superior level of the chosen Discipline.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [Third] As above, but put this card on any vampire you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: [cel] Press. [CEL] Each time you replace a card this combat (including after replacing this card), draw 1 additional card (discard down afterward).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hunt. Hunt again. If you do not find it, you will die. Robert Penn Warren, "Treasure Hunt"

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique demon with 2 life. 1 strength, 3 bleed. Requires an infernal vampire. [dai] Infernal Servitor can act the turn it is recruited. Remove it from the game if you control no infernal vampires, or after it performs a successful action. [DAI] As above, and the Servitor can play cards requiring basic Daimoinon [dai] and/or Obfuscate [obf] as a vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. This combat, the amount of damage inflicted on this imbued by hand strikes, melee weapon strikes, or retainers (even if it is prevented) is also inflicted on the striking minion or damage-dealing retainer.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mortal with 1 life. 0 strength, 0 bleed. Informant cannot act or block. During your unlock phase, any Methuselah who controls a ready Ishtarri can look at your hand. During your discard phase, your predator takes control of Informant.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:U, VTES:U, Sabbat:U, SW:PT, CE:PTr/PV, LoB:PI, Third:U, HttB:PSal, SP:PoS1

property.name: Artist
property.value: William O'Connor; Sue Ann Harkey; Melissa Uran

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. Lock to give a Nosferatu antitribu you control +1 intercept.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Knowledge is of two kinds: we know a subject ourselves, or we know where we can find information upon it. Samuel Johnson, in James Boswell's "The Life of Samuel Johnson, LL.D."

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Prince of Geneva: If Ingrid is ready at the start of your influence phase, you get +2 transfers.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. A vampire can play only one Inner Essence each combat. [vic] Once this combat, this vampire can reduce the cost of a combat card they play by 1 blood. [VIC] As above, and this vampire gains 1 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable after this vampire successfully bleeds. Remove the top card of the target Methuselah's crypt from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a Sabbat vampire. (D) Choose one or more bishops. Each of the chosen bishops loses his or her title and takes 2 unpreventable environmental damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: [tha] Put this equipment on a ready vampire and put a card requiring Thaumaturgy [tha] from your hand on it, face up, out of play; this acting vampire pays the cost of that card. This vampire can burn this equipment to use the basic Thaumaturgy ability of that card. [THA] As above, but this vampire can use the superior Thaumaturgy [THA] ability of the card.

property.name: Text
property.value: (D) Burn the Edge to burn 2 blood from a vampire controlled by another Methuselah, or to cause your prey to burn 2 pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: [ACTION] [1 CONVICTION] +1 stealth action. Add 1 counter to an imbued in your uncontrolled region or move the conviction [1 CONVICTION] you paid for this action from your ash heap to any imbued in play.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's faith and there's blind faith, son. Never get 'em mixed up. Father St. George, Judge

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable by a ready vampire other than the acting minion. [pot][pre] The acting ally or younger vampire gets +1 strength during this action. [POT][PRE] The acting ally or younger vampire gets +2 strength during this action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable if your prey controls the Edge or the Edge is uncontrolled. Only one Instability can be played each turn. Your prey can take the Edge if it is uncontrolled. You gain 2 pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A wise man gets more use from his enemies than a fool from his friends. Baltasar Gracian

property.name: Text
property.value: [cel][pro] +1 stealth. [CEL][PRO] Only usable after resolution of a successful action. Unlock this vampire. A vampire can play only one Instantaneous Transformation at superior each turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable if a minion controlled by your predator is acting. [ani] +1 intercept. [ANI] As above, with 1 optional maneuver during the resulting combat whenever this vampire blocks.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beckett had long since learned to trust his instincts. Sharp as they were, augmented by his undead abilities, they often warned him of dangers that even his night-vision and heightened senses were unable to detect.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Hunting ground. During your unlock phase, a ready vampire you control can gain 1 blood. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chasing an errant swarm of bees is nothing to following a naked lunatic when the fit of escaping is upon him. Bram Stoker, "Dracula"

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card in play. Lock this card and burn X locations you control during your turn to gain X pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I would rather be ashes than dust! I would rather that my spark should burn out in a brilliant blaze than it should be stifled by dry-rot. Jack London

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable if this vampire blocks, before block resolution. [pre] This blocking vampire can strike: combat ends during the resulting combat. If he or she does so and the acting minion is an ally or a younger vampire, unlock this blocking vampire before combat ends. [tem] This blocking minion sets the range for the first round of the resulting combat. [TEM] The acting minion does not unlock during his or her next unlock phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: [pre] (D) Bleed with +1 bleed. [PRE] (D) Bleed with +2 bleed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They are weak and easily cowed. Show your fangs and they will run. Gerard, Ventrue antitribu

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: If Intisar is ready and you control the Edge during your unlock phase, you can give another Methuselah 1 pool to lock a minion they control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Trifle. Choose a ready non-Sabbat vampire you control. The chosen vampire becomes Sabbat. (His or her clan is not affected.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You're either with me or against me. You really don't want to be against me. Desiree Traville, Brujah antitribu

property.name: Text
property.value: Do not replace until your unlock phase. [obf] +1 stealth. Once this action, this vampire can burn 1 blood to give an ally or younger vampire -1 intercept. Into Thin Air and Lost in Crowds cannot both be played on the same action. [OBF] As above, but for +2 stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: While in play, this equipment card represents a location and does not count as equipment. Unique. If this card has 2 or fewer blood, this vampire can move 1 blood from himself or herself to this card as an action. This vampire gets +1 bleed for each blood on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Title. Requires a cardinal or regent. Choose any Sabbat vampire. Successful referendum means this card is put on the chosen vampire to represent the Sabbat title of priscus. In this referendum, each ready cardinal gets +1 vote and Camarilla vampires cannot cast votes or ballots.

property.name: Text
property.value: Successful referendum means this card is put in play and each Follower of Set can choose to become Camarilla. As any Follower of Set enters play, he or she can choose to become Camarilla. The Followers of Set clan is a Camarilla clan.

property.name: Text
property.value: [abo] [REFLEX] Cancel a frenzy card played on this vampire as it is played. [abo] Strike: hand strike at +1 damage. [ABO] Strike: burn the opposing animal or mortal, or strike: hand strike at +X damage, where X is the number of Orun on this vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: [abo] [REFLEX] Cancel a frenzy card played on this vampire as it is played. [abo] Only usable before range is determined. This vampire gets +1 strength this combat. A vampire can play only one Invoking the Beast each combat. [ABO] As above, with 1 optional press this round.

property.name: Discipline
property.value: dom nec ANI AUS FOR PRO

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla primogen: Allies requiring Gangrel cost Inyanga 1 fewer blood or pool. +1 intercept.

property.name: Text
property.value: Electronic. The bearer gets 1 optional maneuver each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To see as a God sees, and take the depth Of things as nimbly as the outward eye. John Keats, "The Fall of Hyperion"

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:U2, VTES:U, CE:PB/PTo, BH:PN2, LoB:PO, Third:U, KoT:U/PT2

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Prince of Dallas: Ira gets +1 intercept against political actions. After you replace a card requiring Auspex [aus] he played, you can draw 1 additional card (discard down afterward).

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: If an older vampire blocks Iris, their controller can look at your hand before combat (if any).

property.name: Text
property.value: [pot][pre] Only usable during the polling step of a political action. This vampire gets +2 votes. [POT][PRE] Only usable during a bleed action. +2 bleed (limited).

property.name: Text
property.value: [pot][pre] Cancel an action modifier requiring Presence [pre] as it is played, and its cost is not paid. [POT][PRE] As [pot][pre] above, but cancel an action modifier requiring Dominate [dom].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A weak mind is a weak link in a strong militia. Patricia Bollingbroke, Brujah

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during the polling step of a political action. Lock this vampire to force the acting vampire to abstain (this can cancel that vampire's votes and ballots).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The anarchs are a necessary force of evolution, ensuring that only the prince who can hold his kingdom from rebels can stay in power. Llewellyn, Nosferatu

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: If Isanwayen is ready during your master phase, you can lock him to get +1 master phase action. Rescuing him from torpor costs 1 additional blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Title. Only usable during the polling step of a political action. Usable by a locked vampire. Not usable if there are any ready older non-titled Laibon Ishtarri. Put this card on this Laibon Ishtarri to represent the unique Laibon title of Ishtarri Kholo (worth 2 votes). If this vampire is not a ready Laibon Ishtarri or there is a ready older non-titled Laibon Ishtarri, move this card to (one of) the oldest ready non-titled Laibon Ishtarri (if any).

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card on an Ishtarri you control. This Ishtarri gets 1 optional maneuver or press each combat. A minion can have only one Ishtarri Warlord.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the lion grows old, even flies attack him. Wadchagga proverb

You gain any victory point gained by that Methuselah instead of him or her, until you are being ousted or until you have gained 1 victory point from this card. Burn this card after you have gained 1 victory point from this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Old-fashioned Loyalists don't last all that long, even when they've got your potential for power. Andrew Emory, Lasombra bishop

Any minion can burn this card as an action. [DEM] As above, and burning this card as an action inflicts 1 unpreventable environmental damage on the acting minion.

property.value: Unique location. Lock to move a library card from your ash heap to this location, face down. You can use a master phase action to move one card from this location to the top of your library. Any vampire can burn this location as a (D) action.
