Not usable if a Madman's Quill is already on any minion controlled by your prey. Vampires with Dementation [dem] get +1 bleed against the attached minion's controller. Any vampire can burn this card as an action that costs 2 blood.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Show me a sane man and I will cure him for you. Carl Gustav Jung

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. Unlocked Malkavians can act in any Methuselah's minion phase (follow normal sequencing rules). Any minion can burn this card as an action that any unlocked Malkavian (in addition to the normally eligible blockers) can attempt to block.

property.name: Text
Flavor
property.value: Would you, could you, in the rain? I would not, could not, in the rain. Not in the dark; not on a train... Dr. Seuss, "Green Eggs and Ham"

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during the polling step of a political action before votes and ballots are cast. [pre] [REACTION] This vampire gets +2 votes. [mel] [ACTION MODIFIER][REACTION] This vampire gets +2 votes. [MEL] [ACTION MODIFIER][REACTION] As [mel] above, and any vampire casting votes or ballots in agreement with this vampire gains 1 blood. Any vampire casting votes or ballots in opposition to this vampire burns 1 blood. Blood is gained or lost once results are tallied.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. Put this card on a gun on this minion and put an ammo card from your hand on this card. When using this gun, you can use the effect of the ammo card as if it were played from your hand (requirements and cost apply as normal).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A little unusual ammo can make all the difference when fighting Donal. Brujah, Castro Valley 2002 Fall Storyline

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Strike cards requiring Thaumaturgy [tha] cost Magdalena 1 additional blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [tha] Search your library for an equipment card and equip with it (requirements and cost apply as normal; shuffle afterward). [THA] As above, but this is a +3 stealth action.

property.value: [pre] Strike: combat ends. [PRE] As above, and unlock this vampire before combat ends.

You burn pool for the bleed instead of the target Methuselah (must be at least 1 pool or this card is burned). When you would be successfully bled, you can burn this card to have that Methuselah burn pool instead of you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ...but why will you say that I am mad? The disease has sharpened my senses -- not destroyed, not dulled them. Edgar Allen Poe, "The Tell-Tale Heart"

property.value: Put this card on a ready Malkavian. Each time this Malkavian takes an action, his or her controller flips a coin. If the result is tails, the action fails, his or her controller burns 1 pool and locks this Malkavian.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: These eyes, that now are dimm'd with death's black veil Have been as piercing as the midday sun To search the secret treasons of the world. William Shakespeare, "King Henry VI, Part 3", act V, scene 2

property.value: Play Rock-Paper-Scissors with another Methuselah. The winner steals 2 pool from the loser. Each time you tie, play again, but for 1 additional pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though this be madness, yet there is method in't. William Shakespeare, Hamlet, act II, scene 2

property.value: Title. Choose a ready Malkavian. Successful referendum means this card is put on the chosen Malkavian to represent the unique Camarilla title of Malkavian Justicar. In this referendum, each ready Malkavian gets +1 vote.

property.value: Each other Methuselah holds 1 to 4 counters in his or her hand. Guess the number of counters in each Methuselah's hand. If you guess correctly, you steal that much pool from his or her pool. If you guess incorrectly, that Methuselah gains that much pool from the blood bank.

property.name: Text

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ...even the spectres have beads of sweat. I came from the dead tomb; my end is at this door through which a gleam of light passes. Victor Hugo, "I am made of stone and marble..."

property.value: [chi] The opposing minion's weapons inflict no damage on this vampire this combat. [CHI] Only usable at long range. Strike: 1R unpreventable aggravated damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One should always be a little improbable. Nothing that actually occurs is of the smallest importance. Tom Stoppard, "The Invention of Love"

property.name: Text

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To give to your friend is not to cast away; it is to store for the future. Ugadja, Guruhi magaji

property.name: Text
property.value: Melee weapon. Strike: strength+1 damage, only usable once each round. Once each combat, if this weapon is used to strike at close range and the opposing minion does not dodge the strike, the bearer gets 1 optional press this round, only usable to continue combat. At close range, a vampire with Potence [pot] can burn 1 blood to strike: burn this weapon with fast strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose another Methuselah. Successful referendum means this card is put in play. You get -1 hand size. The chosen Methuselah does not replace cards during any Methuselah's minion phase. After each minion phase, he or she draws back up to his or her hand size. Any vampire can call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action.

Search your library (shuffle afterward) and/or ash heap for up to four cards requiring Serpentis [ser] and put them on this card , face down (you can look at the cards at any time). This Follower of Set can play cards from this equipment as if from your hand (requirements and cost apply as normal). Burn this equipment when it has no cards.

property.value: [obf] Strike: dodge. [tem] Maneuver, or strike: dodge, with 1 optional maneuver. [TEM] Only usable before range is determined. Inflict 2 damage on the opposing minion. A vampire can play only one Outside the Hourglass at superior each round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Title. Requires a Laibon with capacity 5 or more. In this referendum, each Guruhi gets +1 vote. Any votes or ballots any magaji cast in favor of this referendum are ignored. Successful referendum means this card is put on this acting Laibon to represent the Laibon title of magaji (worth 2 votes).

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: During any Methuselah's unlock phase, if Owain is ready, you can add 1 blood to a vampire that Methuselah controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: Animal with 1 life. [ani] While the employer is in combat, the opposing minion's controller plays with an open hand. [ANI] As above, but Owl Companion has 2 life.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:U, VTES:U, CE:U/PN, Anarchs:PG, BH:PN, KMW:PG, LoB:PA2, Third:PTz, LotN:PR, KoT:U

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock and burn X pool during the polling step of a political action to get +X votes.

property.name: Text
property.value: A vampire can play only one Pack Alpha each round. [ani] Only usable before range is determined. Employ an animal retainer from your hand (requirements and cost apply as normal). [ANI] Burn an animal retainer employed by this vampire to put this card on this vampire. This minion gets +1 strength. A minion can have only one Pack Alpha.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during a bleed against you. Do not replace until after this action. +2 intercept. A vampire cannot play both Pack Tactics and Elder Intervention in the same action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Hunting ground. During your unlock phase, you may move 1 blood from the blood bank to a ready Guruhi you control. Not usable to move a blood to a Guruhi with no blood. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground card each turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: While in play, this equipment card represents a location and does not count as equipment. Unique. During your master phase, this vampire gains 1 blood.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Welcome to my house! Come freely. Go safely... Bram Stoker, "Dracula"

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play with 3 counters. Toreador antitribu get +1 bleed. During your discard phase, burn 1 counter from this card. Burn this card if it has no counters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card on a Laibon with no Aye and no Pallid. This vampire gets -1 stealth. Burn this card if this vampire gets an Aye. Alternatively, when a vampire with no Aye or a zombie is acting, play this card to your ash heap as an out-of-turn master to give a vampire you control +1 intercept.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [aus] Burn 1 blood to unlock a younger vampire. [obe] Add 1 life to an ally who has fewer life than his or her starting life. [OBE] As [obe] above, and unlock that ally at the end of the turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You know, with the fangs and all, I thought he would just eat me, but I was still too weak to move. But he just licked at my cuts. Look! No scars or nothing. Cole Goddings, night watchman

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Do not replace until your unlock phase. [nec] Move one library card from your ash heap to your hand (discard afterward). [myt] Each other Methuselah can draw 2 cards. You draw 5 cards (discard afterward). [MYT] As above, but you can put one of the cards you discard on the top of your library instead of in your ash heap.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: As a wraith enters play, Paolo gains 1 blood. Giovanni get +1 intercept against him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Once each action, Legba can burn 1 blood to get +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Hunting ground. Requires a ready vampire with a city title. During your unlock phase, a ready titled vampire you control can gain 2 blood. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground each turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card on a ready Ventrue who entered your ready region during your last influence phase. This vampire gets +1 vote in referendums called by younger vampires. A younger vampire who blocks this vampire burns 1 blood before combat (if any).

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: During your master phase, either discard a master card or lock Pariah. He cannot take undirected actions other than hunting. He can enter combat with a minion as a (D) action. Scarce. Sterile. +1 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock to give a Daughter of Cacophony you control +1 stealth. Lock this card and a Daughter of Cacophony you control to give any minion +1 stealth. [Burn Option]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He bankrolled the whole production. Those Malkavians are founts of inspiration, but he's the first to display such appreciation. Gael Pilet, Daughter of Cacophony

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a prince or justicar. Choose a Methuselah who has more pool than you do, and allocate X of his or her pool between 1 or more of the other Methuselahs (including you), where X is the number of Methuselahs in the game. Successful referendum means the chosen Methuselah loses that pool, and it is allocated as you chose.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Hunting ground. During your unlock phase, a ready vampire you control can gain 1 blood. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground each turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: As Parmenides enters play, your predator takes control of him until your next unlock phase. Blood cursed. +1 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock during your master phase to get +1 master phase action.

property.name: Text
property.value: [dem] (D) Lock a minion controlled by your prey. [DEM] As above, and this is a +1 stealth action.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If we resist our passions, it is due more to their weakness than to our strength. Francois de la Rouchefoucauld

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Put this card on this Nosferatu. This vampire gets 1 optional maneuver each combat. Once each combat, this vampire can burn 1 blood to gain flight [FLIGHT] until the end of the round. A vampire can have only one Patagia card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Demon or bird! (said the boy's soul) Walt Whitman, "Out of the Cradle Endlessly Rocking"

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. Cards requiring Quietus [qui] cost Assamites 1 fewer blood. Any minion can burn this card as a (D) action that inflicts 1 unpreventable environmental damage on acting vampires.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. Cards requiring Necromancy [nec] cost Giovanni 1 fewer blood. Any minion can burn this card as a (D) action that inflicts 1 unpreventable environmental damage on acting vampires.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. If a minion controlled by another Methuselah is burned, you can lock this card to search your library (shuffle afterward), hand, and/or ash heap for a master discipline card, put it on a ready vampire you control, and add 1 blood to that vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. During your master phase, you can burn 1 pool to unlock all infernal minions you control. Any minion can burn this card as a (D) action that inflicts 1 unpreventable environmental damage on acting vampires.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The devil can cite Scripture for his purpose. William Shakespeare, "The Merchant of Venice", act I, scene 3

property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. Cards requiring Spiritus [spi] cost Ahrimanes 1 fewer blood. Any minion can burn this card as a (D) action that inflicts 1 unpreventable environmental damage on acting vampires.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. If a non-Camarilla vampire you control sends an opposing vampire to torpor in combat, you can lock this card to put 1 torture counter on the opposing vampire. During your unlock phase, each Methuselah who controls any vampires with any torture counters burns 1 pool. Any minion can burn this card as a (D) action. After this card leaves play, burn all torture counters.

If you burned 3 or more pool for the scarce penalty for this vampire, you gain 3 pool. Cards requiring Obeah [obe] cost this Salubri 1 fewer blood. Any minion can burn this card as a (D) action. A vampire can have only one path.

While this True Brujah is acting, minions cannot play reaction cards requiring Presence [pre]. Minions opposing this True Brujah in combat cannot play cards requiring Presence. A vampire can have only one path.

During this vampire's unlock phase, his or her controller must discard a master card or lock this vampire. Burn this card if this vampire commits diablerie. A vampire can have only one path.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He's a dutiful servant around the chantry, but it's the time he's able to spend in solitude flying above the chantry on patrol that he seems to earnestly enjoy. Elisabetta Romano, Tremere

property.value: +1 stealth action. You can play only one Patronage each turn. Unlock this vampire and a younger Toreador antitribu.

property.value: Choose a vampire in torpor. Successful referendum means the chosen vampire is moved to the uncontrolled region (breaking any temporary control effects); any cards and counters on the chosen vampire stay with them but are out of play as long as the chosen vampire remains uncontrolled).

property.name: Text
property.value: Successful referendum means all weapons are burned. A Methuselah can keep any of his or her minions' weapons by repaying their pool cost to equip.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Is there peace between us, or is this just a pause to reload? Brujah, Los Angeles 2002 Winter Storyline

This action, all minions get -1 bleed and -1 strength. [obe] As [pre] above, and unlock this blocking vampire after action resolution. [OBE] As [obe] above, but all minions get -2 bleed and -2 strength and cannot use weapons.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. When this card is played, you can move a vampire from your ash heap to this card, face down. You can use a master phase action to add 1 blood to this vampire. If the blood on the vampire equals the vampire's capacity, put the vampire in the ready region at the end of the master phase and burn this card. Any minion can burn this card and move the vampire on it to the ash heap as a (D) action.

property.name: Text

property.value: Strength of mind and will is still strength. The Erciyes Fragments

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tegyrius did not raise his hands to fight against the inevitable. He did not scream.

property.name: Text

Move that action modifier card from your ash heap to your hand (discard down afterward). [CHI] Only usable when an action card requiring Chimerstry is put in play. Put this card on the action card. If the attached card would be burned, return it to your hand instead (discard down afterward).

property.value: Choose a ready ally. Successful referendum means the chosen ally is removed from the game.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's only forever It's not long at all Lost and lonely. David Bowie, "Underground"

property.value: [LotN] As above, but chose a vampire with a capacity below 4 to remove from the game.

Any vampire you control can burn this card to play the card on it as if from your hand and as if he or she had basic Melpominee. [MEL] As [mel] above, and the vampire can play the card as if he or she had superior Melpominee [MEL].

property.value: Requires a titled vampire. Choose a non-titled or an Anarch vampire. Successful referendum means this card is put on the chosen vampire. This vampire cannot gain a non-Anarch title and gets -1 stealth on (D) actions. A vampire can have only one Persona Non Grata.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whoever has the nerve, the willingness to sacrifice everything and anything, that person is most worthy of the obedience and respect of the others. Maximillian, Ventrue

Otherwise, the Methuselah revealing the highest cost steals 3 pool from the Methuselah revealing the lowest cost. All Methuselahs shuffle their crypts afterward.

property.name: Text
property.value: (D) Reveal the top card of your prey's crypt. If it is a Nosferatu, this vampire burns 2 blood. If its cost is 6 or less, this vampire gains 2 blood; if it is from 7 to 10, this vampire unlocks and bleeds your prey with +1 bleed as a +1 stealth (D) action; if it is 11 or more, this vampire burns 1 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: [nec] Move a vampire from your ash heap to your uncontrolled region. [NEC] Move a vampire from your ash heap to your ready region with 1 blood.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: My name is Legion; for we are many. Mark 5:9 (NRSV)

property.name: Text
property.value: Discipline. Put this card on a vampire. This vampire gets +1 level of Potence [pot] and +1 capacity. Cannot be put on a vampire with superior Potence [POT].

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:C, VTES:C, Sabbat:C, SW:C/PB/PL, FN:PG, CE:C, Anarchs:PAG, KMW:PAn, LoB:PG, Third:PB, KoT:PB

property.name: Artist
property.value: L. A. Williams; Randy Gallegos; John Bridges

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Put this card on a Gargoyle enslaved to this vampire's clan. If the attached Gargoyle is burned or sent to torpor in combat, he or she burns and inflicts 3 aggravated damage on the opposing minion and each retainer in combat. A minion can have only one Potio Martyrium.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [HttB] [Gargoyle] as above, but put this card on this Gargoyle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Strike: hand strike at +2 damage, and the opposing minion cannot strike this round (this does not affect the current strike resolution). If this strike is dodged, this striking minion takes 1 environmental damage during normal strike resolution and the opposing minion gets 1 optional press this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the action to equip with the Powder is successful, unlock the acting minion at the end of the turn. The bearer can burn this equipment before range is determined in a round of combat. If he or she does so, the opposing minion cannot use cards requiring Protean [pro] or Vicissitude [vic] Until the end of combat. If the opposing minion is a werewolf, he gets -2 strength until the end of combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an anarch. Usable even if there is no action. Not usable during your own turn. Lock this anarch and another ready anarch you control to cancel a library card as it is played.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [TR] As above, but you do not lock another anarch.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an anarch. [obt] Only usable when this anarch is blocked, before combat (if any). The blocking minion burns 2 blood or life. [pot] Only usable during a bleed action. +1 bleed that does not count against the limit. [pre] Only usable during a bleed action. +1 bleed, or +1 bleed and +1 stealth (limited).

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. Lock during the polling step of a political action to give each Lasombra you control +1 vote.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All political structure is based on power. Weber, "Wirtschaft und Gesellschaft"

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Put X blood on this card when it is played, where X is the capacity of a ready Sabbat vampire you control. During your unlock phase, you can move 1 blood from this card to your pool. Any vampire can burn this location as a (D) action; titled vampires get +1 stealth on that action. Burn this card when it has no blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. You can use a master phase action to add 1 blood to this card. Any Ventrue you control can move 1 blood from himself or herself to this card as a +1 stealth action. Lock and burn X blood from this card to give a Ventrue attempting to block a political action +X intercept. Any vampire can call a referendum to steal this card as a +1 stealth political action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock during any Methuselah's master phase to move 1 blood from a ready Giovanni or Laibon you control to your pool or from your pool to a ready vampire you control. Any Giovanni or Laibon can steal this location as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. During your unlock phase, you can add 1 blood to this card or move all the blood on this card to your pool. A vampire controlled by another Methuselah can move all the blood on this card to his or her controller's pool as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock during your discard phase to get +1 discard phase action. If you use that discard phase action to discard a card requiring an anarch or making a vampire Anarch, you can unlock a ready anarch. Any anarch controlled by another Methuselah can steal this location as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Requires a ready Laibon. You can lock this card during your master phase to choose a vampire you control. Once this turn, the chosen vampire can enter combat with a minion as a +1 stealth (D) action. Any vampire can steal this location as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. If this card has 3 or fewer counters during your unlock phase, you can add 1 counter to it. Lock during the polling step of any referendum to give a titled Sabbat vampire +1 vote for each counter on this card. Any vampire controlled by another Methuselah can burn all the counters from this card as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Put 5 blood on this card. During your unlock phase, move 1 blood from this card to your pool. Any Sabbat vampire controlled by another Methuselah can move all the blood on the Powerbase to his or her controller's pool as a (D) action. Burn this card when it has no blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. During your influence phase, you can add 1 blood to a vampire in your uncontrolled region. Any vampire can steal this location as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. You can use a master phase action to move 1 blood from this card to your pool, or to burn 1 pool to add 3 blood to this card. Any Sabbat vampire controlled by another Methuselah can move all the blood on this card to his or her controller's pool as a (D) action. Burn this card when the last blood on it is removed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. You can use a master phase action to add 1 counter to this card. Any Giovanni you control can move up to 2 blood from himself or herself to this card as a +1 stealth action. Lock and burn X counters from this card during the polling step of a political action to get +X votes. Any minion can burn all counters on this card as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Elysium. You can lock any other unique location you control to end combat involving an acting vampire you control before range is determined. Any vampire can steal this location as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Requires a ready Laibon. Lock to reduce the cost of a card you play by 1 pool (this location is not locked if that card is canceled as it is played). Any Laibon can steal this location as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. During your unlock phase, you can move up to 3 counters from your pool to this card and add 1 counter from the blood bank for each pool you move, or you can move 2 counters from this card to your pool. A vampire controlled by another Methuselah can move all the counters on this card to his or her controller's pool as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. While you have the Edge, any vampire you control can add 2 blood to a younger vampire in your uncontrolled region as a +1 stealth action; if that action is blocked, burn the Edge before combat (if any). Any Methuselah can burn the Edge during his or her master phase to steal this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a Seraph. Unique. Title. Put this card on a non-Black Hand Sabbat vampire with capacity 7 or more to represent the title of cardinal. Burn this card if you do not control a ready Seraph (or if the attached vampire otherwise loses the title).

property.name: Draft
property.value: [SoC] As above, but put this card on any Sabbat Vampire.

property.value: This was the being I was helping transfer to London where he might... create a new and ever-widening circle of semi demons... Bram Stoker, "Dracula"

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable if at least one card is contested. For each contested card, choose which Methuselah should yield. Successful referendum means the chosen Methuselahs yield as you chose.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: And the king said, "Divide the living child in two, and give half to the one, and half to the other." 1 Kings 3:25 (KJV)

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [cel] (D) Choose a card by name, and your prey must discard a copy of the chosen card, if possible. [CEL] As above, and if your prey discards a copy, this vampire can burn 1 blood to have your prey burn 1 pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: [aus] +1 intercept. [AUS] As above, and this vampire can prevent 1 damage during the first round of the resulting combat whenever they block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a poor sort of memory that only works backwards," remarked the Queen. Lewis Carroll, "Through the Looking Glass"

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [aus] Unlock a younger vampire or any ally. [AUS] Unlock any vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: [abo] [REFLEX] Cancel a frenzy card played on this vampire as it is played. [abo] +1 intercept. Only usable when a vampire is acting. [ABO] Only usable by a locked vampire when a vampire is acting. Unlock this reacting vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: [abo] [REFLEX] Cancel a frenzy card played on this vampire as it is played. [abo] Only usable during a bleed action. +1 bleed (limited). [ABO] As [abo] above, and non-mortal allies and vampires with capacity 4 or less cannot block this action.

property.name: Text
property.value: [abo] [REFLEX] Cancel a frenzy card played on this vampire as it is played. [abo] [ACTION MODIFIER] Only usable as the action is announced. +1 stealth, even if stealth is not yet needed. [ABO] [ACTION MODIFIER][COMBAT] Only usable when this vampire burns a minion controlled by your prey, either in combat or as a (D) action. Your prey burns 2 pool. A vampire can play only one Predator's Transformation at superior each action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Once each action, Prejudice can remove an ally or retainer in your prey's ash heap from the game to get +2 bleed. Scarce.

property.name: Text
property.value: Discipline. Put this card on a vampire. This vampire gets +1 level of Presence [pre] and +1 capacity. Cannot be put on a vampire with superior Presence [PRE].

property.value: Richard Thomas; Mike Dringenberg; Richard Thomas

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [thn] Move an ally in any ash heap who was burned from play to your ready region with this card and life equal to its starting life. This ally is a zombie instead of what it used to be, gets -1 bleed, cannot gain life, and can play cards requiring basic Fortitude [for] as a vampire. [THN] As above, but with 1 additional life.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Preston gets +1 bleed against a Methuselah who controls an ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: [cel] Strike: dodge. [CEL] Burn 1 blood to strike: combat ends.

property.name: Text
property.value: +2 stealth action. [pot] Put this card on this vampire. This vampire gets +1 strength. He or she cannot play Torn Signpost. A vampire can have only one Preternatural Strength. [POT] As above, but this vampire gets +2 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mortal with 1 life. This Follower of Set gets +1 bleed against a Methuselah who controls a ready Camarilla vampire. When the employer is bleeding, Camarilla vampires get -1 intercept. A vampire can have only one Priestess of Sekhmet.

property.name: Text
property.value: [aus] Strike: dodge. [AUS] Only usable by this acting vampire after the opposing minion has chosen his or her strike. Cancel this acting vampire's strike and choose a new one.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires an anarch. [aus] (D) Burn an equipment. [qui] (D) Burn 1 blood from an unlocked vampire and lock that vampire. [ser] (D) Steal 1 blood from a ready locked vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I am chaos. I am alive, and I tell you that you are free. Principia Discordia

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique contract. Trifle. Choose a ready Assamite you control, and put this card on a minion controlled by your prey. The chosen Assamite can enter combat with the attached minion as a +1 stealth (D) action. If the attached minion is about to leave the ready region, you can burn this card to gain 3 pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a titled, non-Red List vampire. Choose a Red List minion, and the chosen minion is no longer Red List.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Did it ever occur to you that I might not want archons crawling all over this? Hardestadt, Ventrue

property.name: Text
property.value: [dem] +1 stealth action. (D) Burn an ally or retainer. [DEM] (D) Put this card on any vampire. The attached vampire gets -1 stealth and -2 intercept. Any vampire(s) can burn this card with three +1 stealth actions. A vampire can have only one Prison of the Mind.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an archbishop, priscus, cardinal or regent. Only usable during the polling step of a political action before votes and ballots are cast. Non-Sabbat vampires cannot cast votes or ballots in this referendum.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What we decide is what happens. The rest is mere shadowplay, a puppet show. Francisco Domingo de Polonia, Lasombra

property.name: Text
property.value: Ghoul with 1 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed. Procurer can add 1 blood to a ready vampire you control as a +2 stealth action.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bring me blood! Blood! Give it to me! Sascha Vykos, Tzimisce

property.name: Text
property.value: [ACTION MODIFIER] [1 CONVICTION] Only usable as the action is announced. Vampires with capacity 6 or less and monster allies who cost 3 or fewer pool cannot block this action.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: YOUR CONVICTION WILL WALK BEFORE YOU.

property.name: Text
property.value: [cel] Strike: 1R damage or use a ranged weapon strike. This strike cannot be dodged. [CEL] As above, with 1 additional strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Talley tsked. He placed the pebble in the palm of his left hand and squinted, making sure that his aim was true. Lifting his hand, he concentrated for a second and then flicked the pebble right at the center of the Nosferatu's misshapen back.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable when this Giovanni is about to enter combat with a Camarilla vampire, or is the target of a Camarilla vampire's (D) action, or during the polling step of a political action called by a Camarilla vampire in the terms of which this Giovanni is chosen. Usable by a locked Giovanni. End the action. (Do not lock this vampire if they are blocking.)

property.name: Text
property.value: [pre] (D) Bleed with +1 bleed. Titled vampires cannot block this action. [PRE] As above, and the target Methuselah locks a ready unlocked minions he or she controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is the absolute right of the State to supervise the formation of public opinion. Paul Joseph Goebbels

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an anarch. Only usable after a successful (D) action. Put this card in play. You can burn this card during the polling step of a political action to get +2 votes.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. Lock during your master phase to look at your prey's hand and give control of this card to your prey. Any Methuselah can burn this card during his or her unlock phase by revealing his or her hand.

property.value: Discipline. Put this card on a vampire. This vampire gets +1 level of Protean [pro] and +1 capacity. Cannot be put on a vampire with superior Protean [PRO].

property.name: Text
Text
property.value: Put this card in play. You do not burn more than 2 pool when a minion bleeds you, regardless of the amount of the bleed. Burn this card after a minion you control successfully bleeds.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [Third, KoT] As above, but don't burn this card unless your minion bleeds for 2 or more.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an anarch. +1 intercept, with an additional +1 intercept if the acting vampire is titled.

property.name: Text
property.value: Investment. Put this card in play with 5 blood. You can use a master phase action to move 1 blood from this card to your pool. Burn this card when it has no blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable after a combat involving this ready Assamite and an opposing minion who is not ready with a contract naming this Assamite. Usable by a locked vampire. Fill this Assamite to full capacity with blood from the blood bank, and the contract is burned if still in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Out-of-turn. Only usable when you move a Giovanni from your uncontrolled region to your ready region during your influence phase. Put this card on that Giovanni. This Giovanni gets +1 level of Potence [pot], +1 level of Fortitude [for] and +1 capacity. Add 1 blood to this Giovanni.

property.name: Text
property.value: [pre] Only usable during a bleed action. Burn 1 pool to get +1 bleed (limited). [mal] Choose any minion. The chosen minion cannot play reaction cards (including [REACTION] abilities of power cards) this action. [mal] is not a Discipline. [MAL] As [mal] above, and the chosen minion cannot block this action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable by a vampire attempting to block. [chi] Cancel an action modifier requiring Chimerstry [chi] or Obfuscate [obf] as it is played. [CHI] As above, and the acting minion cannot use cards requiring Chimerstry or Obfuscate in the resulting combat whenever this vampire blocks.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: My gracious lord, you do forget yourself; These are but shadows, not substantial. Christopher Marlowe, "Doctor Faustus"

property.name: Text
property.value: [cel] Press. [CEL] Only usable when both combatants are still ready and combat is about to end. After this round, begin another combat with the opposing minion.

property.name: Text
property.value: [aus] Strike: 1R damage. Any effect that would make damage from this strike aggravated leaves the damage normal instead. If this striking vampire is Black Hand, the damage from this strike is unpreventable. [AUS] As above, but for 2R damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [aus] Put this card on a minion you control. The attached minion gets +2 intercept. Burn this card during your unlock phase. [AUS] Put this card in play. Minions you control get +1 intercept. Burn this card during your unlock phase.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Darkness and glory rejoicingly blending, Earth rising to heaven and heaven descending... Emily Bronte, "High-Waving Heather"

property.name: Text
property.value: [obf] Vampires you control get +1 stealth this turn. [OBF] Minions you control get +1 stealth this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ...didst enter, wildly dancing, through The doorways of my sense unlatched To make my spirit thy domain... Baudelaire, "The Vampire"

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable when an ally or younger vampire blocks, before locking the blocking minion. [pre] Cancel the current action and unlock this acting vampire. [dai] The block fails, and the action continues. The blocking minion cannot attempt to block this action again. [DAI] As [dai] above, and the blocking minion takes 1 unpreventable environmental damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a non-Red List, non-Anarch vampire. (D) Choose a non-titled non-Red List minion who either has successfully bled for 3 or more pool since your last turn, or is infernal or anarch. The chosen minion becomes Red List.

property.name: Text
property.value: [pre] (D) Bleed with +2 bleed. [PRE] As above, and if the bleed is successful (for 1 or more), add 1 blood to a vampire in your uncontrolled region.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a titled Sabbat vampire. Choose a ready younger vampire controlled by another Methuselah. Successful referendum means this vampire steals 3 blood from the chosen vampire.

property.value: Sabbat: Pugfar can burn 1 blood to give a Tremere antitribu you control 1 press. Flight [FLIGHT]. Tremere antitribu slave.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable at close range at the end of a round of combat in which this minion inflicted more damage at close range than the opposing vampire. Not usable by a minion being burned or going to torpor. Put this card on the opposing vampire, and inflict 1 damage on him or her. The attached vampire cannot hunt; if he or she must hunt, he or she goes to torpor. Any vampire(s) can burn this card with two +1 stealth actions. A vampire can have only one Pulled Fangs.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during the polling step of a political action. [dom] Force a younger vampire to abstain (this can cancel that vampire's votes and ballots). [DOM] As above, but the vampire can be the same age or older.

property.value: Pull the strings! Pull the strings! The Puppetmaster, "Glen or Glenda?"

property.name: Text

[THN] (D) As above, but that ally or retainer can be controlled by another Methuselah; steal him or her.

property.value: Sometimes at that moment a wave of light breaks into our darkness... as though a voice says, "You are accepted." Paul Johannes Tillich, "The Shaking of the Foundations"

property.value: Unique location. During your master phase, you can move 1 counter from your pool to this card and add 1 counter from the blood bank. Lock to use these counters to pay some or all of the blood or pool cost of an equipment when equipping a minion.

property.value: Unique location. Put X currency counters on this card when it is played, where X is the number of Ravnos you control. When a Ravnos you control performs an action, you can use these currency counters toward the cost in blood (but not pool) of the action card. Burn this card when it has no counters.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a slave. (D) Put this card in play and move a vampire in torpor to this card, out of play. A vampire you control to whom this Gargoyle is enslaved can remove that vampire from the game as a +1 stealth action to turn this card into a Gargoyle with the same capacity, Fortitude [for], Potence [pot], Visceratika [vis] and flight [FLIGHT], enslaved to the acting vampire's clan.

Burn this card to cancel either a (D) action against this imbued requiring Chimerstry [chi], Dementation [dem], Dominate [dom], Presence [pre], or Serpentis [ser] or a strike card requiring any of those Disciplines played by a minion opposing this imbued as it is announced, and its cost is not paid.

This vampire can burn this card as a +1 stealth action. [CHI] (D) Move a locked younger vampire to the uncontrolled region (breaking any temporary control effects); any cards and counters on that vampire stay with them but are out of play as long as that vampire remains uncontrolled.

property.value: Only one Reality Mirror can be played in a game. Play a combat card from the opposing minion's controller's ash heap as if from your hand. Remove this ally from the game when it has no pathos counters. This ally can play combat cards requiring basic Fortitude [for] as a vampire. property.value: Requires a Red List minion. Only usable after a diablerie action is successful. A vampire can play only one Rebirth each turn. No blood hunt can be called, and this vampire unlocks.

property.value: Gehenna. Requires at least 2 other Gehenna events in play. Do not replace as long as this card is in play. During each Methuselah's unlock phase, if that Methuselah controls three or more vampires of the same clan, they burn one such vampire. If that vampire's capacity is 6 or more, that Methuselah becomes immune to the effects of this card until the end of the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an Independent or Anarch vampire with capacity 5 or more. Allocate 6 points among two or more other Methuselahs. Successful referendum means each Methuselah burns 1 pool for each point allocated.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Ventrue antitribu in your uncontrolled region gains 1 blood.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: How fast has brother followed brother, From sunshine to sunless land! William Wordsworth, "Extempore Effusion Upon the Death of James Hogg"

property.value: Search your crypt for any vampire, reveal them, and move them to your uncontrolled region (shuffle afterward).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Follow me and I shall show you the way to victory. Aurora Van Brande, Paladin, Lasombra

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a Black Hand vampire. Draw 1 card from your crypt and reveal it. Add 1 blood from the blood bank to it if it is a Black Hand vampire.

property.value: +1 stealth action. Only usable by a vampire in torpor. Usable by a locked vampire. Leave torpor. If this action is blocked, there is no combat and if the blocking minion can commit diablerie, he or she can diablerize this acting vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Earth helped him with the cry of blood. Sir John Beaumont, "Battle of Bosworth Field"

[tem] As [pre] above, but choose an ally or younger vampire. [TEM] As [tem] above, and burn 1 blood to lock the chosen minion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Never mistake motion for action. Ernest Hemingway

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable when this vampire is blocked, before block resolution. [chi] Unlock this vampire, and the action ends (unsuccessfully). If an action card was used to perform the action, return it to your hand (discard down afterward). Your vampires cannot take the same action again this turn (discard down afterward). [CHI] As above, but lock the blocking minion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In some cases -- very many, it seems -- illusion was quite preferable to reality. Victoria Ash

property.value: Requires a titled, non-Red List vampire. (D) Choose a ready ally or a ready younger vampire, and the chosen minion becomes Red List. The chosen minion cannot attempt to block this action.

That vampire is not burned, put this card on that vampire and steal him or her instead. This vampire is Independent. This vampire gets 1 optional press in combat with a Camarilla vampire and can enter combat with a Camarilla vampire as a +1 stealth (D) action. Burn this card if the vampire changes sects.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable by a vampire that would be burned. Usable by a vampire in torpor. Usable by a locked vampire. [vic] This vampire goes to torpor instead. [VIC] As above, and this vampire gains 2 blood.

property.value: O! that this too, too solid flesh would melt... William Shakespeare, "Hamlet", act I, scene 2

property.value: Choose any Methuselah. Successful referendum means the chosen Methuselah gets the Edge.

property.value: Out-of-turn. Give this card to another Methuselah during his or her unlock phase and move a reaction card from that Methuselah's ash heap to this card. The chosen reaction card costs the vampires controlled by that Methuselah 1 additional blood. That Methuselah can use a master phase action to move 1 counter from his or her pool to this card. Burn this card when it has 2 counters. A Methuselah can have only one Regarhagan's Hold.

property.value: +1 stealth action. Only usable by a vampire in torpor. [for] Gain 4 blood. If this action is blocked, there is no combat and if the blocking minion can commit diablerie, he or she can diablerize this acting vampire. [FOR] As above, but gain 5 blood.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though their flesh appears weak and withered, their blood is strong. The Stiffs heal much faster than other Cainites.

Any Sabbat vampire with a different controller can enter combat with this vampire as a (D) action. If a Sabbat vampire diablerizes this vampire, move this card to the diablerist (before the blood hunt is called).

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent. 2 votes (titled): Allies and retainers cost Regina 1 fewer blood or pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: A vampire can play only one Rego Motus each round. [tha] Prevent 2 damage from the opposing minion's strike. [THA] Prevent 4 damage from the opposing minion's strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: While Reiner is ready, master discipline cards can be played as trifles.

property.name: Text

Successful referendum means each chosen Methuselah chooses and shuffles up to 3 library cards from his or her ash heap in his or her library. Remove this card from the game, even if the action is canceled or blocked or the referendum fails.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only one Reins of Power can be played or called in a game. Successful referendum means each Methuselah can choose a ready vampire they control. Each Methuselah gains 6 pool, then burns pool equal to the capacity of their predator's chosen vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: If this imbued has fewer life than his or her starting life during your unlock phase, he or she gains 1 life. [ACTION] [1 CONVICTION] +1 stealth action. Add 1 blood to any vampire or 1 life to another ally, not to exceed starting life.

property.name: Text
property.value: [nec] (D) Burn an ally or retainer controlled by your prey. [NEC] As above, and this is a +1 stealth action.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Self is the only prison that can ever bind the soul. Henry Van Dyke, "The Prison and the Angel"

property.name: Text
property.value: [pot] Press. [POT] Press, and if another round of combat occurs, you get +2 hand size this combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: [for] Prevent 1 damage. [thn] Press. [THN] Only usable when both combatants are still ready and combat would end. Burn 1 blood to start a new round instead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. During your unlock phase, choose Abombwe [abo], Animalism [ani] or Fortitude [for]. Until your next unlock phase, this Akunanse gets +1 level of the chosen Discipline. This Akunanse gets +1 bleed and +1 capacity.

property.name: Text
property.value: If the bearer is a ready Laibon during your unlock phase, you can look at the top card of any Methuselah's library. If the card does not require a Discipline, reveal it, and this Laibon can burn 1 blood to look at that Methuselah's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose an Assamite in your ash heap or burn 1 pool to choose an Assamite in your uncontrolled region. Remove the chosen Assamite from the game or burn this reliquary. Once each turn, except during combat, if the Assamite bearer is ready, he or she can burn 1 blood to give you +2 hand size until the end of the turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 hand size while the bearer is a ready Laibon. This Laibon can discard up to three cards from your hand as a +1 stealth action. A minion can have only one Reliquary: Trinket.

property.value: Unique werewolf with 5 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed. Requires a magaji. This ally gets +1 strength for each life it has. This ally can enter combat with a minion as a (D) action. If any effect inflicts more than 2 damage on this ally, ignore the excess. If this ally has 4 or fewer life during your unlock phase, it gains 1 life.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card on a Black Hand vampire. This vampire can lock any card (including a minion) as a +1 stealth (D) action. A vampire can have only one Remover.

property.name: Text
property.value: Werewolf with 3 life. 2 strength, 0 bleed. Renegade Garou gets 1 additional strike each round. He gets 1 optional maneuver each combat. He can enter combat with a minion as a +1 stealth (D) action. If Renegade Garou has 2 or fewer life during your unlock phase, he gains 1 life.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [for] Put this card on this vampire. If this vampire is in torpor during your unlock phase, you can burn this card to move him or her to your ready region. A vampire can have only one Renewed Vigor. [obe] Move a vampire in torpor to his controller's ready region, or restore an ally or retainer to his or her starting life (with life from the blood bank). [OBE] Fill another vampire to full capacity with blood from the blood bank.

property.name: Text
property.value: +3 stealth action. [for] Put this card on this vampire. In combat, this vampire can heal aggravated damage by burning 3 blood per point healed. Burn this card if this vampire is in torpor. [FOR] As above, but burn only 2 blood per point.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique ghoul with 1 life. 0 strength, 0 bleed. If the action to recruit Repo Man is successful, unlock this acting minion at the end of the turn. Repo Man can retrieve the first vehicle you find in your library as a +2 stealth action (shuffle afterward). You then put the vehicle on a ready minion you control who meets the requirements of the card (pay cost to equip as normal). If none of your ready minions meet the requirements of the card, the card is burned without cost.

property.name: Text
property.value: [pre] Only usable as the action is announced. Whenever this action is blocked, this vampire gets 1 optional maneuver, only usable to maneuver to long range, in the resulting combat. [obe] +1 stealth. [OBE] Put this card on this vampire. This vampire gets +1 stealth. Burn this card if this vampire is in torpor. This vampire cannot have or play another Repulsion.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Methuselah can play only one Research in a game. Search your library for three cards (shuffle afterward) and move them face down to your research area (you can look at the cards in your research area at any time).

property.name: Draft
property.value: [HttB] As above, but place the cards on top of your library.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [for] Put this card on this vampire. When another minion plays an action or combat card requiring Dementation [dem], Dominate [dom], Obeah [obe] or Serpentis [ser], this vampire can burn 1 blood. If he or she does so, that card has no effect on him or her. [FOR] As above, and unlock this vampire at the end of this action.

property.name: Text
property.value: [cel] [COMBAT] Press, or maneuver with 1 optional press. [CEL] [ACTION MODIFIER] +1 stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: [ACTION] (D) Inflict 1 damage on a vampire with capacity 5 or less. If this action is successful, you can move one conviction [1 CONVICTION] from your hand or ash heap to this imbued. [ACTION] [1 CONVICTION] +1 stealth action. Add 1 blood to any vampire or 1 life to another ally, not to exceed starting life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Manipulation is a double-edged sword. William "Violin99" Hannon, Hermit

property.name: Text
property.value: Mortal with 1 life. The employer can prevent 1 damage each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Graunt that no Hobgoblins fright me, No hungrie devils rise up and bite me. John Day, 17th c. prayer

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [for] Gain 2 blood. [FOR] Gain 3 blood.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Drive my dead thoughts over the universe, Like wither'd leaves, to quicken a new birth... Percy Bysshe Shelley, "Ode to the West Wind"

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:C, VTES:C, Sabbat:C, SW:PV2, FN:PR3, CE:PV2, Anarchs:PAG/PG, KMW:PAn2, Third:C

property.name: Text
property.value: Gehenna. Do not replace until a vampire successfully hunts. Vampires cannot hunt unless forced to hunt. A vampire who must hunt can hunt by stealing 1 blood from a younger vampire as a (D) action instead of performing the usual hunt action.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sword of time will pierce our skins. It does not hurt when it begins. But as it works its way on in, The pain grows stronger; watch it grin. Mike Altman and Johnny Mandel, "Suicide is Painless"

property.name: Text
property.value: [dem] (D) Put this card on an ally. The attached ally does not unlock as normal. His or her controller can burn 1 pool during his or her unlock phase to unlock the attached ally. [DEM] (D) Steal an ally controlled by another Methuselah.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [Third] [dem] (D) Bleed at +1 bleed. Allies cannot block this action.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [nec] Only usable by a vampire in torpor. Leave torpor. If this action is blocked, there is no combat and if the blocking minion can commit diablerie, he or she can diablerize this acting vampire. [NEC] Rescue a vampire from torpor.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Only usable if an ally or retainer has been burned from play since your last turn. [val] Move the ally or retainer card from your ash heap to your hand. [obe] Move the retainer card from its Methuselah's ash heap to this vampire, with life equal to its starting life. If it requires a Discipline, use the basic level. [OBE] As [obe] above, but move the ally card instead and put it in your ready region, unlocked.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [cel][qui] Put this card on this vampire. Blood this vampire spends to play cards requiring Celerity [cel] or Quietus [qui] is put on this card instead of the blood bank. During your unlock phase, move 1 blood from this card to this vampire. [CEL][QUI] As above, but move 2 blood from this card to this vampire during your unlock phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Methuselah can play only one Retribution in a game. Choose a minion who has successfully bled you for 2 or more pool since your last turn. The chosen minion takes 3 unpreventable environmental damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: (D) Bleed. After you successfully bleed your prey (for 1 or more), put this card on this vampire. Burn this card after this vampire loses any blood or goes to torpor, or if your prey is ousted. During your unlock phase, this vampire is removed from the game and your prey burns X pool, where X is this vampire's capacity. {Added to the V:EKN banned list on the 14th of March, 1999.}

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a Black Hand vampire. Add 2 blood to a Black Hand vampire in your uncontrolled region.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during a bleed action. [ser] +1 bleed (limited). [SER] Burn 1 of your corruption counters from a minion controlled by the target Methuselah to get +3 bleed against that Methuselah (limited).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: she thinks love is a cold thing but i've got plans for her to bleed. Stew, "Miss Satan"

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable when this vampire blocks a minion controlled by your predator, before combat (if any). [ser] The acting minion burns 1 blood or life. [SER] Put 1 corruption counter on the acting minion. If the number of your corruption counters on the minion equals or exceeds his or her capacity or cost, you can burn them to steal him or her.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [ser] (D) Lock a ready minion controlled by your prey. [SER] As above, and put 1 corruption counter on that minion. If the number of your corruption counters on the minion equals or exceeds his or her capacity or cost, you can burn them to steal him or her.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a non-sterile non-Caitiff vampire. Put this card on a younger Caitiff. The attached vampire is considered the same clan as the acting vampire. He or she gets +1 capacity.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable at the end of a round in which the opposing minion inflicted 2 or more damage or any aggravated damage (even if it was prevented). A vampire can play only one Revelation of Wrath each round. [ser] Put 1 corruption counter on the opposing minion. [SER] As above, and put 1 additional corruption counter if the opposing minion inflicted 3 or more damage or 2 or more aggravated damage this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [aus] (D) Look at your prey's hand, and discard 1 card from it. [AUS] Put this card in play. Your prey plays with an open hand. Any minion can burn this card as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ghoul with 2 life. The employer gets +1 intercept.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Reverend Adams gets -1 stealth on political actions. Older vampires do not lock for blocking him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: During your master phase, you can look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of Gehenna events in play. Older vampires do not lock for blocking Reverend Adams.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat bishop: Damaging strikes made by Reverend Blackwood requiring Thaumaturgy [tha] inflict +1 damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Successful referendum means direction of play is reversed. Prey is still to the left, however.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: O Fortune, you are like the moon: ever waxing and waning. Carl Orff, "Carmina Burana"

property.name: Text
property.value: Successful referendum means this card is put in play and each Assamite can choose to become Camarilla. As any Assamite enters play, he or she can choose to become Camarilla. The Assamite clan is a Camarilla clan.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Baron. Choose X ready unlocked anarchs you control and allocate 2X points among one or more Methuselahs, locations, and equipment. Successful referendum means each chosen anarch is locked, each Methuselah burns 1 pool for each point allocated, and each location or equipment allocated a point is burned.

property.name: Text
property.value: (D) Burn a location and burn 2 pool from its controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cities and Thrones and Powers, Stand in Time's eye, Almost as long as flowers, Which daily die Rudyard Kipling, "Puck of Pook's Hill"

property.name: Text
property.value: [pre] Reduce a bleed against you by 1. [tem] Cancel an action card as it is played (the acting minion is not locked). [TEM] Usable by a ready unlocked vampire even though there is no action. Cancel a non-out-of-turn master card as it is played during another Methuselah's master phase, and its cost is not paid. That Methuselah gets +1 master phase action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Combat cards cost Rex 1 additional blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Richard gets -1 intercept against Lasombra and Tzimisce.

card.name: Richter, The Templar of Du Mont

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: If Rico is ready and has a Bomb during your unlock phase, burn the Bomb and another ready minion you control takes 2 damage. If he is ready during your master phase, move a Bomb from your hand or ash heap to him (no cost) or he takes 1 damage. Black Hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: (D) Put this card on an ally or younger vampire who is not Malkavian or Malkavian antitribu with X counters on this card, where X is half this acting vampire's capacity rounded down. The attached minion burns 1 counter from this card instead of unlocking as normal. Burn this card when it has no counters. There can be only one Riddle Phantastique in play. [Burn Option]

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: If Rigby attempts to block a Sabbat vampire and fails, and any of the bishops controlled by your predator is not at full capacity, move 1 blood from Rigby to one of those bishops.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable if this vampire is ready and the opposing minion is not. Put this card on this vampire. This vampire gets +2 bleed. Burn this card if this vampire is about to leave the ready region. A vampire can have only one Righteous Aura.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat priscus: Righteous gets +1 intercept against infernal minions and +1 strength in combat with an infernal minion.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. A minion can play only one Rigor Mortis each round. [pre] The opposing minion cannot use additional strikes this round. [thn] As [pre] above, with 1 optional press. [THN] As [thn] above, and once each round, you can cancel 1 maneuver used by the opposing minion.

property.name: Text
property.value: Not usable during the first round of combat. [cel] Strike: combat ends, and inflict 1 unpreventable damage on the opposing minion after combat ends if the range is close. [CEL] As above, but inflict 2 unpreventable damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires an infernal minion. Unique. Put this card in play. Your prey burns 1 pool at the end of each action in which you have burned corruption counters. Any Methuselah can burn a vampire he or she controls with corruption counters during his or her unlock phase to burn this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gehenna. Requires at least 1 other Gehenna event in play. Do not replace until a vampire becomes a Liaison. Any Independent vampire can become liaison as an action. Liaison is a unique Independent title worth 4 votes. If this title would be contested with a younger vampire, the younger vampire immediately yields instead of contesting.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gehenna. Requires at least 2 other Gehenna events in play. Do not replace until your prey is ousted. A Methuselah cannot gain pool during their own turn unless they have the Edge or at least 1 victory point (any pool they would gain goes to the blood bank instead).

property.name: Draft
property.value: [HttB] As above, but does not require two other Gehenna cards in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Put this card on this Gangrel. This vampire gets +1 strength. A vampire can have only one Ritual Challenge. [Burn Option]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The teeth that bite to bitterness are sheathed in truth. William Everson, "The Poet is Dead"

property.name: Text
property.value: Each ready vampire you control gains blood equal to the amount of blood on a vampire being burned either by diablerie or in combat with this vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. This Nagaraja gets +1 hunt. This Nagaraja can inflict 1 unpreventable damage on a mortal (ally or retainer) to gain 2 blood as a (D) action.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [HttB] [Salubri antitribu] As above, but for this Salubri antitribu.

property.name: Text

property.name: Text
property.value: Gargoyle creature with 4 life. 3 strength, 0 bleed. Rock Cat can enter combat with a minion as a (D) action. Opposing vampires with capacity 3 or less cannot strike in the first round. Rock Cat gets 1 optional press each combat. Rock Cat can play cards requiring basic Potence [pot] as a 3-capacity vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: [tha] Strike: dodge. [vis] Prevent half the damage rounded up from the opposing minion's strike. (Doing this twice would prevent all damage from the strike.) [VIS] As [vis] above, and prevent half the damage rounded up from each of the opposing minion's strikes this combat. A vampire can play only one Rockheart at superior each combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: While Roderick is ready, your minions get +1 stealth on equip actions.

property.name: Text
property.value: Trifle. Put this card on a vampire who has committed diablerie since your last turn. Any vampire can enter combat with this vampire as a (D) action; vampires with Auspex [aus] get +1 stealth on that action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do not replace until after combat. A minion can play only one Roll each round. [FLIGHT] Maneuver. If this minion is still ready when you would replace this card, you can move this card from your ash heap to your hand instead.

property.value: [for] Prevent 1 damage. [FOR] Burn 1 blood to prevent all damage from the opposing minion's strikes this round.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dark-eyed ancient tribe that never rests Took up the age-old journey yesterday... Baudelaire, "Gypsies on the Road"

property.value: [cel] +1 intercept. Not usable if the acting minion has Celerity [cel]. [CEL] +1 intercept. Not usable if the acting minion has superior Celerity [CEL].

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just follow. If you can't see, listen. If you can't hear, feel. Philip Pullman, "The Amber Spyglass"

Put this card on a vampire in combat when an opposing minion attempts to inflict aggravated damage on him or her (whether the damage would be successfully inflicted or not). Combat ends. This vampire is locked and sent to torpor. This vampire does not unlock as normal. Burn this card during this vampire's unlock phase.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Under heavy loads of trampled clay, Lie bodies of the vampires full of blood; Their shrouds are bloody, and their lips are wet. Yeats, "Oil and Blood"

property.value: Requires a Sabbat vampire. (D) Enter combat with a minion. You get +1 hand size in that combat. If this acting vampire is not ready at the end of the action, you burn 1 pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If ever the public was betrayed by its press, it's ours. Mark Twain

property.value: Sabbat: Rurik gets 1 optional press each combat. While Ludmijla Rakoczy is ready, Rurik gets +1 bleed.

After this turn, this vampire can unlock during your minion phase. A vampire can have only one Rutor's Hand. [THA] As above, but this vampire can burn 3 blood to avoid taking this aggravated damage.

property.value: Camarilla: Ventrue get -1 intercept against Ruxandra. You can use a discard phase action and lock her to discard any number of cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an archbishop, cardinal or regent. Choose a non-Inquisitor Sabbat vampire. Successful referendum means this card is put on the chosen vampire. The attached vampire is an Inquisitor and gets +1 bleed. They can look at the top card of any Methuselah's crypt as a (D) action; if it is a vampire with Thaumaturgy [tha], burn that card. Any Sabbat vampire can call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Sabbat vampire. Choose a ready Sabbat vampire. Successful referendum means that until the end of the game, any vampire attempting to block the chosen vampire burns 1 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a prince or justicar. Choose one or more Methuselahs. Successful referendum means each chosen Methuselah gets 1 threat counter. Each Methuselah burns 1 pool for each threat counter he or she has during his or her unlock phase. A Methuselah can have no more than 2 threat counters, and he or she can burn the Edge to burn all threat counters he or she has.

property.value: Camarilla: During your unlock phase, you can move 1 blood from Sabine to any Tremere.

[OBF] (D) As above, but burn a vampire in another Methuselah's torpor region.
