property.value: dai AUS FOR OBE THA VAL

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Damage Baali inflict on Saulot is reduced to 0. During your unlock phase, you can move 2 blood from him to any vampire in your uncontrolled region or in play. Scarce. +1 bleed. +1 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Laibon. [cel] Burn 1 blood to get +1 intercept. [CEL] Not usable by a blocking Laibon. Lock this Laibon or an Aye on him or her to unlock another ready Laibon.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable by an unlocked vampire not involved in the current combat during the press step if both combatants are still ready. Only one Save Face can be played each combat. Choose a younger vampire of the same clan who is involved in the combat. The chosen vampire gets 1 mandatory press, only usable to continue combat. If the chosen combatant is still ready after the combat ends, he or she gains 1 blood.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Better that we should die fighting than be outraged and dishonored. Better to die than to live in slavery. Emmeline Pankhurst

property.name: Text
property.value: Weapon: gun. Strike: 3R damage, only usable once each combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: If Sayshila is ready during the polling step of any referendum, she can lock to give another titled vampire you control +2 votes. Minions opposing her in combat cannot press to continue combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during the polling step of a political action. [cel][pre] Choose a vampire who has cast votes in this referendum. The chosen vampire is locked and abstains (this cancels the chosen vampire's votes and ballots). [CEL][PRE] As above, and the chosen vampire burns 1 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique mortal with 3 life. 0 strength, 1 bleed. Scapelli can strike: 2R damage. Scapelli gets an optional press each combat, only usable to continue combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [nec] Move a minion card from your ash heap to the top of your library. [myt] Search your library for a minion card (shuffle afterward), reveal it, and move it to the top of your library. [MYT] As [myt] above, with an additional +1 stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Ammo. Only usable before resolution of a gun's strike. No more than one ammo card can be used on a gun each combat. Each strike this combat, this gun inflicts +2 damage at close range and -2 damage at long range.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tara fired once, blindly, over the table and into the doorway. Her objective wasn't actually to hit anyone (though she certainly wouldn't mind), but to keep the thin-bloods back for another moment.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Unique. Put this card in play and if this Nosferatu's capacity is 6 or more, unlock him or her. If a referendum succeeds, you can lock this card to look at any Methuselah's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: When Schuyler is blocked, your prey can move a library card from their ash heap to the top of their library.

property.name: Text
property.value: [pre] Reduce a bleed against you by 1. [str] The acting minion gets -1 stealth. [str] is not a Discipline. [STR] As [str] above, and the action fails unless the acting minion burns 1 blood or life.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during the polling step of a political action. Any Methuselah casting (including having a vampire casting) at least 1 vote or ballot against the referendum burns 1 pool once results are tallied.

property.name: Text
property.value: [ani] Strike: hand strike at +1 damage. [ANI] As above, and this strike cannot be dodged.

property.name: Text
property.value: [qui] Strike: hand strike or use a melee weapon strike and put this card on the opposing minion. This minion gets -1 strength (after the current strike resolution step). Any vampire can burn this card as a +1 stealth action. A minion can have only one Scorpion's Touch. [QUI] As above, and this minion burns 1 blood or life during his or her unlock phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a titled vampire. Choose a vampire of the same sect. Successful referendum means this card is put on the chosen vampire and this acting vampire unlocks. This vampire can enter combat with a vampire with capacity 4 or less or with an ally as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Frenzy. Only usable against a vampire or werewolf. [cel][pre] Strike: X-2 ranged damage, where X is this vampire's capacity minus the target's capacity or cost. If more than 4 damage is inflicted with this strike, ignore the excess. [CEL][PRE] As above, with 1 optional maneuver.

property.name: Text
property.value: During your discard phase, you can burn a vampire with capacity 2 or less, and your predator takes control of this card (even if you do not burn a vampire).

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent. 2 votes (titled): During your unlock phase, Scout can burn 2 blood to lock an ally or younger vampire controlled by your prey. Reaction cards cost her 1 additional blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: [dom] (D) Bleed with +1 bleed. [DOM] +1 stealth action. Add 2 blood to a younger vampire in your uncontrolled region.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's amazing how trusting these Camarilla bastards can be. Jimmy Dunn, Pander

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose any Methuselah. Successful referendum means each Methuselah burns 1 pool and the chosen Methuselah burns 1 additional pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Masquerade is unraveling as the mysticism of the mortals increases. V.T., Vampire: The Masquerade

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your library, and move up to 2 of them to your hand (shuffle and discard down afterward).

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during a (D) action against you (or a card you control). [tha] +1 intercept. [vis] As [tha] above, with 1 optional maneuver during the resulting combat whenever this vampire blocks. [VIS] Cancel an action card or action modifier card requiring Chimerstry [chi] or Obfuscate [obf] as it is played, and its cost is not paid.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable after this vampire successfully bleeds a Methuselah. [aus] Look at the next 7 cards in that Methuselah's library. [AUS] As above, and if any of those cards are action cards that can be used to bleed, you can burn 1 of them.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Only usable by a vampire with capacity 6 or more. This vampire can bleed with +1 bleed as a (D) action. If it has 3 or fewer counters during your unlock phases, add 1 counter to this card. The first 2 counters each grant this vampire one level of Dominate [dom]. The next 2 each grant this vampire one level of Fortitude [for]. Burn all counters from this card if another minion takes control of it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: During the polling step of any referendum, Sean can lock or burn 1 blood to get +2 votes. He can burn any boon as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. Lock during your master phase to make a ready non-titled, non-Anarch vampire you control Anarch.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Allies and retainers cost Sebastien 1 fewer blood or pool. Once each action, he can burn 1 blood to get +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Sebastien gets +1 stealth on recruit and employ actions. [MERGED] He can steal an ally or retainer as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: An imbued can burn only one Second Sight for the following effects each action. Burn when a monster is acting to give this imbued +1 intercept for that action. Burn when this imbued announces an action to give monsters -1 intercept against that action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a prince or justicar. +2 intercept. Also usable by a locked prince or justicar, even if intercept is not yet needed, to burn 1 blood to unlock and attempt to block with +2 intercept.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: None may challenge thy word while in thy domain.

property.name: Text
property.value: Investment. Put this card in play with 2X blood. You can use a master phase action to move 1 blood from this card to your pool. Burn this card when it has no blood.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Sabbat:C, SW:C, CE:C/PN, Anarchs:PG, LoB:PA, Third:PB

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. You can draw a card after you successfully bleed your prey (discard down afterward).

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Laibon. Choose an ally or retainer, or up to two allies or retainers if this Laibon is a magaji. Successful referendum means the chosen allies and retainers are burned, and their controllers burn 1 pool (each Methuselah burns no more than 1 pool, regardless of the total number of allies and retainers chosen).

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card on a ready minion you control. If this minion is the target of a (D) action while he or she is ready, you can burn this card to have the action fail. A minion can have only one Secret Passage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Haven. Put this card on a minion you control. This minion cannot be the target of other Methuselahs' actions. Any Methuselah burns 1 additional pool when playing master cards on (or that target) this minion. Burn this card if this minion is in torpor. A minion can have only one haven.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: DS:C2, FN:PS, CE:PM, Anarchs:PAB, Third:PM, LotN:PS

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable as the action is announced. [dom] Choose a younger vampire. The chosen vampire cannot block this action. [DOM] As above, but choose any vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Letting go is the secret; giving up to me is the greatest pleasure of all... Robbi Sommers, Lilith

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:C, VTES:C, SW:PV, CE:C/PV2, BH:PTr2, KoT:C/PV4, SP:PoS4

property.name: Artist
property.value: Harold Arthur McNeill; Jim Di Bartolo

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [tha] (D) Put this card on a vampire controlled by your prey. While the attached vampire is a Follower of Set, he or she burns 2 blood when taking an action; otherwise, he or she burns 1 blood when taking an action. The attached vampire's special abilities cannot be used. Any vampire(s) can burn this card with two +1 stealth actions. [THA] As above, but the attached vampire burns 2 blood when taking an action; Followers of Set burn 3 blood when taking an action. {Added to the V:EKN banned list on the 16th of February, 2016.}

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat bishop: If Sela becomes an archbishop, each ready bishop controlled by your prey burns 1 blood. +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat Archbishop of Rome: Sela gets +1 stealth on (D) actions against a Methuselah who controls a ready bishop.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during the first round of combat. [qui] Maneuver. [QUI] Only usable before range is determined. Burn 1 blood to set the range for this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Damage inflicted on Selena by a werewolf is aggravated. Black Hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Prince of Cleveland: Selma gets +1 intercept against Nosferatu.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique melee weapon. Strike: strength aggravated damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: After a Methuselah loses the Edge when it is not your turn, unlock Sennadurek, and you can look at that Methuselah's hand. Black Hand. Scarce.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [ani] (D) Enter combat with a younger vampire. [val] (D) Enter combat with a minion. This acting vampire gets 1 optional press during that combat. [VAL] As [val] above, and this acting vampire gets 1 optional maneuver during that combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a vampire with capacity 7 or more. [ani] +1 intercept. [ANI] Only usable by a locked vampire. This vampire unlocks and attempts to block.

property.name: Text
property.value: [aus] [REACTION] Only usable when a younger vampire is acting. +1 intercept. [dai] [REACTION] +1 intercept. +2 intercept if the acting minion has corruption counters. [DAI] [ACTION MODIFIER] Only usable during a bleed action. +2 bleed (limited). Minions with any corruption counters get -1 intercept.

property.name: Text
property.value: Trifle. Put this card on a Laibon with Auspex [aus]. This Laibon with Auspex can lock this card during the polling step of any referendum to get +1 vote. A vampire can have only one Sense Vibrations.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [for] Gain 2 blood. [val] Rescue a vampire from torpor. [VAL] As [val] above, and the rescued vampire gains 1 blood.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's not death if you refuse it. It is if you accept it. James O'Barr, "The Crow"

property.name: Text
property.value: [chi] (D) Burn a retainer or put this card on an ally. The attached minion does not unlock as normal. Burn this card if this acting vampire is not in play. [CHI] As above, but put this card on a vampire in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: [chi] (D) Put this card on a ready minion; you still control this card. The attached minion cannot act or block. Burn this card during his or her discard phase. [CHI] As above, but burn this card during your unlock phase.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I have said that Danforth refused to tell me what final horror had made him scream out so insanely... H.P. Lovecraft, "At the Mountains of Madness"

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Black Hand vampire. Choose a non-Seraph Black Hand vampire with capacity 6 or more. Successful referendum means this card is put on the chosen vampire, and he or she gains 2 blood. This Black Hand vampire is a Seraph. Non-Sabbat vampires cannot cast votes or ballots in this referendum.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable after action resolution by a ready Seraph other than the acting non-Seraph Black Hand vampire. A Seraph can play only one Seraph's Second each turn. Unlock the acting Black Hand vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Seren can strike: send the opposing vampire to torpor if the range in the previous round was long and if no damage was successfully inflicted on him in the previous round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable as the action is announced. [tha] This vampire gets +1 strength this action. [THA] As above, but with +2 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Once each turn, if Serenna is ready, she can burn 1 blood to reduce a bleed against you by 2. Scarce.

property.name: Discipline
property.value: dom pro ANI AUS OBF POT

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: If Sergei blocks, you can look at the acting Methuselah's hand, and he can burn 1 blood to discard 1 action card from it before combat (if any). +1 intercept.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move any amount of blood from a ready vampire you control to one or more ready vampires you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: [pre][ser] Strike: combat ends. [PRE][SER] As above, and if the range is close, this vampire burns 1 blood to put this card on the opposing minion and lock him or her. The attached minion does not unlock as normal. Burn this card during his or her unlock phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Discipline. Put this card on a vampire. This vampire gets +1 level of Serpentis [ser] and +1 capacity. Cannot be put on a vampire with superior Serpentis [SER].

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card on a ready vampire you control. After any Methuselah plays a Gehenna event, you can draw 2 cards if this vampire is ready (discard down afterward). A vampire can have only one Servitor of Irad.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There will come a time when an Elder Darkness will stir deep below a city which has forgotten and will surprise the Elder, its children. The Book of Nod

property.name: Discipline
property.value: obf ANI CHI DOM OBT POT

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Each Methuselah gets +1 hand size for each ready vampire with capacity 8 or more they control.

property.name: Text
property.value: [ser] Only usable when this vampire blocks an employ retainer action, before combat (if any). This action is successful (and the cost is paid), but this vampire steals the retainer and combat does not occur. [SER] As above, but usable when a recruit ally action is blocked. Steal the ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [ser] (D) Burn an ally or retainer controlled by any Methuselah to put this card in play; this card becomes an animal ally with 3 life, 2 strength and 0 bleed. This ally cannot play action cards and cannot have or use equipment or retainers (any of these are burned). [SER] As above, but burn a vampire with capacity 2 or less to put this card in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: As Seterpenre enters play, put up to four master discipline cards on him from your hand, ash heap and/or library (shuffle afterward). Discipline cards do not affect his capacity.

property.name: Discipline
property.value: obf tha ANI AUS CHI VIC

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat regent: Vampires with capacity 3 or less cannot block Sha-Ennu. +2 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique Nod fragment. +2 hand size. Any vampire can steal this equipment as a (D) action. [Burn Option]

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. In combat, if this card has no shackle counter on it before range is determined, you can end combat, move this card to the opposing minion and put 1 shackle counter on it; you still control this card. While this card has any shackle counters on it, the bearer does not unlock as normal and burns 2 blood during your unlock phase. Any minion can burn this card as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Demon with 2 life. [obt] Shade inflicts 1 damage on the opposing minion each round of combat during normal strike resolution at close range. [OBT] As above, but Shade has 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Yet even your darkest shade a canvas forms Whereon my eye must multiply in swarms Familiar looks of shapes no longer there. Charles Baudelaire, "Obsession"

property.name: Text
property.value: [obt] Strike: combat ends. [OBT] As above, and if this vampire was blocked while performing a non-bleed non-political action, the action continues as if unblocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The awful shadow of some unseen Power Floats, tho' unseen, amongst us. Percy Bysshe Shelley, "Hymn to Intellectual Beauty"

property.name: Text
property.value: [obf][pot] [COMBAT] Maneuver, only usable to go to close range, or press, only usable to continue combat. [OBF][POT] [ACTION MODIFIER] Only usable after a combat resulting from a block. Not usable if the blocking minion is ready. This vampire burns 1 blood to continue the action as if unblocked.

property.name: Text
property.value: Changeling with 3 life. 1 strength, 1 bleed. When this ally enters play, you can put a combat card from your hand on it. Once each combat, this ally can use the ability of that card as if played from your hand. If the card requires a vampire (e.g., costs blood or requires a Discipline), it can use it as a vampire with the basic level of 1 of the Discipline(s) (if any).

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. [cel][obf] This vampire gets fast strike this round. [CEL][OBF] As above, and this vampire's strikes cannot be dodged this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: [dom] (D) Move a card played by another Methuselah on an ally in your ready region to another ally. [val] As [dom] above, or move a card played by another Methuselah on a vampire in your ready region to another minion on whom the card could be played. That minion cannot be a vampire older than the vampire with the card. [VAL] As [val] above, and this action is at +1 stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: [pro] Put this card on this vampire. This vampire gets 1 optional maneuver each combat. A vampire can have only one Shadow of the Beast. [PRO] As above, and this vampire gets 1 optional press each combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. [pro] This vampire gets 1 additional strike with +1 strength this round. [PRO] As above, with 1 optional press.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable at long range. [obt] Strike: 3R damage. [OBT] Strike: 4R damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You will close your eyes, in order not to see, through the glass, The evening shadows making faces. Rimbaud, "A Dream for Winter"

property.name: Text
property.value: [obt] Maneuver. [OBT] Only usable before range is determined. Burn 2 blood to set the range for this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: [obt] Strike: strength ranged damage, with 1 optional maneuver. [OBT] As above, with 1 optional press.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [obt] (D) Inflict 1 unpreventable damage on any minion or retainer. [OBT] As above, and put this card on that minion; you still control this card. The attached minion gets -1 stealth. Burn this card during your unlock phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [aus][obt] (D) Put this card on an ally or younger vampire. The attached minion gets -2 intercept and cannot take (D) actions or use ranged strikes. Any minion can burn this card as a +1 stealth action. [AUS][OBT] As above, and the action to burn this card costs 1 additional blood or conviction [1 CONVICTION].

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Shaggydog gets 1 optional press during the first round of combat. Black Hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: You can lock Shahid during any other Methuselah's unlock phase to get +1 hand size until the end of the turn for each ready minion that Methuselah controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card on a Black Hand vampire. This Black Hand vampire can enter combat with a younger non-Black Hand vampire as a (D) action. A vampire can have only one Shakar.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ar-Rashid said, A true assassin has no ego, which is well, for he receives no glory. The Admonitions

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique contract. Trifle. Requires a Black Hand vampire. Put this card on a ready minion. Every Black Hand vampire is considered chosen for this contract. Any Black Hand vampire can enter combat with this minon as a +1 stealth (D) action. Burn this card if this minion is not ready.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Once each turn, Shalmath can unlock. He cannot use cards requiring Celerity [cel]. Scarce.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique mage with 2 life. Requires a Laibon. This Laibon gets +1 intercept. When acting, this Laibon can shuffle this retainer back in his owner's library to get +1 stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Zombie with 3 life. 0 strength, 0 bleed. [nec] When this ally enters play, remove an ally or vampire in your ash heap from the game or burn this ally. This ally gets +1 strength for each life it has. This ally can enter combat with a minion as a (D) action. It cannot gain life (any life it would gain goes to the blood bank instead). [NEC] As above, with 4 life.

property.name: Text
property.value: [COMBAT] [2 CONVICTION] Only usable before strikes are chosen. Not usable on an infernal minion, a vampire with capacity 8 or more, or a vampire who has Memories of Mortality or Humanitas. Burn this card. The opposing monster takes an amount of environmental damage equal to his or her strength, then combat ends.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All honor's wounds are self-inflicted. Andrew Carnegie

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Hunting ground. During your unlock phase, a ready vampire you control can gain 1 blood. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The desperate no longer care when death stalks their streets. Some think of it as a blessing. Nigel the Shunned, Nosferatu antitribu

property.name: Text
property.value: [pro] [COMBAT] Cancel a combat card requiring Obtenebration [obt], Protean [pro], or Vicissitude [vic] as it is played, and its cost is not paid. The opposing minion cannot play that card again this action. [PRO] [REACTION] As above, but cancel an action modifier requiring any of those Disciplines.

property.name: Text
property.value: [chi] Choose one or two allies or younger vampires controlled by your predator and/or prey. The chosen minions cannot block or cast votes or ballots this turn. [CHI] As above, but choose three allies or younger vampires.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable by a vampire not involved in the current combat. [for] Choose a vampire in combat. This combat, the chosen vampire can play cards requiring Fortitude [for] as if he or she has the basic level of Fortitude. [FOR] As above, but as if the chosen vampire has the superior level of Fortitude [FOR].

property.name: Text
property.value: Laibon: Shasa gets +1 bleed on bleed actions requiring Presence [pre].

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires an infernal Baali with capacity 9 or more. Put this card on this Baali. A vampire with capacity 6 or more can burn the Edge to burn this card as a (D) action. If this Baali has three Shatter the Gate, burn them all to give each other Methuselah 1 shattered counter. A Methuselah with any shattered counters burns 3 pool during their unlock phase. [Burn Option]

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable when this vampire blocks an ally or younger vampire bleeding you, before block resolution. [dem] Put this card on the acting minion, lock this vampire, and end the action. The attached minion gets -1 bleed. They can burn this card as an action that costs 1 blood. A minion can have only one Shattered Mirror. [DEM] As above, but do not lock this vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an anarch. [chi] +1 stealth action. (D) Look at another Methuselah's hand, and discard 1 card from it. [dem] +2 stealth action. Burn an event (undirected, no matter who controls the event). [pro] (D) Inflict 2 unpreventable damage on a ready minion.

property.name: Text
property.value: [pot] Strike: burn equipment. [POT] As above, with fast strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: [pro] (D) Inflict 1 unpreventable damage on an ally or retainer. [mel] (D) Discard a Shattering Crescendo to inflict 2 unpreventable damage on each of up to 2 minions controlled by a single Methuselah. [MEL] As [mel] above, but for 3 unpreventable damage each.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Sheela Na Gig can lock to give a Tremere antitribu you control +1 bleed. Flight [FLIGHT]. Tremere antitribu slave.

property.name: Text
property.value: This vampire gains 4 blood and put this card on him or her. This vampire does not unlock as normal. Burn this card during your unlock phase.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No more be griev'd at that which thou has done: Roses have thorns, and silver fountains mud, Clouds and eclipses stain both moon and sun, And loathsome canker lives in sweetest bud. Shakespeare, "Sonnet 35"

property.name: Text
property.value: (D) Put this card on a ready unique non-wraith, non-zombie minion who does not already have a Shell Break. If the attached minion is burned, move this card to this acting Giovanni; it becomes a wraith retainer with 2 life who is immune to non-aggravated damage. The employer gets +1 bleed and +1 intercept.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable as the action is announced. [san] Lock X other ready Blood Brothers you control of the same circle as this Blood Brother to give this Blood Brother +X stealth, even if stealth is not yet needed. If this action is successful, you can unlock one of those Blood Brothers. [SAN] As above, but unlock two of those Blood Brothers if this action is successful.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you chase two rabbits, both will escape.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent. 1 vote (titled): While Shemti is ready and unlocked, any minion successfully performing a (D) action against you takes 1 damage (after action resolution).

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [ani] (D) Steal a card in play requiring Animalism. If it is an equipment or retainer, put it on a vampire you control. [ANI] Steal all cards in play requiring Animalism. Put the equipment and retainers on any vampires you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Sheva gets +1 strength in combat with a Lasombra.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable when a minion you control blocks, before block resolution. Not usable if the blocking minion played any reaction cards that this vampire could not play. [chi] This action is blocked with this vampire as the blocking minion instead (and the block is resolved as normal). [CHI] As above, and this vampire gets 1 optional maneuver during the first round of the resulting combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Move the top 2 cards of your library to this equipment, face down (you can look at the cards at any time). While this Ravnos is ready, if you would draw a card from your library, you can draw one of these cards instead. During your unlock phase, you can move the top card of your library to this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Shiloh can enter combat with a younger vampire as a (D) action. If she is ready during your unlock phase, another ready vampire you control takes 1 unpreventable damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a ready archbishop, cardinal or regent. Put X master discipline cards from your hand in play. These cards represent clanless Sabbat vampires of 1 capacity with those respective Disciplines and do not count as master discipline cards while in play. These vampires are not unique, must hunt the turn they are created, have -1 stealth and cannot bleed or take political actions.

property.name: Text
property.value: Investment. Put this card in play with 3 blood. You can use a master phase action to move 1 blood from this card to your pool. Burn this card when it has no blood.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:C, VTES:C, Sabbat:C, SW:PV, FN:PR/PS, CE:PV2, BH:PTo2

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined during the first round of combat. [tha] Any strike requiring Thaumaturgy [tha] that is not usable during the first round of combat can be played by this vampire during the first round. [THA] As above, with 1 optional press to continue combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Grapple. Only usable after you successfully inflict damage from a hand strike. A minion can play only one Shoulder Drop each strike. After strike resolution, if this minion is still ready, the opposing minion takes 1 additional environmental damage. The opposing minion cannot press this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: [pot][pre] (D) Bleed with +1 bleed. Whenever this action is blocked, before range is determined during the first round of the resulting combat, this vampire can gain +1 strength that combat. [POT][PRE] (D) As above, but at +2 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: [nec] Only usable by a ready vampire other than the acting wraith ally. The acting wraith gets +1 stealth. [NEC] Only usable as an action to recruit or employ a wraith is announced. Unlock this vampire if this action is successful.

property.name: Text
property.value: [dom][obt] +1 stealth. [DOM][OBT] As above, and this vampire can strike: combat ends during the first round of the resulting combat whenever this action is blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Oh! I didn't realize you had come in, Marconius. You catch the city sleeping, against its nature. Andrea Giovanni

property.name: Artist
property.value: Brian LeBlanc; Francesc Grimalt; Brian LeBlanc

property.name: Text
property.value: [obt] +1 stealth, not usable during a bleed action. [OBT] +1 stealth.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dragon-wing of night o'erspreads the earth. William Shakespeare, "Troilus and Cressida", act V, scene 8

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable as an action requiring Necromancy [nec] or Giovanni is announced. [nec] After action resolution, you can move the action card used for this action from your ash heap to the top of your library. [NEC] As above, but any one card played during this action can be moved from your ash heap to your library.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. X is the number of Sibyl's Tongues in your ash heap. Choose a card by name, search your library for a copy of the chosen card, reveal it, and move it to your hand (shuffle and discard down afterward).

property.name: Text
property.value: [cel] Strike: dodge. [CEL] Prevent 1 damage. A vampire can play only one Sideslip at superior each round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card on a Salubri you control. This Salubri gets +1 intercept. [Burn Option]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When you're as hunted as the few of us that remain are, you're either alert or you're dead. After a few decades of this, complete knowledge of one's surroundings becomes instinctive. Miriam Benyona, Salubri

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Vampires with capacity 8 or more cannot attempt to block the bearer.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Sigrid gets +1 bleed against a Methuselah who controls a ready Nosferatu.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: If Silas is ready during your discard phase, he can burn 1 blood to give you +1 discard phase action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. [qui] This vampire gets fast strike with hand and melee-weapon strikes this round. [QUI] As above, with 1 optional maneuver.

property.value: for vic ANI DOM NEC POT

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Silvia gets 1 optional press each combat. +1 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: [aus] +1 intercept. [AUS] Put this card on the acting vampire; you still control this card. This reacting vampire gets +1 intercept when the attached vampire attempts to bleed you. The attached vampire can burn this card as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a vampire. Only one Siphon can be played each turn. Choose one or more younger vampires in torpor, or any vampires in torpor if there are any Gehenna events in play, and steal 1 blood from each chosen vampire. If this acting vampire is Giovanni, you can also move one card from your ash heap to your hand for each blood stolen (discard down afterward).

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Ralph gets +1 strength in combat with a younger Camarilla vampire. Followers of Set get +1 bleed against you.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Frenzy cards cannot be played on this vampire. (This includes Brujah Frenzy, Drawing Out the Beast, Frenzy, Rotschreck and Terror Frenzy).

property.name: Draft
property.value: [Third] As above, and if the equip action is successful, the acting minion unlocks.

property.name: Text
property.value: [cel] Burn 2 blood to get +1 stealth. [mel] Only usable by a ready unlocked vampire other than the acting minion when a minion attempts to block. That attempt fails and that minion cannot attempt to block this action again. Lock this vampire and that minion. After the action resolution, this vampire and that minion enter combat. [MEL] As [mel] above, but do not lock this modifying vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a Laibon. Add 1 blood to another Laibon. Alternatively, if this Laibon is a magaji, (D) lock two ready Laibon of the same clan as each other and are controlled by the same Methuselah as each other.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An egg never sits on a hen. Kiswahili proverb

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a prince or justicar. (D) Burn a vampire who has committed diablerie since your last turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Thou art forbidden to destroy another of thy kind.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a non-titled Gangrel with capacity 5 or more. Unique. Put this card on this Gangrel and unlock him or her. This non-titled Gangrel gets +2 votes in referendums called by a Gangrel. Any older non-titled Gangrel can steal this card as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: While Skidmark is acting, do not replace cards you play.

property.name: Text
property.value: [for] This vampire treats aggravated damage as normal damage this round. [FOR] As above, and prevent 1 damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I ask of Thee, beloved Night -- Swift be thine approaching flight. Percy Bysshe Shelley, "To Night"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Crushers of helpless misery, Crushing down Justice, honoring Wrong: If that be feeble, this be strong. Emily Bronte, "Last Lines"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: ...no sword on earth, not the truest steel, could touch their assailant; for by a spell he had dispossessed all blades of their bite on him. "Beowulf", 8th c. epic poem

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: While Slag is ready, any Methuselah playing or discarding a card during a referendum shows you its replacement.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable after this Blood Brother gains blood. [san] [COMBAT] Choose another ready Blood Brother of the same circle. The chosen Blood Brother gains the same amount of blood. [SAN] [ACTION MODIFIER] As above, but usable as an action modifier.

property.name: Text
property.value: [pot] Strike: hand strike at +2 damage. [POT] As above, with 1 optional maneuver, only usable to maneuver to close range.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique mortal with 3 life. 0 strength, 0 bleed. The Slashers can strike: 1R damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: Location. Lock to burn 2 cards from the top of your prey's library. [Burn Option]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Death and decay. Decay and death. But the soul survives, even in our inhuman shells. Comprehending the passage of the soul through the physical cycle requires accelerating the process whenever possible. Anisa Marianna Lopez, Harbinger of Skulls

property.name: Text
property.value: [dom] (D) Bleed with +2 bleed. Allies cannot block this action. [DOM] (D) Put this card on a vampire controlled by your predator. Each time the attached vampire announces an action, he or she moves 1 blood to this acting vampire. The attached vampire can burn 4 blood during his or her minion phase to burn this card. Burn this card after this acting vampire is sent to torpor or burned.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play with 1 blood for each Methuselah in the game. You can use a master phase action to move 1 blood from this card to your pool. Burn this card when it has no blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: [dem] (D) Send a younger vampire with 0 or 1 blood to torpor. [DEM] As above, but the vampire can be the same age or older.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We're all in our own personal traps. We scratch and claw, but only at the air. Norman Bates, "Psycho"

property.name: Text
property.value: Gehenna. Requires at least 1 other Gehenna event in play. Do not replace until a vampire commits diablerie. Cards requiring any superior Disciplines cost 1 additional blood. Any vampire who commits diablerie is immune to this effect until a Gehenna event is played.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's only a question of time before the withering hits me, and hard. Beckett, Gangrel

property.name: Text

During each other Methuselah's unlock phase, for each counter on this card, that Methuselah burns 1 pool or burns 1 blood from a vampire they control. Any vampire can burn this card as a (D) action.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Above all, remember that you are too close if you can see into the monster's eyes. They can do things with their eyes. Joshua "God45" Matthews, Wayward

property.name: Text
property.value: Weapon: gun. Strike: 2R damage, only usable at long range. Whenever the bearer blocks, he or she can, before range is determined, set the range for the first round of the resulting combat to long, and the bearer's initial strike that round must be with this weapon.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Weapons are tools of ill omen. Sun Tzu, "The Art of War"

property.name: Text
property.value: A vampire can play only one Soak each round. [for] Prevent 2 non-aggravated damage. [FOR] Prevent 4 non-aggravated damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wounds he'd suffered would definitely have killed a mortal and would have destroyed many a Kindred. Jan had only the blood of Hardestadt and the elders of Clan Ventrue to thank that he'd survived this long.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during an undirected action. +1 stealth.

property.value: When he is best, he is little worse than a man, and when he is worst, he is little better than a beast. William Shakespeare, "The Merchant of Venice", act I, scene 2

If the bearer is diablerized, the diablerizing vampire cannot take the Soul Gem.

property.name: Text
property.value: [cel] Only usable as the action is announced. Whenever this action is blocked, set the range for the first round of the resulting combat to long. [spi] Minions without flight [FLIGHT] or Spiritus [spi] get -1 intercept. [SPI] As [spi] above, but those minions get -2 intercept.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Gangrel Inner Circle: Retainers employed by minions opposing Stanislava in combat lose their abilities. Allies cannot block her. +2 bleed.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear -- not absence of fear. Mark Twain

property.name: Text
property.value: Weapon. Strike: 1R aggravated damage, only usable at long range, only usable once each combat. The bearer can lock to give any minion -1 stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: [vic] Strike: 2R damage, with 1 optional press. [VIC] As above, but for 3R damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I am the vengeance of the Lord and of the Sword of Caine, and I say unto thee, thou art twice damned! Righteous Endeavor, Tzimisce priest

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a ready Laibon. Choose a Laibon you control. If this Laibon was moved to your ready region during your last influence phase, then for every 2 capacity above 4 this Laibon has, you can move one Aye and one Orun from your hand or library to this Laibon. Otherwise, you can move one Aye or one Orun from your hand or library to this Laibon (shuffle afterward).

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires an anarch. Unique. Put this card in play. During your master phase, you can move 1 blood from a ready anarch you control to another ready anarch. After a combat betwen a blocking anarch and an acting minion, you can lock this card and a ready unlocked anarch you control other than the blocking anarch to have that anarch and the acting minion enter combat; the first round of combat, the acting minion cannot strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: [for] Only usable during a (D) action against you (or a card you control). +1 intercept. [FOR] Reduce a bleed against you by 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: [dom] (D) Lock any minion. [myt] (D) Put this card on a ready minion. The acting vampire gets +2 intercept against the attached minion. Any minion can burn this card as an action. [MYT] As [myt] above, and the attached minion gets -1 bleed against this acting vampire's controller.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires an anarch. (D) Diablerize an older vampire in torpor and put this card on this acting anarch. This anarch gets +1 capacity. In the resulting blood hunt referendum, each anarch gets +1 vote.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What's blood for, if not for shedding? Clive Barker and Bernard Rose, "Candyman"

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a ready Sabbat vampire. Only usable as the action is announced. Another ready Sabbat vampire you control burns 1 blood to give this acting vampire +1 stealth, even if stealth is not yet needed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock during your master phase to look at the top 3 cards of your prey's library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I told myself that the owners of those voices faced the same obstacles that I did -- dangerous footing, complete darkness, terrific heat -- but I knew that I was probably deluding myself. William Dear, "The Dungeon Master"

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an anarch. Do not replace until after this action. When you would replace this card, you can take this card from your ash heap instead. [ani] [COMBAT] Strike: hand strike or use a melee weapon strike. This strike is at +1 damage, with 1 optional press. [dom] [ACTION] (D) Bleed with +1 bleed. [qui] [ACTION] +1 stealth action. (D) Enter combat with a minion.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: During the polling step of a political action, Stefano can burn 1 blood to get +1 vote.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Stephen gets +1 bleed against a Methuselah who controls a ready Tremere. +1 stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable as the action is announced. Vampires must burn 1 blood to attempt to block this action.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Horrid, repulsive and coarse. Someone should do something about them. Victoria Ash, Toreador primogen

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable in combat with an ally or younger vampire. Not usable against a mummy, wraith, or zombie. [dom] Maneuver or press. [DOM] Strike: burn the opposing ally.

property.name: Text
property.value: Vehicle. This anarch gets +1 bleed. Allies and younger vampires get -1 intercept against this anarch. Any vampire can burn this card, lock this anarch and have him or her not unlock as normal during his or her next unlock phase as a (D) action that costs 1 pool. A minion can have only one vehicle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gargoyle creature with 4 life. This Gargoyle can enter combat with a minion as a (D) action. While the employer is a Gargoyle, Stone Dogs inflicts 1 damage on the opposing minion each round of combat during normal strike resolution at close range.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Be on your guard against a silent dog and still water. Latin proverb

property.name: Text
property.value: [tha] Strike: 2R damage. [vis] Strike: 2R damage, with 1 optional maneuver. [VIS] Strike: 3R damage, with 1 optional maneuver.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A porcupine would die of envy upon witnessing the carnage that erupted from the stone beast's hands. Javier Montoya, Tremere

property.name: Text
property.value: [obt] Burn 1 blood to get +1 stealth. [myt] +1 stealth. [MYT] As [myt] above, and this vampire can choose to cancel the resulting combat whenever this action is blocked.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Half a hole is more than enough. Bartholomew, Kiasyd

property.name: Text
property.value: [tha] Press, only usable to continue combat. [vis] Press, or prevent 1 damage. [VIS] Prevent 2 damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What does not destroy me, makes me stronger. Friedrich Nietzsche, "The Twilight of the Idols"

property.name: Text
property.value: Location. When this card is played, put one card from your hand face down (out of play) on this card (you can look at the card at any time). During your master phase, you can exchange one card in your hand for the card on this Storage Annex.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. You can lock this card as a minion you control announces an action. Whenever the action is blocked, set the range for each round of the resulting combat to close.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Lakes that endlessly outspread Their lone waters, lone and dead, Their still waters, still and chilly With the snows of the lolling lily. Edgar Allan Poe, "Dream-Land"

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card in play. Vampires do not get the normal +1 stealth when hunting. Any Methuselah can use a master phase action to move 1 counter from his or her pool on this card. Burn this card when the number of counters on this card equals or exceeds the number of Methuselahs in the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Laibon. Only usable as the action is announced. Only one Strange Day can be played in a game. Vampires cannot block this action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Search your crypt for a scarce vampire, reveal them, and move them to your uncontrolled region (shuffle afterward).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Having unexpected guests, especially of such outlandish nature, can ruin the whole night, but it often brings the best opportunities if one can meet the challenge. Victoria Ash, Toreador Primogen

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat Archbishop of Mexico City: Stravinsky gets an additional +1 bleed against a Methuselah who controls a younger ready Tzimisce. +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable at the end of a round of combat in which this vampire successfully inflicted more damage than the opposing minion. A vampire can play only one Street Cred each turn. [pot] Add 1 blood to a younger vampire in your uncontrolled region. [POT] As above, but add 2 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. [ani] This vampire gets +1 strength this round. [spi] This vampire gets +1 strength this combat. [SPI] As [spi] above, with 1 optional press this round.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where I come from, the law of the land is survival of the strongest. Nettie Hale, Ahrimane

property.name: Text
property.value: Trifle. Put this card on an infernal vampire. This vampire can play cards requiring Striga [str] (not a Discipline). With two of these cards, he or she can play cards requiring superior Striga [STR]. Burn this card if this vampire is not infernal.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [HttB] Make a vampire you control infernal, and play this card as above.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before resolution of a melee weapon's strike. [qui] Non-aggravated damage from this weapon's strikes cannot be prevented except by equipment or by other strikes this round. [QUI] As above, and this weapon's strikes inflict +1 damage this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Burn to make a hand or weapon strike against a monster at +1 damage. Burn to bleed with +1 bleed as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: [str] +1 intercept, even if intercept is not yet needed. After action resolution, if this vampire blocked, unlock him or her. [str] is not a Discipline. [STR] Only usable when a bleed against you would be successful. The bleed burns no pool. Instead, lock this vampire, and this vampire and the acting minion enter combat. [Burn Option]

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat Archbishop of Berlin: While Strohmann is acting, reaction cards requiring Auspex [aus] cost 1 additional blood. +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable at long range. [pot] Strike: 3R damage, and prevent 1 damage from the opposing minion's strike during this strike resolution. If the opposing minion has Celerity [cel], he or she can burn 1 blood to prevent all damage from this strike. [POT] As above, but for 4R damage and prevent 2 damage from the opposing minion's strike.

property.name: Text
property.value: [cel] Strike: dodge. [CEL] Only usable at close range. Only usable if both strike: hand strike and strike: dodges could be chosen (individually). Not usable as an additional strike. Strike: hand strike and dodge. This vampire cannot use additional strikes this round.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is better to have less thunder in the mouth and more lightning in the hand. General Ben Chidlaw

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Blood hunt referendums called on Styles get +2 votes in favor of the referendum.

property.name: Text
property.value: Out-of-turn. Trifle. Only usable after a vampire diablerizes a vampire of more than twice his or her capacity (before the blood hunt is called). Usable during your turn. Move the diablerized vampire from the ash heap to his or her owner's ready region, and move all blood from the diablerist to him or her. Remove the diablerist from the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Weapon: gun. Strike: 3R damage, with 1 optional maneuver each combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Demon with 3 life. 1 strength, 0 bleed. Damage from Succubus's hand strikes is aggravated. Once each turn, she can burn 1 life to get +1 bleed for the current action. She can steal 1 blood (becoming life) or life from any minion as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Text
Text
property.value: Only usable after resolution of a successful hunt action. [qui] Put this card on this vampire. This vampire can burn this card to reduce the cost of a card requiring Quietus [qui] they play by 1 blood. [QUI] As above, and gain 1 additional blood from this hunt action.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It will have blood, they say; Blood will have Blood. William Shakespeare, "Macbeth", act III, scene 4

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Choose three library cards in your ash heap by name and move them to the top of your library, then discard 3 cards at random (and draw up afterward).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ambrogino looked to the mirror. No doubt someone -- something -- else saw the same reflection from the other side of the polished glass.

property.name: Text
property.value: Out-of-turn. Cancel a master card played by another Methuselah as it is played, and its cost is not paid.

property.value: L. A. Williams; Harold Arthur McNeill; Anna Christenson

property.value: Camarilla Prince of Cairo: While your prey has a ready prince or justicar, Suhailah gets +1 stealth. +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: [tem] Search your library (shuffle afterward) and/or ash heap for an ally, retainer or equipment whose cost is X or less and put that card in play, on this vampire and with life equal to its starting life if applicable. [TEM] Search your crypt (shuffle afterward) and/or ash heap for a non-scarce vampire with capacity X or less and put that vampire in play (with no blood).

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [nec] Gain 2 blood. [NEC] Remove this card from the game and move up to two library cards from your ash heap to your library (shuffle afterward).

property.name: Text
property.value: [ani] [COMBAT] Discard X cards. [spi] [COMBAT][REACTION] Move X animal retainers from your ash heap to this vampire, with life equal to their starting lifes. After this minion phase ends, burn those retainers. [SPI] As [spi] above, but the retainers are not burned until after the end of your next minion phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: [obt] (D) Each ready vampire controlled by your prey burns 1 blood. [OBT] As above, and this is a +1 stealth action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Search your crypt for a vampire with Serpentis [ser], reveal them, and move them to your uncontrolled region with 1 blood (shuffle afterward).

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [pre] Search your library for an ally or retainer, reveal it, and move it to your hand (shuffle and discard down afterward). [PRE] Search your library for an ally and recruit that ally (requirements and cost apply as normal; shuffle afterward).

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: If Sundervere is burned, you burn 1 pool. Once each action, he can burn 1 blood to get an additional +1 bleed. Red List. +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: During the polling step of any referendum, Sundown can burn 1 blood to get +1 vote.

property.name: Text
property.value: Anarch. [MERGED] If Sundown is ready during the polling step of any referendum, you can discard a political action card to force any vampire to abstain.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a Sabbat vampire. Put this card on this vampire; he or she takes 1 unpreventable environmental aggravated damage. You can burn this card when this vampire announces an action to make that action unblockable.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock to give all vampires +1 stealth on hunt actions until your unlock phase. Lock to reduce the cost to recruit or employ a mortal by 1 blood or pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They had no fear of the dark, for here the sun shone so brightly that it lit up their hearts at night. Salvador Garcia, Brujah anarch

property.name: Text
property.value: [for] Prevent all damage from the opposing minion's strike. [FOR] As above, and each round, this vampire can burn 1 blood to prevent all damage from the opposing minion's initial strike that round.

property.value: Sabbat:C, SW:C/PV, FN:PR2, Anarchs:PAG2/PG2, KMW:PG3, Third:C

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Laibon with three or more Orun. Not usable to cancel a card that does not require a Discipline or requiring Celerity [cel] or Potence [pot]. Lock an Orun on this Laibon to cancel a strike card as it is played (cost must be paid, and the minion chooses another strike) or an action card targeting this Laibon. [Burn Option]

property.name: Draft
property.value: [EK] As above, but requires only two Orun

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable by a ready unlocked minion with a gun other than the acting minion. The blocking minion gets -1 intercept.

property.name: Text
property.value: [COMBAT][REACTION] [1 CONVICTION] Put 3 surge counters on this imbued. This imbued can burn X surge counters to prevent X non-aggravated damage. Burn all surge counters on this imbued at the end of the action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a vampire. Only usable during the polling step of a political action. This vampire gets +2 votes.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Influence is neither good nor bad in an absolute manner, but only in relation to the one who experiences it. Andre Gide

property.value: Independent. 2 votes (titled): You gain 1 pool each time an action to recruit a mummy ally is successful. During your unlock, you can move 1 blood between Sutekh and another Follower of Set you control. +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Add 2 blood to a ready Ravnos.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Whatever Khalil told you was a lie.... He does not care about anyone. He uses...people, things.... He always gets what he wants.... Elizabeth Dimitros, Follower of Set

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To perish rather, swallowed up and lost In the wide womb of uncreated Night? John Milton, "Paradise Lost"

property.name: Draft
property.value: [Third] [Combat] Do not replace until after combat. Maneuver.

property.name: Text
property.value: Animal with 1 life. Requires a Laibon. Put the Swarm on any ready minion (this is a +1 stealth (D) action if that minion is controlled by another Methuselah). If this action is blocked, put the Swarm on this acting minion instead (no cost is paid). If the Swarm has 2 or more life during the employer's unlock phase, it burns 1 life; otherwise, it steals 1 blood (becoming life) or life from the employer. A minion can have only one Swarm.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Baron. Choose a ready anarch. Successful referendum means this card is put on the chosen anarch. If this anarch is ready during your unlock phase, you can look at the top card of each Methuselah's library (including your own).

property.name: Text
property.value: [cel] [COMBAT] Press. [spi] [COMBAT] Maneuver or press. [SPI] [ACTION MODIFIER] +1 stealth.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She hissed and fled. She scarcely seemed to touch the ground as she bounded away. I tried to track her but could find no print or broken twig to follow. Luther, Gangrel antitribu

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique investment. Put this card in play with 2 blood. You can use a master phase action to move 1 blood from this card to your pool or to a ready Giovanni you control. After any Methuselah plays an investment card, add 1 blood to this card. Burn this card when it has no blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: A minion can play only one Swoop each round. Maneuver, only usable to go to close range, and this minion gets +1 strength on his or her initial strike this round.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Nosferatu howled in fury, Ferox swooped down again and crushed his ribcage. He stepped over the gurgling Sewer Rat and silently finished the job.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique melee weapon. Only usable by a Brujah antitribu. Strike: strength+1 damage, with 1 optional additional strike each round.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Justice is incidental to law and order. J. Edgar Hoover

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique melee weapon. Strike: strength damage. Vampires must spend twice the normal amount of blood to heal the damage from this weapon's strikes.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. A vampire can play only one Sword of the Righteous each combat. [ani] Choose one of this vampire's melee weapons. This vampire inflicts +1 damage each strike this combat with that weapon. [val] As [ani] above, and the damage this vampire inflicts with that weapon is aggravated this combat. [VAL] As [val] above, and this vampire can prevent 1 damage this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique melee weapon. Strike: strength+2 damage. This vampire gets superior Potence [POT] and superior Presence [PRE]. Each strike the bearer makes at close range must be with this weapon if possible. The bearer cannot maneuver to long range.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla primogen: If Sylvester goes to torpor, each Methuselah burns 1 pool.

property.value: aus vic ANI PRE PRO SPI

property.value: Sabbat: During an action, Sylvie can discard a political action card to get +1 stealth or +1 intercept. Sterile.

property.value: [chi][for] This combat, when any damage is successfully inflicted on this vampire in a round, the opposing minion cannot use presses that round. [CHI][FOR] As above, and when any damage is successfully inflicted on this vampire in a round, the opposing minion cannot use additional strikes that round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent. 2 votes (titled): You can burn 1 pool as you play a master out-of-turn card to get +1 master phase action at the start of your next master phase. Synesios cannot use cards requiring Celerity [cel]. Scarce.

property.value: Sabbat: Synner-G can unlock after successfully equipping with an electronic equipment from your hand.

property.value: cel for pro ANI AUS VIC

property.value: Sabbat bishop: After Jolan successfully performs a recruit or employ action, unlock her during the discard phase.

property.value: Independent: T.J. can lock and burn 2 blood during the polling step of a referendum called by a titled Camarilla vampire to cancel that referendum.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: During your unlock phase, an archbishop you control can move 1 blood from himself or herself to Tabitha.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. You get +1 hand size. During your unlock phase, a True Brujah you control gains 1 blood. Any vampire can call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action; in that referendum, you get +1 vote. [Burn Option]

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Treat them as allies, but remember that the motivations of a snake are never truly known. Nu, True Brujah, at the second 20th-century assembly.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable as an action to recruit or employ an animal is announced. [ani] If this action is successful, the animal gets +1 strength (for an ally) or inflicts +1 damage (for damage-dealing retainers). [ANI] As above, and the animal gets 1 additional starting life.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable when a vampire controlled by your predator would successfully hunt. That vampire gains 2 additional blood (from the same source) and put this card on that vampire; you still control this card. Bleed actions against you cost this vampire 1 additional blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only one Tajdid can be played in a game. Until the end of the game, the Blood Curse no longer prevents Assamites from committing diablerie.

property.name: Text
property.value: [abo] [REFLEX] Cancel a frenzy card played on this vampire as it is played. [abo] Skin. Only usable after this vampire burns a minion. Put this card on this vampire and unlock him or her. This vampire can bleed an additional time this turn and gets +1 bleed and +1 stealth when bleeding. Burn this card during your discard phase. A minion can have only one skin.

property.name: Text
property.value: Skin. [abo] [REFLEX] Cancel a frenzy card played on this vampire as it is played. [abo] +1 intercept, and put this card on this vampire. This vampire gets flight [FLIGHT]. Burn this card during your unlock phase. A minion can have only one skin. [ABO] As above, and this vampire gets 1 optional maneuver each combat.

property.value: Unique mage with 3 life. 0 strength, 0 bleed. Talaq can strike: 1R damage. Talaq gets 1 optional maneuver each combat. Talaq can play cards requiring basic Quietus [qui] and/or Thaumaturgy [tha] as a vampire with capacity 3.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: You can discard a master card to have Talbot attempt to enter combat with a minion as a +1 stealth (D) action.

The bearer can enter combat with a minion as a +1 stealth (D) action. The bearer gets 1 press, only usable to continue combat during the first round, and can prevent 1 damage each combat.

property.value: Melee weapon. Strike: strength+1 damage. A Ravnos can use this weapon to strike: burn weapon with fast strike.

property.value: Any tool is a weapon if you hold it right. Ani DiFranco

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Talley gets +1 intercept during actions against another minion you control.

property.value: Unique. Put this card on a Gangrel antitribu you control. Damage from this vampire's hand strikes is aggravated. (D) actions cost this vampire 1 additional blood. This vampire's controller can use a master phase action to burn this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Their fatal hands No second stroke intend. John Milton, "Paradise Lost"

property.value: [abo] [REFLEX] Cancel a frenzy card played on this vampire as it is played. [abo] Strike: hand strike at +1 damage. This combat, this minion cannot cancel frenzy cards or press to end combat. [ABO] As above, but strike: burn equipment.

property.value: Only usable when a minion attempts to block, before combat (if any). [pot] Cancel the action and unlock this vampire. (The blocking minion is not locked.) [tem] As [pot] above, and take the action card, if any, back in your hand (discard down afterward). [TEM] As [tem] above, and this vampire gets +1 stealth on his or her next action this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. This vampire can look at the top 3 cards of any Methuselah's library, burn up to one of those and unlock at the end of the turn as a +1 stealth action that costs 1 blood. This vampire gains 1 blood when a Gehenna event is played.

property.value: Camarilla: While Tarautas is ready, Blood Doll and Minion Tap cards cost 1 additional pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: If Tarbaby is ready at the start of your influence phase, you get +1 transfer. Black Hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aim. Only usable as this minion chooses a strike. A minion can play only one aim each strike. If any damage from this strike is successfully inflicted on the opposing minion, he or she gets -1 strength this action, and you can burn a weapon he or she has. The opposing minion can discard two combat cards to cancel this card as it is played.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aim. Only usable as this minion chooses a strike. A minion can play only one aim each strike. This strike inflicts +2 damage. If any damage from this strike is successfully inflicted on the opposing minion, he or she cannot press or use additional strikes this round, and you can set the range for the next round. The opposing minion can discard one combat card to cancel this card as it is played.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aim. Only usable as this minion chooses a strike. A minion can play only one aim each strike. If any damage from this strike is successfully inflicted on the opposing minion, he or she cannot use maneuvers or presses unless they require Obfuscate [obf], Thaumaturgy [tha] or Flight [FLIGHT] this action. The opposing minion can discard two combat cards to cancel this card as it is played.

property.name: Text
property.value: Aim. Only usable as this minion chooses a strike. A minion can play only one aim each strike. You can target a retainer on the opposing minion with this strike (instead of the opposing minion). Or you can target the opposing minion directly as usual, but if any damage from this strike is successfully inflicted, this strike inflicts +1 damage.
