[PRE] As above, and any other Methuselahs who cast votes or ballots in favor of this passing referendum burn 1 pool once results are tallied.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. This Ravnos gets +1 bleed. Once each combat, this Ravnos can strike: dodge.

property.name: Text
property.value: [dem] [ACTION] Unlock an ally or younger vampire. [obe] As [dem] above, with +1 stealth. [OBE] [REACTION] Cancel a card played by another Methuselah that would be put on a vampire with Dementation [dem] he or she does not control. Usable even if there is no action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card on a prince who has successfully bled you since your last turn. Each time this prince unlocks, he or she takes 1 unpreventable environmental damage. This prince can burn this card as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Requires both Follower of Set and Tremere. Put this card in play. Each Follower of Set is considered to have a level of Thaumaturgy [tha] equal to his or her level of Serpentis [ser]. Each Tremere is considered to have a level of Serpentis equal to his or her level of Thaumaturgy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Successful referendum means each Methuselah burns X+1 pool, where X is the number of Assamites he or she controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. Tremere get +1 stealth on actions requiring Thaumaturgy [tha]. Vampires with basic Thaumaturgy can play combat cards requiring Thaumaturgy as if they had superior Thaumaturgy [THA]. Any minion can burn this card as a (D) action; Malkavians get -1 stealth on that action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Title. Choose a ready Tremere. Successful referendum means this card is put on the chosen Tremere to represent the unique Camarilla title of Tremere Justicar. In this referendum, each ready Tremere gets +1 vote.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Sabbat vampire. Choose a vampire who has cast any votes in the most recent referendum since your last turn. Successful referendum means the chosen vampire takes 1 environmental damage for each vote he or she cast in that previous referendum.

property.name: Text
property.value: Move 1 blood from each ready vampire you control to your pool.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All these lives I will give you, ay, and many more and greater, through countless ages... Bram Stoker, "Dracula"

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [chi] Move 1 blood from a crypt card in your prey's uncontrolled region to your pool or to a vampire in your uncontrolled region.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. (D) Put this card on a Ventrue who is not at full capacity. The attached Ventrue must hunt once each minion phase as his or her first action. If he or she hunts while at full capacity, he or she is burned. Any Ventrue can burn this card as an action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable during a bleed action. [nec] Remove thirteen cards in the target Methuselah's ash heap from the game to get +1 bleed (limited). [aus][nec] As [nec] above, but remove only seven cards. [AUS][NEC] As [aus][nec] above, but for +2 bleed (limited).

property.name: Discipline
property.value: obf pot AUS FOR NEC THN

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: After any Methuselah plays a master card, you can look at that Methuselah's hand (after the replacement card is drawn). +1 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Prince of Geneva: Troius cannot cast votes or ballots against blood hunt referendums. +1 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: Trophy. When this card is moved to a vampire, that vampire gains 4 blood, becomes Sabbat and unlocks, or that vampire can choose to burn this card instead. This vampire is Black Hand. If he or she was already Black Hand when receiving this card, he or she is a Seraph.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [SoC] Master (not a trophy). Add 2 blood to a Black Hand vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Trophy. When this card is put in play, choose a clan. Vampires of the chosen clan cannot block this vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You solve this problem for me... and I will join my voice with yours when it comes time to formalize our new structure. Hardestadt, Ventrue

property.name: Text
property.value: Trophy. This vampire gets +2 stealth on diablerie actions. Blood hunts cannot be called on this vampire. If this vampire successfully diablerizes another vampire, burn this card at the end of the action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Trophy. When this card is put in play, choose any Discipline. This vampire gets the chosen Discipline at the superior level.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They taught you to hear them dead people? Think you could teach me? Joe "Boot" Hill, Assamite antitribu

property.name: Text
property.value: Trophy. This vampire gets +1 intercept. Once each action, this vampire can burn 1 blood to unlock and attempt to block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Camarilla will formally acknowledge the supremacy of Clan Giovanni in Boston and its immediate environs. Jacques Gauthier, Toreador

property.name: Text
property.value: Trophy. Hunting ground. During your unlock phase, this vampire gains 2 blood. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground each turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Trophy. The controller of this vampire gets +2 hand size. A vampire can have no more than two Trophy: Libraries.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The greatest university of all is a collection of books. Thomas Carlyle

property.name: Draft
property.value: [LotN] As above, and gain 1 pool when you play this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Trophy. This card comes in play with 2 counters. When this vampire announces an action, he or she can burn 1 counter from it to make the action unblockable. Burn this card when it has no counters.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [LotN] As above, and gain 1 pool when you play this card

property.name: Text
property.value: Trophy. If this card would be moved to a non-sterile vampire, that vampire's controller takes control of it instead, and it becomes a 2-capacity non-unique vampire of the same clan as that vampire; they can search their library (shuffle afterward), hand, and/or ash heap for a master discipline card, and put it on this new vampire; add 2 blood to this new vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Trophy. If this card is on a vampire during your unlock phase, this vampire can search your library (shuffle afterward) and/or hand for a retainer and employ it (requirements and cost apply as normal; shuffle afterward). This is not an action and cannot be blocked.

property.name: Text
property.value: Trophy. This vampire gets +2 bleed. A vampire can have only one Trophy: Revered.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is hard to free fools from the chains they revere. Voltaire

property.name: Draft
property.value: [LotN] As above, and gain 1 pool when you play this card

property.name: Text
property.value: Trophy. While this vampire is ready, he or she cannot be the target of other Methuselahs' actions.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I want a promise that I won't be interfered with by the prince's sheriff. Khalil Ravana, Ravnos

property.name: Text
property.value: Trophy. This card comes in play with 5 counters. This vampire can use these counters to pay some or all of the blood or pool cost of equipment. Burn this card when it has no counters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card on a non-infernal mortal ally you control, or burn 2 pool to put this card on a non-infernal minion you control. (D) actions requiring Dominate [dom] or Presence [pre] cannot target this minion. In combat, any damage this minion inflicts on an infernal minion is aggravated. Infernal minions cannot block or strike this minion. Burn this card if this minion becomes infernal.

property.name: Text
property.value: [obf][pre] Only usable during a bleed action. +1 bleed (limited). [OBF][PRE] Only usable when a minion attempts to block. That attempt fails and that minion cannot attempt to block this action again. That minion's controller can burn 1 pool to cancel this card as it is played.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a titled non-Red List vampire. Choose a ready non-Red List minion. Successful referendum means this card is put on the chosen minion. This minion is now Red List. In this referendum, the chosen minion's controller gets +2 votes for each Red List minion in play. Any titled vampire can call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action. Burn this card if the minion is no longer Red List.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Black Hand vampire. Only usable when a non-Black Hand vampire is bleeding you. Reduce the bleed amount by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: [ser] Only usable during a bleed action. +2 bleed (limited). [SER] Only usable after resolution of a successful action. Unlock this vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A lie gets halfway around the world before the truth has a chance to get its pants on. Winston Churchill

property.name: Text
property.value: [aus][qui] (D) Bleed with +1 bleed. If this action is blocked, the blocking minion's controller discards 2 cards at random before combat (if any). Those cards are not replaced until after this action. [AUS][QUI] As above, but bleed with +2 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Prince of Rome: While Tryphosa is ready, any Malkavian's bleed actions cost 1 additional blood and get +1 stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a non-Sterile Ravnos with capacity 5 or more. Put this card in play; it becomes a 2-capacity non-unique Ravnos of the same sect as the acting Ravnos with basic Chimerstry [chi], and must hunt this turn. You can put a master discipline card from your hand on this new vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Werewolf with 3 life. 1 strength, 1 bleed. This ally can play cards requiring basic Animalism [ani] as a vampire and can burn 1 life to get +1 stealth. After it successfully bleeds, you can look at the target Methuselah's hand. A vampire stealing life from this ally takes 1 environmental damage for each point stolen. If this ally has 2 or fewer life during your unlock phase, it gains 1 life.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Cards requiring Visceratika [vis] cost Tupdog 1 fewer blood. Tupdog can enter combat with a minion as a (D) action. After the end of your minion phase, burn Tupdog and draw 1 card from your crypt. Flight [FLIGHT]. Tremere antitribu slave. Non-unique.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla primogen: Tura gets +1 intercept against Brujah.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: While Tusk is ready, you can look at the top card of your library.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: As any of Tusk's action is announced, you can burn the top card of your library; if the burned card requires Obfuscate [obf], Tusk gets +1 stealth, otherwise, he burns 1 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique mummy with 3 life. 2 strength, 1 bleed. Once each combat, Tutu can strike: dodge. During your minion phase, Tutu can unlock. Tutu can steal an equipment from a vampire in torpor as a (D) action. If Tutu is burned, shuffle him in his owner's library.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card in play with 4 blood. When you put a non-titled non-Anarch vampire in play from your uncontrolled region, you can burn 1 blood from this card to make that vampire Anarch. You can use a master phase action to move 1 blood from this card to an anarch. Burn this card when it has no blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock to give a Gangrel antitribu you control +1 stealth.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Now he goes along the darksome road, Thither whence they say no one returns. Catallus, "Carmina"

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable as damage from a hand or melee weapon strike is resolved and this vampire inflicts 3 or more damage. Only one Twisting the Knife can be played by a vampire during a strike phase. [pot] This vampire inflicts +1 damage. [POT] As above, with 1 optional press.

property.name: Text
property.value: Out-of-turn. Trifle. Only usable when a minion controlled by a Methuselah other than your predator is bleeding you, after blocks are declined. Change the target of the bleed to their prey (that Methuselah can attempt to block). The next card that would change the target of this bleed is canceled as it is played.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique wraith with 1 life. 0 strength, 1 bleed. Tye can burn a non-ready minion as a (D) action; if that action is successful, you can move a library card from your ash heap to your hand (discard down afterward). He is immune to non-aggravated damage.

property.name: Text
property.value: [ani] +1 stealth action. Move 1 or more blood from this vampire to another vampire. [obe] As [ani] above, and unlock this acting vampire. During the attached minion's unlock phase, this card is burned unless this acting vampire burns 2 blood.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I ran so fast that time and youth at last ran out, I never stopped to think what life was all about, And every conversation I can now recall, Concerned itself with me, and nothing else at all Charles Aznavour, "Yesterday, When I Was Young" (translated by Herbert Kretzmer)

This vampire gets 1 optional press and will not go to torpor until combat ends (although he or she is still wounded and can be burned by aggravated damage). If 3 consecutive rounds of combat pass with no cards played, combat ends. This vampire goes to torpor after combat. [FOR] Prevent 2 damage.

If he or she must hunt, he or she can choose to diablerize a vampire instead.

card.name: Vasilis, The Traitor of Don Cruez

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: While Vasilis is ready, all Giovanni get +1 bleed against a Methuselah who controls a ready Brujah.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: After Vasiliy successfully bleeds your prey, unlock him. +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Prince of Prague: Contesting a title costs Vasily 1 additional blood unless you control the Edge.

property.name: Discipline
property.value: aus cel chi dom for obf

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Vassily can burn any hunting ground or any Blood Doll as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card on a ready minion you control. If you control this minion, he or she can equip with the first equipment you find in your library as a +1 stealth action (working down from the top; requirements and cost apply as normal; shuffle afterward).

property.name: Text
property.value: +3 stealth action. (D) Look at each Methuselah's hand and discard 1 card from among all those hands (even from your own hand). [Burn Option]

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires an archbishop, priscus, cardinal or regent. Put this card on this vampire. You can burn this card when a Sabbat vampire attempts to block this vampire to have that attempt fails; that minion cannot attempt to block this action again.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: During an action, Veejay can burn 2 blood to get +1 stealth. Scarce.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gehenna. Do not replace as long as this card is in play. Each turn, when a vampire plays his or her first card that turn requiring any Disciplines, that vampire's controller reveals the top card of his or her library (before replacing the card played). If it is a master card, the card played is cancelled as it is played, its cost is not paid, and in addition, if the card played required Obtenebration [obt], the vampire burns 2 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable by a vampire who blocks. [qui] This vampire gets first strike with hand and melee weapon strikes during the first round of the resulting combat. [QUI] As above, and the acting minion cannot dodge during the first round of the resulting combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable by a ready unlocked vampire other than the acting minion. Only one Veil the Legions can be played each action. [obf] The acting minion gets +1 stealth. [OBF] As above, and this vampire can burn X blood to give the next X actions your minions perform this turn +1 stealth. Only one Veil the Legions can be played at superior each turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable by a blocking minion. [chi] The acting minion's stealth is set to 0. (He or she gets -X stealth, where X is his or her current stealth.) [CHI] As above, and this vampire can strike: steal 1 blood or life (becoming blood) during the resulting combat whenever they block.

property.name: Text
property.value: Blood hunt referendum. Choose an ally or younger non-titled vampire controlled by your prey. Successful referendum means the chosen minion is burned. If this referendum fails or is canceled, no more Veles' Hunts can be played this game.

property.name: Text
property.value: [ser] Only usable during the polling step of a political action. Put 1 corruption counter on a minion casting votes or ballots in this referendum. [SER] Only usable during the polling step of a political action before votes and ballots are cast. Minions with any corruption counters cannot cast votes or ballots during this referendum.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat cardinal: Once each combat, Velya can discard one card requiring Auspex [aus] to get 1 press.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable after a minion successfully bleeds you for 3 or more pool. Put this card on the acting minion. Brujah antitribu get +1 strength in combat with the attached minion. Any Brujah antitribu can enter combat with the attached vampire as a (D) action. Burn this card if the attached minion is in torpor.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I will feed fat the ancient grudge I bear him. William Shakespeare, "The Merchant of Venice", act I, scene 3

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. This vampire gets superior Thaumaturgy [THA]. Any Tremere or Tremere antitribu can enter combat with the bearer as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique mage with 2 life. 1 strength, 2 bleed. Requires an infernal vampire. Veneficti has +1 stealth. He can steal a demon ally or burn a demon retainer as a (D) action. He cannot be the target of a (D) action by a vampire with capacity 6 or less or an ally. [Burn Option]

property.name: Draft
property.value: [HttB] [tha] As above, usable by a non-infernal vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable if this minion is blocked, before combat (if any). [ser] Put 1 corruption counter on the blocking minion. If the number of your corruption counters on the minion equals or exceeds his or her capacity or cost, you can burn them to steal him or her (combat does not occur). [SER] As above, but this card costs 1 fewer blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat priscus: If Venere is in torpor during your unlock phase, he can burn 1 blood to move to your ready region.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable when a Camarilla vampire is acting. +2 intercept.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For surely it is better to rule in the darkness than to humble myself falsely in the light. Caine, from The Erciyes Fragments

property.name: Text
property.value: [pot] Strike: hand strike or use a melee weapon strike. This strike is at +1 damage. [val] As [pot] above, and this strike cannot be dodged. [VAL] As [val] above, but at +2 damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tonight, there would be a small measure of vengeance, one grain of sand to add to a desert that would in time stretch across the face of the Earth. Parmenides, Assamite

property.name: Text
property.value: Wraith with 2 life. The employer gets +1 bleed. Vengeful Spirit inflicts 1 damage on the opposing minion each round of combat during normal strike resolution at close range.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card in play. Each ready Ventrue gets +1 vote during political actions. Any minion can burn this card as a (D) action; Brujah get +1 stealth on that action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock during the polling step of any referendum to get +3 votes.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Ventrue clan is organized much like a multinational corporation. Each major city has a meeting place where Ventrue may seek allegiance and obtain information.

property.name: Text
property.value: Investment. Put this card in play with 1 blood for each Ventrue antitribu you control. You can use a master phase action to move 1 blood from this card to your pool. Burn this card when it has no blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Title. Choose a ready Ventrue. Successful referendum means this card is put on the chosen Ventrue to represent the unique Camarilla title of Ventrue Justicar. In this referendum, each ready Ventrue gets +1 vote.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: As Verbruch enters play, you can search your crypt for any Tremere, reveal them, and move them to your uncontrolled region (shuffle afterward). Flight [FLIGHT]. Tremere slave.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They fought the dogs and killed the cats, And bit the babies in the cradles, And ate the cheeses out of the vats, And licked the soup from the cooks' own ladles. Robert Browning, "The Pied Piper of Hamelin"

property.name: Text
property.value: Trifle. Put this card on any vampire, and you can burn a Blood Doll (if any). During their unlock phase, this vampire's controller can move 1 blood from this vampire to their pool or from their pool to this vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat priscus: Vestgeir can play a political action card from another Methuselah's ash heap as if it were in your hand; remove that card from the game when it would be burned. +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: This vampire can burn this card to get +1 level of any one Discipline until your next unlock phase. The vampire cannot choose a Discipline he or she already has at the superior level.

property.name: Text
property.value: This vampire can burn this equipment during combat before range is determined to get +1 strength and 1 additional strike each round that combat. If he or she does so, he or she cannot use other equipment that combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Discipline. Put this card on a vampire. This vampire gets +1 level of Vicissitude [vic] and +1 capacity. Cannot be put on a vampire with superior Vicissitude [VIC].

property.name: Text
property.value: Put this card on any Tzimisce. Put 1 poison counter on this card each time this vampire plays a card requiring Vicissitude [vic]. If the number of poison counters on this card is greater than the vampire's capacity, burn him or her at the end of the current action or combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Choose a card in your prey's ash heap by name, and put this card in play. Lock during any Methuselah's unlock phase to remove three copies of the chosen card in your prey's ash heap from the game to have your prey burn 1 pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Prince of Atlanta: If a Golconda: Inner Peace you play is canceled, you can move that card from your ash heap to your library (shuffle afterward).

property.name: Discipline
property.value: cel dom for obf AUS PRE

property.name: Text
property.value: Anarch: You and Victor can play cards requiring a Camarilla vampire as if Victor were a Camarilla vampire. While Victor is a Baron, you and Victor can play cards requiring a Prince as if Victor were a Prince.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: As Victor enters play, you can burn 1 pool to make him a primogen, 2 pool to make him Prince of Paris, or 3 pool to make him Ventrue Justicar. If Victor's title would be contested, he immediately yields instead of contesting.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: If Victoria is ready during your master phase, you can burn the Edge to gain 2 pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla primogen: Victoria can lock a younger ready vampire as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Prince of Atlanta: When a vampire with capacity 4 or less is bleeding you, you can burn the Edge to have the action fail. Victorine gets 1 optional press each combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Vidal can meet a clan, sect, or non-infernal vampire trait (e.g., Black Hand) requirement to play any card. He can meet a given requirement only once in a game. +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique hunter-list. Put this card in play. Lock this card to give any Defender +1 intercept when a monster is acting.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We've probably all learned the ropes of the hunt here, but a few reminders are in order. Jack "Hannibal137" Harmon, Defender

property.name: Text
property.value: [ACTION MODIFIER] Only usable after resolution of a successful action. Unlock this imbued. [REACTION] [1 CONVICTION] Only usable by a locked imbued. Unlock this imbued.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The clearest eye is still blind when shut. Francois "Warden" Loehr, Judge

property.name: Text
property.value: Trifle. Put this card on a vampire you control who has any amount of blood and move 2 to 5 blood from that vampire to your pool. Minion Tap costs you 1 additional pool. Villein costs 1 additional pool to play on this vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: If you burn the Edge for a vote, you get +1 vote.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Burn a contract on a minion you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Your worst enemies are those whose faces are cheerful while their hearts are bitter. Caecilius Statius, "Hypobolimaeus"

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat bishop: If Violet successfully inflicts 2 or more damage from a hand strike to an opposing vampire in combat, that vampire gets -1 capacity at the end of combat (a vampire's capacity cannot be reduced below 1).

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat bishop: Virgil can steal a retainer as a (D) action. He can steal all of the life from a retainer on him as a +1 stealth action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat bishop: Once each action, Virginie can burn 1 blood to get +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: While Zizi is in your ready region, Viri gets +1 strength. Budapest circle. Sterile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. When a vampire you control with capacity 8 or more is burned, burn this card to search your crypt for a vampire with capacity 4 or less and put that vampire in your ready region with 1 blood (shuffle afterward); that vampire cannot act this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: If Virstania is ready, any ready slave Gargoyle can remove their slave status and become Independent as a +1 stealth action, and non-slave Gargoyles can bleed with +1 bleed as a (D) action that costs 1 blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: [pre] +1 stealth. [mel] Only usable during a bleed action. +1 stealth and +2 bleed, or +2 bleed. [MEL] Only usable as the action is announced. This action is unblockable.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Put this card on this Ahrimane. This Ahrimane gets +1 level of Spiritus [spi]. If this action is blocked, this Ahrimane does not unlock as normal during their next unlock phase.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [HttB] Hunt. If this hunt is successful, this vampire unlocks.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play with 4 counters. You get +1 hand size for each counter on this card. Each time you would replace a card, except when replacing the Visit, burn 1 counter from this card instead. Burn this card when it has no counters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined in combat with a vampire. A vampire can play only one Vitae Block each combat. [ani] This vampire gets 1 optional press this round. [obe] Put this card in play and move up to 2 blood from the opposing vampire to this card. During your unlock phase, return the blood to that vampire and burn this card. [OBE] As [obe] above, but move up to 3 blood to this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique ghoul with 2 life. 2 strength, 1 bleed. Requires an anarch. Vivienne can play cards requiring basic Celerity [cel] and/or Fortitude [for] as an Anarch vampire. Vampires you control get -1 stealth on political actions. A vampire you control can give control of Vivienne to another Methuselah as a (D) action. A vampire controlled by another Methuselah can steal Vivienne as a (D) action.

property.name: Discipline
property.value: aus ANI DOM PRO THA VIC

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Vlad can play and uses cards requiring a title or a sect as if he had that required title or were of that required sect. +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable when this vampire blocks an ally or younger vampire, before combat (if any) [dem] Lock this reacting vampire and cancel combat. [DEM] As above, and the acting minion burns 1 blood or life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is everything singing in my head at once. Anatole, The Prophet of Gehenna, Malkavian

property.name: Text
property.value: [tha] Burn 1 blood to get +1 intercept. [vis] +1 intercept, or give +1 intercept to a vampire to whom this vampire is enslaved. [VIS] Reduce a bleed against you by 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Prince of Frankfurt: Volker cannot attempt to block primogen.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Volo gets -1 stealth when hunting. Kiev circle. Sterile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable after resolution of a political action whose referendum passed. [pre] This vampire gains 1 blood for each vote by which the referendum passed. [PRE] As above, but move up to 2 of those blood to your pool instead of this vampire.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:U2, VTES:U, Sabbat:U, CE:U/PTo2/PV, Anarchs:PAB3, KMW:PAn3, LoB:PG3, Third:U/PB2

property.name: Text
property.value: Out-of-turn. Only usable during the polling step of a political action. Each Methuselah can play only one Vox Domini in a game. The referendum fails.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Are you going to force me to stop? We both know that you can. If you are my master, or speak on his behalf, you can make me do anything you want. Lucita, Lasombra

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. Each Methuselah gets +1 vote in referendums. Alternatively, during the polling step of any referendum, you can play this card from your hand to your ash heap as an out-of-turn master to get +3 votes in that referendum.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Quentin fell into torpor after the encounter with Meshenka and has not been heard from since. A stronger power may have pulled him to Final Death. Tzimisce, Dublin 2002 Storyline

property.name: Text
property.value: Anarch: Once each turn, an anarch you control can unlock after successfully equipping with a vehicle from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. If this hunt is successful, unlock this vampire. [obf] Remove a minion or retainer in any Methuselah's ash heap from the game to hunt. [spi] As [obf] above, but at +1 hunt. [SPI] As [spi] above, and you gain 1 pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: This card comes in play with 10 counters. Whenever a non-Anarch vampire takes an action, burn 1 counter from this card. Burn this card when it has no counters. During your unlock phase, each anarch burns 1 blood or becomes Camarilla, and each ally burns 1 life.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable by a locked vampire. Do not replace until your unlock phase. This vampire wakes (they ignore the requirement to be unlocked for playing reaction cards and attempting to block until the end of the action).

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:C, VTES:C, SW:PB2/PL4/PV2, FN:PG2, CE:PB4/PM4/PTo3/PV3, Anarchs:PAB3/PAG2, BH:PTo3, KMW:PAn3/PB5/PG2, LoB:PG2/PI3, HttB:PGar6/PSal5, SP:PoS2

property.name: Text
property.value: [san] Only usable as a bleed action is announced. Choose X ready Blood Brothers you control of the same circle as this Blood Brother, including this Blood Brother. Each chosen Blood Brother burns 1 blood to give this Blood Brother +X bleed (limited). [SAN] As [san] above, but usable any time before the action is resolved.

property.name: Text
property.value: Not usable during the first round of combat. [tha] Strike: 1R aggravated damage. [THA] Strike: 2R aggravated damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Now ye are flames, I'll tell you how to burn And purge the ether of our enemies. John Keats, "Hyperion"

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:U2, VTES:U, Sabbat:U, CE:C/PTr3, BH:PTr2, Third:C/PTr4, KoT:C

property.name: Text
property.value: Flip a coin. If it comes up heads, this action is unblockable. If it comes up tails, the Malkavian antitribu takes 1 unpreventable environmental damage.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those golden times And those Arcadian scenes that Maro sings... William Cowper, "The Winter Evening"

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Master cards targeting Walker cost you 1 additional pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique werewolf with 4 life. 3 strength, 0 bleed. Walks-With-Might gets +1 intercept against Followers of Set. Master cards cost you 1 additional pool. Each strike or damaging effect made against him inflicts 1 less damage on him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock during an undirected action to give a minion you control +1 intercept. Lock to allow a minion you control to move 1 counter from an investment card controlled by any Methuselah to your pool as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Laibon: If another Laibon you control is blocked while attempting to equip, recruit, or employ, you can lock Wamukota to cancel the combat (if any) and have that Laibon continue the action as if unblocked. +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: [ACTION MODIFIER][REACTION] Only usable during the polling step of a political action. Usable by a locked vampire. This Akunanse gets +1 vote. [ACTION MODIFIER] Only usable when this Akunanse would successfully hunt. He or she gains 1 additional blood (from the same source).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By coming and going will a bird weave its nest. Ashanti proverb

property.name: Text
property.value: Ghoul with 5 life. 4 strength, 0 bleed. When this ally enters play, burn an ally or retainer you control. It can prevent 1 damage each round of combat. It can enter combat with a vampire as a (D) action. Lock and burn this ally to burn a location, except during combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires an archbishop, priscus, cardinal or regent. (D) Put this card on a vampire who is not an archbishop, priscus, cardinal or regent. Any vampire can enter combat with the attached vampire as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: [pre] +1 stealth action. Unlock a younger non-infernal vampire. [val] +1 stealth action. Rescue a non-infernal vampire from torpor. [VAL] (D) Diablerize a vampire in torpor. Vampires cannot cast votes or ballots in favor of the blood hunt unless they are Baali, Tremere or Tremere antitribu.

property.name: Text
property.value: Out-of-turn. Give +1 intercept to a minion targeted by a (D) action. Alternatively, give 1 optional strike: dodge this round to a minion in combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The storm is coming, he tells me. Calebros, Nosferatu

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose a ready younger vampire. Successful referendum means this card is put on the chosen vampire. Any ready vampire can enter combat with the attached vampire as a (D) action that costs 1 blood.

property.name: Draft
property.value: [LotN] [Assamite] [action] (D) Return this card into your hand (discard afterwards) and enter combat with a younger vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. You can lock this card as a Nosferatu announces an undirected action; if that action is successful, unlock the acting Nosferatu. You can burn this card (even if it is locked) to move a Nosferatu in torpor to the ready region.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Hunting ground. During your unlock phase, a ready vampire you control can gain 1 blood. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground each turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Out-of-turn. Trifle. Do not replace until your unlock phase. Cancel a master card played by your predator or prey as it is played, and its cost is not paid. That Methuselah gets +1 master phase action immediately, or at the start of their next master phase if the canceled card is an out-of-turn master.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. During your master phase, a Tremere you control can move 1 blood from himself or herself to this card. Lock during your influence phase to move all counters on this card to a Tremere in your uncontrolled region. Any minion can burn this card as a (D) action; Malkavians get +1 stealth on that action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock during your discard phase to move one card from your ash heap to the bottom of your library.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires a Black Hand vampire. Only usable during a (D) action. +1 intercept.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One who is prepared and waits for the unprepared will be victorious. Sun Tzu, "The Art of War"

property.name: Text
property.value: Watchtower. Requires a ready Seraph. Put this card in play. You can use a master phase action to draw 3 cards (discard down afterward). Burn this card if another watchtower is put in play. [Burn Option]

property.name: Text
property.value: Watchtower. Requires a ready Seraph. Put this card in play. Lock during your discard phase to unlock a ready Black Hand vampire. Burn this card if another watchtower is put in play. [Burn Option]

property.name: Text
property.value: Watchtower. Requires a Seraph. In this referendum, each ready Seraph gets +2 votes. Successful referendum means this card is put in play. Except during combat, lock this card to add 1 blood to a Sabbat vampire in your ready region or your uncontrolled region. Burn this card if another watchtower is put in play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Watchtower. Requires at least 1 Gehenna event in play and a ready Seraph. Black Hand vampires get +1 stealth and can strike: 2R damage. You can lock a ready Black Hand vampire you control to cancel a Gehenna event card as it is played. During your unlock phase, burn X pool or burn this card, where X is the number of Gehenna events in play (minimum of 1). Burn this card if another watchtower is put in play. [Burn Option]

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Once each combat, Watenda can burn X blood to cancel a combat card as it is played by the opposing minion, where X is the blood or pool cost of the card. (If it was a strike card, the opposing minion chooses another strike.)

property.name: Requires
property.value: Follower of Set, non-Sterile, Capacity 5 or More

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a non-sterile Follower of Set with capacity 5 or more. Put this card in play. It becomes a 1-capacity non-unique Follower of Set of the same sect as the acting Follower of Set, and must hunt this turn. You can search your library (shuffle afterward), hand, and/or ash heap for a master discipline card and put it on this new vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. [dem] (D) Lock an ally. [DEM] (D) Lock all allies.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To see clearly is poety, prophecy, and religion -- all in one. John Ruskin

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. A vampire can play only one Wave of Lethargy each round. [qui] Maneuvers and presses cost the opposing vampire 1 additional blood this round. [QUI] As above, and strike cards cost the opposing vampire 1 additional blood this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique weapon. Strike: 2R aggravated damage. Not usable against a vampire with Celerity [cel], an ally, or a retainer. Burn after use.

property.name: Text
property.value: [qui] Strike: burn one master discipline card on the opposing vampire. [QUI] As above, and inflict 1 damage on the opposing minion.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined during the first round of combat. A vampire can play only one Weather Control each combat. [tha] Both combatants and each retainer on them take 1 unpreventable damage before range is determined each round this combat. [THA] As above, but the amount of damage inflicted increases by 1 in each subsequent round.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:U, VTES:U, CE:U, BH:PTr2, Third:PTr3, KoT:U

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Put this card in play in your uncontrolled region with 3 training counters. During your unlock phase, burn 1 training counter from this card. You can burn counters from no more than two recruits each unlock phase. When the last training counter is burned, move this card to your ready region; it becomes a 3-capacity non-unique Assamite with Celerity [cel], Obfuscate [obf], Potence [pot], Quietus [qui] and 3 blood who is Blood cursed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only one Week of Nightmares can be played in a game. Put this card in play with 10 nightmare counters. Ravnos get +1 bleed and +1 strength and do not hunt as normal. Any Ravnos can steal 1 blood from another Ravnos as a +1 stealth hunt action. During each Methuselah's unlock phase, that Methuselah can move 1 nightmare counter from this card to any Ravnos. If this card has no counters, each Ravnos burns 1 blood for each nightmare counter on them or is burned, then burn this card and the nightmare counters.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. +1 hand size. During your unlock phase, a ready Black Hand vampire you control gains 1 blood. Any Assamite can burn this card as a (D) action that costs 1 pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: [aus][ser] Only usable during a bleed action. +1 bleed limited). [AUS][SER] Only usable as a (D) action is announced. After action resolution, if this action was successful, put 1 corruption counter on a minion controlled by (any of) the target Methuselah(s).

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined during the first round of combat. Put this card with 5 counters on it on this minion; it becomes a melee weapon (equipment) that can strike: strength+1 damage. For each damage inflicted by this strike (even if prevented), burn 1 counter from this card. Burn this card when it has no counters. A minion can have only one Weighted Walking Stick.

property.name: Text
property.value: During any Methuselah's unlock phase, you can look at the top card of that Methuselah's library; if it is a master card, this vampire can burn 1 blood to burn it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: While Weirich is ready, primogen you control get +1 stealth.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable at long range. Not usable during the first round of combat. [pot] Strike: 4R damage. [POT] As above, with 1 optional press.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We shall discuss your breach of the Masquerade later... Tusk, The Talebearer, Nosferatu

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a Laibon. Put this card on this Laibon, and unlock them if their capacity is 5 or more. Once each combat, this Laibon can prevent 1 non-aggravated damage from the opposing minion's strike. A minion can have only one Well-Marked.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique mortal with 3 life. 0 strength, 0 bleed. Wendell can strike: 2R damage. He inflicts +2 damage with melee weapons. He gets 1 optional maneuver each combat. He can enter combat with a minion as a (D) action. If Wendell has 2 or fewer life during your unlock phase, he gains 1 life. During your unlock phase, Wendell inflicts 2 unpreventable damage on a ready vampire you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique werewolf with 3 life. 3 strength, 0 bleed. Werewolf Pack is immune to damage from melee weapons.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Has the red wolf trotted east and east and east, Far from the far, far other end of the day, To fear a few fangs? D.H. Lawrence, "The Red Wolf"

property.name: Text
property.value: [nec] Move a library card from your ash heap to your hand (discard down afterward). [NEC] As above, and this is a +1 stealth action.

property.name: Artist
property.value: Dave Roach, John Kent and Pete Burges; Dave Roach and Pete Burges

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. Each Nosferatu burns 1 additional blood to unlock during his or her unlock phase. Any Methuselah can burn 1 pool and spend 4 transfers during his or her influence phase to burn this card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: And the bastard childer of Nosferatu still roam the dark places of the Earth hunting their favored cousins... Tusk, The Talebearer, Nosferatu

property.name: Text
property.value: [abo] [REFLEX] Cancel a frenzy card played on this vampire as it is played. [abo] Frenzy. Only usable before range is determined during the first round of combat. This combat, the opposing vampire cannot maneuver to close range or press to continue combat. [ABO] As above, and this vampire gets 1 optional maneuver this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Once each combat, before range is determined, White Lily can equip with a weapon from your hand (requirements and cost apply as normal). Black Hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: During your next discard phase, you must burn this card, and you can either burn a vampire in torpor or, by locking a ready werewolf ally you control or discarding a White Nights Massacre, burn all vampires in torpor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Weapon. Strike: 2R aggravated damage. If White Phosphorus Grenade is used at close range, it inflicts 1 aggravated damage on the bearer. Burn after use.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sky is darkening like a stain; Something is going to fall like rain, And it won't be flowers. W.H. Auden, "The Witnesses"

property.name: Text
property.value: Trifle. Put this card in play. You can use 1 transfer to draw 1 card from your crypt and then remove a crypt card in your uncontrolled region from the game. You can use 4 transfers to burn this card and gain 2 pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Put this card on this Ahrimane. This Ahrimane gets +1 strength, -1 stealth, and gets 1 optional maneuver each combat. They cannot use equipment or have retainers (any retainers on them are burned). A vampire can have only one The Wildebeest.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Prince of Berlin: While Wilhelm's title is contested, the cost of contesting is increased by 1 blood for the other vampire(s).

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a primogen. Put this card on this primogen. During the polling step of a political action, this primogen can burn 1 blood to get +1 vote. This primogen can burn this card to play a card requiring a prince as if he or she were a prince. This primogen can burn this card after a prince goes to torpor to receive (and contest) the same title as that prince. A vampire can have only one Will of the Council.

property.name: Text
property.value: [chi] Allocate X+1 points among one or more minions. Each minion gets -1 intercept for each point allocated. [CHI] Only usable as the action is announced. Choose X-1 allies or younger vampires. The chosen minions cannot block or play reaction cards this action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Once each action, William can burn 1 blood to get +1 stealth. +1 bleed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla primogen: During your discard phase, William can burn 2 blood to unlock a minion you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: While in play, this equipment card represents a location and does not count as equipment. Unique. This vampire gets superior Dementation [DEM]. At the end of your master phase, if you did not play a master card from your hand this phase, this vampire burns 1 blood.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I am glad that it is old and big. I myself am of an old family, and to live in a new house would kill me. Bram Stoker, "Dracula"

property.name: Text
property.value: [tha] Strike: dodge. [THA] As above, with 1 additional strike: dodge this round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable when another minion you control and a minion without flight enter combat. [FLIGHT] Lock this minion. In that combat, this minion can make a hand or melee weapon strike (with or without a strike card) on the opposing minion during normal strike resolution (as if at close range). Dodge will avoid this strike, and damage prevention effects can treat this as a strike from an opposing minion. This minion can be the target of effects that inflict damage or steal blood or life as a retainer could be.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Winterlich can recruit a changeling ally as if he met the requirements of playing that card. While he is ready, changelings cost you 1 fewer pool.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Wise Frog gets fast strike in combat with a younger vampire. Blood cursed.

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Put this card on this Akunanse and unlock him or her at the end of the turn. While this Akunanse is ready, you get +1 hand size. A vampire can have only one Wise Spider.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To travel is to see. To travel is to learn. Hasani, Akunanse

property.name: Text
property.value: [ani] Strike: 1R damage. [thn] Strike: hand strike. Put this card on the opposing minion. This minion gets -1 strength (after the current strike resolution step). Burn this card during his or her discard phase. [THN] As [thn] above, and this minion cannot play cards requiring any Disciplines.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Lock to give any minion +1 intercept. After action resolution, burn 1 pool if that minion did not block the action.

property.name: Text
property.value: [pro] Damage from this vampire's hand strikes is aggravated this round. [PRO] Press.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: How cheerfully he seems to grin, How neatly spread his claws... Lewis Carroll, "Alice in Wonderland"

property.name: Text
property.value: Animal with 2 life. [ani] Wolf Companion inflicts 1 damage on the opposing minion each round of combat during normal strike resolution at close range. [ANI] As above, but Wolf Companion has 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is you -- my equal, my companion and close friend. Psalms 55:13 (NLT)

property.value: Jyhad:U2, VTES:U, Sabbat:U, SW:PT, KMW:PG, Third:PTz2

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Wolf gets 1 optional press each combat with a Tremere, only usable to continue combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: Melee weapon. Strike: strength damage. If 2 or more damage is succesfully inflicted on an opposing vampire by this weapon in a given combat, that vampire is sent to torpor, this card is moved to that vampire, and he or she does not unlock as normal as long as he or she remains in torpor.

property.name: Rarity
property.value: Jyhad:U, VTES:U, SW:PB, CE:U/PB, BH:PTo3, Third:U, KoT:U

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an anarch. [dom] (D) Burn half the blood rounded down on a crypt card in your prey's uncontrolled region. [obf] +1 stealth action. (D) Burn a location. [vic] (D) Burn 4 blood from a ready titled non-Anarch vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Gehenna. Requires at least 1 other Gehenna event in play. Do not replace until your next discard phase. This card comes in play with 10 counters. Burn 1 counter whenever another Gehenna event is played. A vampire whose capacity is greater than X is treated as if his or her capacity is X (minimum of 1), where X is the number of counters on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Requires an Inner Circle member. Choose a ready justicar. Successful referendum means this card is put on the chosen justicar, and they lose their title. The attached vampire gets -1 capacity (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: Text
property.value: [dem] Reduce a bleed against you by 2. [DEM] Only usable during the polling step of a political action. This vampire gets +4 votes against the referendum.

property.value: Camarilla primogen: Wynn can enter combat with a vampire controlled by your predator or prey as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla Gangrel Justicar: After a referendum called by Xaviar passes, you can unlock him.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Xeper gets +1 vote for each ready unique infernal vampire you control. He can steal an ally controlled by another Methuselah as a (D) action. Infernal.

property.name: Text
property.value: Imbued: After resolution of an action performed by a monster and blocked by Xian, if Xian is still ready, he can gain one conviction from your hand or ash heap.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat Archbishop of Guatemala City: Xipe can steal an ally or retainer as a +1 stealth (D) action that costs 1 blood. +1 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: Out-of-turn. Only usable after a vampire successfully hunts. Put this card on that vampire. During this vampire's minion phase, he or she must hunt (even if at full capacity). Any vampire can burn this card as a +1 stealth (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: While ready, Yavu can burn 2 blood to have an ally or younger vampire's action fail as it is announced and move himself to the uncontrolled region (breaking any temporary control effects). Scarce.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Requires a ready Sabbat vampire. When a political action is successful, before the referendum, lock this card and a ready unlocked Sabbat vampire you control to have that vampire enter combat with the acting vampire. If the acting vampire is still ready at the end of combat, the Sabbat vampire takes 2 environmental damage, and the referendum is conducted as normal.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Yazid gets +1 stealth on (D) actions. Black Hand. [MERGED] Anarch.

property.name: Text
property.value: Choose one or more Methuselahs who are not chosen for another Year of Fortune in play. Successful referendum means this card is put in play. Each chosen Methuselah gets +1 hand size. Any vampire can call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Yitzak can lock a younger vampire and have them not unlock as normal during their next unlock phase as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat cardinal: Yong-Sun can burn the top card of your prey's crypt as a (D) action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat cardinal: When bleeding, Yong-Sun gets +1 bleed for each vampire in the target Methuselah's ash heap.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. When a ready Assamite you control is the target of a (D) action or is chosen by the acting Methuselah in the terms of a referendum, you can lock this location to unlock the acting minion and have the action or referendum fail. Only usable as the (D) action is announced or during the polling step of the referendum before votes and ballots are cast.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique mortal with 3 life. 2 strength, 0 bleed. Young Bloods can burn 2 blood from a locked vampire with capacity 7 or less as a +1 stealth (D) action. If a vampire controlled by another Methuselah burns Young Bloods in combat or as an action, they gain 2 blood.

property.value: obt ANI DEM FOR OBF POT

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat cardinal: Non-infernal, non-demon minions opposing Ysador in combat cannot maneuver to close range.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: After you replace a card requiring Melpominee [mel] Yseult played, you can draw 1 additional card (discard down afterward). She cannot block vampires with capacity 5 or more.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: After Yusuf successfully performs an action to equip with an equipment requiring an Assamite, unlock him during the discard phase. Blood cursed.

property.name: Text
property.value: Anarch. [MERGED] Once each round of combat, Zack can burn 1 blood to make the damage from his hand strikes aggravated that round.

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent: Zahir can search your library for a contract, reveal it, and move it to your hand as a +1 stealth action (shuffle and discard down afterward). Blood cursed.

property.name: Text
property.value: While in play, this equipment card represents a location and does not count as equipment. Haven. Unique. Lock as a (D) action against this Lasombra is announced to have that action fail. Lock to give this Lasombra +1 stealth. A vampire can have only one haven.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla primogen: If Zane is not a prince, he can call a referendum to receive (and contest) the title held by a prince as a +1 stealth political action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable by a ready unlocked Ravnos other than the acting minion. Allies and vampires younger than this modifying Ravnos get -1 intercept.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Belladonna, n. In Italian a beautiful lady; in English a deadly poison. A striking example of the essential identity of the two tongues. Ambrose Bierce, "The Devil's Dictionary"

property.name: Discipline
property.value: aus qui tha ANI FOR PRO

property.name: Text
property.value: Independent. 2 votes (titled): Zayyat can move up to 3 blood from himself to a younger vampire in your uncontrolled region as a +1 stealth action. Once each turn, he can burn 2 blood to get +2 stealth (for the current action).

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla primogen: If Zelios is ready, he can lock to pay the pool cost of a location with his blood instead. +1 strength.

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable after resolution of an unsuccessful action. [cel] Unlock this vampire at the end of the turn. [CEL] Unlock this vampire.

property.name: Text
property.value: Laibon: Leave torpor actions cost Zhara 1 fewer blood.

property.name: Text
property.value: Laibon: As Zhenga announces a recruit or employ action, she can burn X blood. If the action succeeds, she can recruit and employ up to X additional allies and retainers from your hand (requirements and cost apply as normal).

property.name: Text
property.value: +1 stealth action. Requires a Sabbat vampire. Put this card on this vampire and add 1 blood to this vampire. This Sabbat vampire can burn this card any time after this turn ends to unlock. A vampire can have only one Zillah's Tears.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Caine's Promise is not intended for everyone, but only for his true childer, Zillah's childer, born of her tears. Blackhorse Tanner, Ventrue antitribu

property.name: Text
property.value: Add 4 blood to a vampire in your uncontrolled region with capacity 8 or more.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: And each night, for three nights, Zillah drank from her Sire, though she did not know it. And, on the third night, Caine announced he would marry Zillah, his sweetest Childe, and she agreed. The Book of Nod

property.name: Text
property.value: Only usable before range is determined. Put this card on this minion; it becomes a weapon: gun (equipment) that can strike: 1R damage, with 1 optional maneuver each combat. Ammo cards cannot be used with this gun. When this weapon is used, it inflicts 1 damage on the bearer during its strike resolution, but only once each combat.

property.name: Text
property.value: +2 stealth action. Put this card on this minion. This minion can burn this card to get +1 stealth.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I have always found that plans are useless, but planning is indispensable. Dwight Eisenhower

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: If Viri is in your ready region, Zizi can lock to unlock another Blood Brother of the same circle. Budapest circle. Sterile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Camarilla: Zoe does not get the usual +1 stealth when hunting.

property.name: Text
property.value: Zombie with 2 life. Zombie inflicts 1 damage on the opposing minion each round of combat during normal strike resolution at close range. This vampire can burn the Zombie to gain 2 blood as a +1 stealth action.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Put this card in play. During your master phase, you can choose a location controlled by another Methuselah. Until the end of your minion phase, any minion can shuffle the chosen location in its owner's library as a (D) action. If that action is successful, that controller gains X pool, where X is the pool cost of the chosen location. Any vampire can call a referendum to burn this card as a +1 stealth political action; during the polling step of that referendum, you can lock this card to get +1 vote.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique location. Hunting ground. During your unlock phase, a ready vampire you control can gain 1 blood. A vampire can gain blood from only one hunting ground each turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: They only kill to protect their hunting grounds. Eddie Holt, "Wolfen"

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: Zubeida gets +1 bleed against a Methuselah who controls no ready vampires with capacity 7 or more. Black Hand. Scarce. Sterile.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sabbat: After Zygodat successfully bleeds, you can burn the top 2 cards of the target Methuselah's library.
